Consider going back to the ‘drawing board’ to deconstruct what isn’t working and start anew.

success.quote: People who are ready to learn are those who will be the best to lead.

success.quote: It's only out of reach when you choose to keep your feet flat on the floor.
success.author: Lana M.H. Wilder

success.quote: Win or lose, you are trying, that's what matters.

success.quote: Men's lives are short .The hard man and his cruelties will beCursed behind his back and mocked in death.But one whose heart and ways are kind - of himstrangers will bear report to the whole wide world,and distant men will praise him. - Penelope in Robert Fitzgerald trans. THE ODYSSEY (364)
success.author: Robert Fitzgerald

success.quote: Never give up on the fight until you win the belt.
success.author: Israelmore Ayivor

success.quote: If one million of you give assent to the one thousand who participate in the murder of a child, then one million of you are a million times guilty.

success.quote: Don’t just manage; go extra mile and win your race. Never give up the fight. You will win.
success.author: Israelmore Ayivor

success.quote: There’s an interesting story about Abraham Lincoln. During the American Civil War he signed an order transferring certain regiments, but Secretary of War Edwin Stanton refused to execute it, calling the president a fool. When Lincoln heard he replied, ‘If Stanton said I’m a fool then I must be, for he’s nearly always right, and he says what he thinks. I’ll step over and see for myself.’ He did, and when Stanton convinced him the order was in error, Lincoln quietly withdrew it. Part of Lincoln’s greatness lay in his ability to rise above pettiness, ego, and sensitivity to other people’s opinions. He wasn’t easily offended. He welcomed criticism, and in doing so demonstrated one of the strengths of a truly great person: humility. So, have you been criticised? Make it a time to learn, not lose.
success.author: Patience Johnson

success.quote: If one thousand of you participate in the murder of one child, then one thousand of you are a thousand times guilty.
success.author: Compton Gage

success.quote: The most successful people in the world today are entrepreneurs

success.quote: Success is determined by how best you can utilize your time

success.quote: No crime is a means to an end. No crime can be rationalized.

success.quote: Start small and keep going.

success.quote: The sure way to succeed Is to endure to the very end.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: It`s Okay to Play or Work Alone in the Information Age But If We Must Make Headway in this Transformation Age, Collaboration is the Way to Go.
success.author: Anyaele Sam Chiyson

success.quote: Time utilization and effectiveness is a major marker for success
success.author: Sunday Adelaja

success.quote: The purpose is to get across; change horses mid-stream if necessary.
success.author: Haresh Sippy

success.quote: Success is focusing the full power of all you are on what you have a burning desire to achieve."
success.author: Wilfred Peterson

success.quote: Your daily product determines how far you go
success.author: Sunday Adelaja

success.quote: Never give up just because you failed initially
success.author: Sunday Adelaja

success.quote: For you to be successful in your promised land, you must study the land
success.author: Sunday Adelaja

success.quote: You are a mystery in yourself, go beyond everything for its revelation.
success.author: Shiva Negi

success.quote: Always be united with God in every thought and action, it will lead you to the attainment of self-knowledge.
success.author: Shiva Negi

success.quote: You can overcome all the sufferings of your life only with the light of self-knowledge; There is no other way.
success.author: Shiva Negi

success.quote: The essence of your life lies in the self-realization of God in higherconsciousness.
success.author: Shiva Negi

success.quote: Business is more than selling.
success.author: Pooja Agnihotri

success.quote: The understanding of the environment - political, economic, social, technological, and legal is very crucial for the success of a business.
success.author: Pooja Agnihotri

success.quote: When employees are able to feel what you feel and see what you see in your idea, you won’t need anything else to motivate them, and success will become inevitable.
success.author: Pooja Agnihotri

success.quote: To be successful, you have to embrace the change as change is the only constant thing in the business world.
success.author: Pooja Agnihotri

success.quote: A successful organization will always have an effective two-way communication system where information can easily flow from one level to another.
success.author: Pooja Agnihotri

success.quote: Not just the organizational structure but the management style can also affect your business goals of success and growth.
success.author: Pooja Agnihotri

success.quote: The main reason why many business owners fail to survive competition in their industry is because of their attitude and self-assurance.
success.author: Pooja Agnihotri

success.quote: Building an employee team or employee tribe is a little time consuming which requires little effort but in the long process of achieving business growth, it’s totally worth it.
success.author: Pooja Agnihotri

success.quote: What is more important than success and failure is that you continue trying.
success.author: Pooja Agnihotri

success.quote: It remains incredibly hard to succeed in something if we do not have fun doing it.
success.author: Omar Cherif

success.quote: Rest to refresh yourself but do not stop until you find a way to succeed.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: The 'goal' is the journey done well.
success.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

success.quote: The cost of success is that I must be willing to fail far more times than I succeed, which is why so few of us are successful.
success.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

success.quote: Wealth that can last generations can now be attained in the shortest time ever in history.
success.author: Jay Samit

success.quote: Never run after money, learn to overcome your desires and live for the purpose you were born to be.
success.author: Shiva Negi

success.quote: For fame is ultimately but the summary of all misunderstandings that crystallize about a new name
success.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

success.quote: Begin to challenge your own mind. Make sure you seek attention from your mind only. That is the key to success.
success.author: Major Mike Russell

success.quote: The day you realize desperation leads to nowhere and is unattractive, is the day you begin to succeed in this life.
success.author: Major Mike Russell

success.quote: There is no great success and outstanding achievement on earth without the input of friendship.
success.author: John Arthur

success.quote: Realize that you’re here. You’ve made it. There’s nothing else required. Everything beyond the fact of your existence is just a bonus. Life is a playground.
success.author: Kyle Cease

success.quote: You don’t need results, you are the result! The entire universe had to do everything it did for billions of years for you to exist right now. You’re the point of this whole thing. There’s nothing you need to do to prove yourself.
success.author: Kyle Cease

success.quote: The ultimate goal of human life is to fulfil the purpose of the soul in the realization of God.
success.author: Shiva Negi

success.quote: No matter what you achieve in this material world, at the end it all feels like a movie watched in the distant past.
success.author: Shunya

success.quote: Knowing the path doesn't put you a single step ahead of someone who's blindly walking it. Start executing on your ideas!
success.author: Dragos Iatan

success.quote: Real life is little different, we live in time and era where success is fantasized as easy and many are delusional about a true and lasting success that comes from hard work, determination and sacrifice
success.author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

success.quote: Never run after success, strive to fulfill the purpose of the soul and the desire for success will cease.
success.author: Shiva Negi

success.quote: I find the best way to love someone is not to change them, but instead, help them reveal the greatest version of themselves.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Our greatest fear should not be of failure but of succeeding at things in life that don't really matter.
success.author: Francis Chan

success.quote: The three great essentials to achieve anything worthwhile are, first, hard work; second, stick-to-itiveness; third, common sense.
success.author: Thomas A. Edison

success.quote: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
success.author: George Bernard Shaw

success.quote: The only time you fail is when you fall down and stay down.
success.author: Stephen Richards

success.quote: One of the most spiritual things you can do is embrace your humanity. Connect with those around you today. Say, "I love you", "I'm sorry", "I appreciate you", "I'm proud of you"...whatever you're feeling. Send random texts, write a cute note, embrace your truth and share it...cause a smile today for someone else...and give plenty of hugs.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: You’re not obligated to win. You’re obligated to keep trying. To the best you can do everyday.
success.author: Jason Mraz

success.quote: Don't confuse poor decision-making with destiny. Own your mistakes. It’s ok; we all make them. Learn from them so they can empower you!
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: People tend to be generous when sharing their nonsense, fear, and ignorance. And while they seem quite eager to feed you their negativity, please remember that sometimes the diet we need to be on is a spiritual and emotional one. Be cautious with what you feed your mind and soul. Fuel yourself with positivity and let that fuel propel you into positive action.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: If you have a dream, don’t just sit there. Gather courage to believe that you can succeed and leave no stone unturned to make it a reality.
success.author: Dr Roopleen

success.quote: May Light always surround you;Hope kindle and rebound you.May your Hurts turn to Healing;Your Heart embrace Feeling.May Wounds become Wisdom;Every Kindness a Prism.May Laughter infect you;Your Passion resurrect you.May Goodness inspire your Deepest Desires.Through all that you Reach For, May your arms Never Tire.
success.author: D. Simone

success.quote: Let today be the day you stop being haunted by the ghost of yesterday. Holding a grudge & harboring anger/resentment is poison to the soul. Get even with people...but not those who have hurt us, forget them, instead get even with those who have helped us.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Walk with the dreamers, the believers, the courageous, the cheerful, the planners, the doers, the successful people with their heads in the clouds and their feet on the ground. Let their spirit ignite a fire within you to leave this world better than when you found it...
success.author: Wilferd Peterson

success.quote: To each there comes in their lifetime a special moment when they are figuratively tapped on the shoulder and offered the chance to do a very special thing, unique to them and fitted to their talents. What a tragedy if that moment finds them unprepared or unqualified for that which could have been their finest hour.
success.author: Sir Winston Churchill

success.quote: Congratulations!Today is your day.You're off to Great Places!You're off and away!
success.author: Dr. Seuss

success.quote: Curious that we spend more time congratulating people who have succeeded than encouraging people who have not.
success.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

success.quote: Failure is a bend in the road, not the end of the road. Learn from failure and keep moving forward.
success.author: Roy T. Bennett

success.quote: Success is getting what you want..Happiness is wanting what you get.
success.author: Dale Carnegie

success.quote: And will you succeed? Yes indeed, yes indeed! Ninety-eight and three-quarters percent guaranteed!
success.author: Dr. Suess

success.quote: I've had great success being a total idiot.
success.author: Jerry Lewis

success.quote: Rejection is an opportunity for your selection.
success.author: Bernard Branson

success.quote: Don't mistake activity with achievement.
success.author: John Wooden

success.quote: If I cannot do great things, I can do small things in a great way
success.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

success.quote: I have learned that success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome while trying to succeed.
success.author: Booker T. Washington

success.quote: The universe doesn’t give you what you ask for with your thoughts - it gives you what you demand with your actions.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Keep your friends for friendship, but work with the skilled and competent
success.author: Robert Greene

success.quote: People who lack the clarity, courage, or determination to follow their own dreams will often find ways to discourage yours. When you change for the better, the people around you will be inspired to change also....but only after doing their best to make you stop. Live your truth and don't EVER stop.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: You never know what kind of setup market will present to you, your objective should be to find opportunity where risk reward ratio is best.
success.author: Jaymin Shah

success.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive—to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love—then make that day count!
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: When you connect to the silence within you, that is when you can make sense of the disturbance going on around you.
success.author: Stephen Richards

success.quote: If you have time to whine then you have time to find solution.
success.author: Dee Dee Artner

success.quote: Go higher and higher, until it becomes impossible to bring you down, I wanna use a microscope to locate you, don't even dream of coming down.
success.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

success.quote: Don't interpret anything too much. This is time waster number 1.
success.author: Dee Dee Artner

success.quote: You can be sure of succeeding in your attacks if you only attack places which are undefended.You can ensure the safety of your defense if you only hold positions that cannot be attacked.
success.author: Sun Tzu

success.quote: It’s the ‘everyday’ experiences we encounter along the journey to who we wanna be that will define who we are when we get there.
success.author: Aaron Lauritsen

success.quote: Achieving success is a challenge but so is struggling so you may as well choose success.
success.author: Rob Liano

success.quote: There are three qualities that every individual must have to achieve success: a Monk’s patience, a Warrior’s courage, a Child’s imagination.
success.author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

success.quote: Run wild and free like a waterfall
success.author: Anamika Mishra

success.quote: If you drop your beliefs, you drop your success. God's mighty people begin to fall even as achievers when they begin to drop the beliefs they pursue at first.
success.author: Israelmore Ayivor

success.quote: No matter what the industry you choose to ultimately invest all your time and energy in, be sure you're the owner, founder, and CEO. Remember, if you don't own it, you can't control it nor can you depend on it.
success.author: Brandi L. Bates

success.quote: Not every hen lay eggs. Not every hen that lays eggs gets them hatched. Not everyone born with greatness becomes as such. Go, hatch your eggs.
success.author: Israelmore Ayivor

success.quote: You know you made it, when people you know, tell people they know, that you know them.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: Visionary decision-making happens at the intersection of intuition and logic.
success.author: Paul O'Brien

success.quote: The strength of every individual is the grace for great work.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: If you're always following the crowd, you will never truly know who you are. Walk your own path.
success.author: Julian Pencilliah

success.quote: A lot of people come up here and they thank Jesus for this award. I want you to know that no one had less to do with this award than Jesus. He didn't help me a bit. If it was up to him, Cesar Millan would be up here with that damn dog. So all I can say is, 'suck it, Jesus! This award is my God now'!
success.author: Kathy Griffin

success.quote: People are successful because they think and act like successful people.
success.author: Roy   Bennett

success.quote: Even if you do nothing, say nothing and be nothing, there will still be many who will criticise you. It is much better to be criticised for success than be condemned for failures because success rids you of the many miseries of life.
success.author: Awdhesh Singh

success.quote: Real success is not rooted in positions, places or possessions, but in fulfilment of God's purposes for our lives.
success.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

success.quote: Just as the bird needs wings to fly, a leader needs useful information to flow. Leaders learn.
success.author: Israelmore Ayivor

success.quote: Sina jinsi. Nguzo ya maisha yangu ni historia ya maisha yangu. Historia ya maisha yangu ni urithi wa watu waliojifunza kusema hapana kwa ndiyo nyingi – waliojitolea vitu vingi katika maisha yao kunifikisha hapa nilipo leo – walionifundisha falsafa ya kushindwa si hiari. Siri ya mafanikio yangu ni kujitahidi kwa kadiri ya uwezo wangu wote; au 'pushing the envelope' kwa lugha ya kigeni.
success.author: Enock Maregesi

success.quote: Success is a choice; you choose it and work it out! Excellence is deliberate and so it is intentionally pursued. No successful person ever remained idle for success to knock his/her door for him/her
success.author: Israelmore Ayivor

success.quote: Self determination is greatest will power.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: The greater the success, the closer it verges on failure.
success.author: Robert Bresson

success.quote: When I was small I felt like a Superhero as my father threw me up in the air.Now after reaching this success peak I unmask - Real Superhero made me Superhero!
success.author: Hasil Paudyal

success.quote: You only have to doze a moment, and all is lost. For ruin and salvation both have their source inside you.
success.author: Epictetus

success.quote: What the fertilizer does to the germinating plant is what happiness does for a depressed soul... What anger does to a person is what an acid does to its container!
success.author: Israelmore Ayivor

success.quote: If you don’t fight for your dreams, you won’t earn anything. If you don’t anything, you will beg for everything.
success.author: Israelmore Ayivor

success.quote: don't read the success storiesyou will get messagebut read the failure storiesyou will get the ideas become successful
success.author: Asif Jaana

success.quote: Success, like happiness, is a by-product, not a goal.
success.author: Roy   Bennett

success.quote: Success is the doing, not the getting; in the trying, not the triumph. Success is a personal standard, reaching for the highest that is in us, becoming all that we can be. If we do our best, we are a success.
success.author: Zig Ziglar

success.quote: so here i sit. a sum of the parts. about a third way down this wonderful path, so to speak. and i've been thinking lately about a friendship that fell apart with time, with distance, and with the misunderstanding of youth. i'm trying not to confuse sadness with regret. not the easiest thing at times. i dont regret that certain things happened. i understand that perhaps i had a choice in the matter, or perhaps i believe in fate. probably not, but so far actions as small as the quickest glance to events as monumental as death have pushed me slowly along to right here, right now. there was no other way to get here. the meandering and erratic path was actually the straightest of lines. take away a handful of angry words, things once thought of as mistakes or regrets, and i'm suddenly a different person with a different history, a different future. that, i would regret. so here i sit. thinking about a person i once called my best friends. a man who might be full of sadness and regret, who might not give a damn, or who might, just might, remember the future and realize that's where its at.
success.author: chris wright

success.quote: The way to screw up somebody's life is to give them what they want.
success.author: Patrick Swayze

success.quote: You've been given the innate power to shape your life...but you cannot just speak change, you have to LIVE change. Intent paired with action builds the bridge to success. You can't just want it; you have to do it, live it...BE it! Success isn't something you have, it's something you DO!
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: You have been blessed with immeasurable power to make positive changes in your life.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
success.author: John D. Rockefeller

success.quote: Take your victories, whatever they may be, cherish them, use them, but don't settle for them.
success.author: Mia Hamm

success.quote: Go as far as you can see and you will see further.
success.author: Zig Ziglar

success.quote: NEVER be surprised by your own success!
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Success comes in a lot of ways, but it doesn't come with money and it doesn't come with fame. It comes from having a meaning in your life, doing what you love and being passionateabout what you do. That's having a life of success. When you have the ability to do what you love, love what you do and have the ability to impact people. That's having a life of success. That's what having a life of meaning is.
success.author: Tim Tebow

success.quote: Don't waste your time hating a failure. Failure is a greater teacher than success. Listen, learn, go on.
success.author: Clarissa Pinkola Estés

success.quote: Play around. Dive into absurdity and write. Take chances. You will succeed if you are fearless of failure.
success.author: Natalie Goldberg

success.quote: To become successful, one must put themselves in the paths of giants!
success.author: Lillian Cauldwell

success.quote: Your agreement with reality defines your life.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy ideal
success.author: Thomas S. Monson

success.quote: ...success is not a comparison of what we have done with what others have done.
success.author: Myles Munroe

success.quote: Success is doing what you want to do, when you want, where you want, with whom you want, as much as you want.
success.author: Anthony Robbins

success.quote: If you feel obsessed to prove something to the world, then you'd need world attention to be able to prove it.
success.author: Toba Beta

success.quote: If you really want to eat, keep climbing. The fruits are on the top of the tree. Stretch your hands and keep stretching them. Success is on the top, keep going.
success.author: Israelmore Ayivor

success.quote: Success is something you experience when you act accordingly. Success is not something you have, it's something you do.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: When you have faults, do not fear to abandon them.
success.author: Confucius

success.quote: Beware of those who criticize you when you deserve some praise for an achievement, for it is they who secretly desire to be worshiped.
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
success.author: Will Rodgers

success.quote: From this point forward, you don’t even know how to quit in life."~ Aaron Lauritsen, ‘100 Days Drive
success.author: Aaron Lauritsen

success.quote: People can change anything they want to, and that means everything in the world.
success.author: Joe Strummer

success.quote: Start before you're ready.Don't prepare, begin.
success.author: Mel Robbins

success.quote: Failure is always an option
success.author: Adam Savage

success.quote: The people who stand before kings may look like they did it all by themselves. But in fact they are invariably the beneficiaries of hidden advantages and extraordinary opportunities and cultural legacies that allow them to learn and work hard and make sense of the world in ways others cannot. It makes a difference where and when we grew up. The culture we belong to and the legacies passed down by our forebears shape the patterns of our achievements in ways we cannot begin to imagine. It's not enough to ask what successful people are like, in other words. It is only by asking where they are from that we can unravel the logic behind who succeeds and who doesn't.
success.author: Malcolm Gladwell

success.quote: My life changed the day I moved beyond just wishing for things and I started earning them. That is the day I learned that we don't get what we wish for, we get what we work for.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: There is no secret ingredient
success.author: Mr Ping Po's father

success.quote: A thinker sees his own actions as experiments and questions--as attempts to find out something. Success and failure are for him answers above all.
success.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

success.quote: It had long since come to my attention that people of accomplishment rarely sat back and let things happen to them. They went out and happened to things.
success.author: Leonardo da Vinci

success.quote: There is nothing more rare, nor more beautiful, than a woman being unapologetically herself; comfortable in her perfect imperfection. To me, that is the true essence of beauty.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and gets to bed at night, and in between he does what he wants to do.
success.author: Bob Dylan

success.quote: The biggest wall you have to climb is the one you build in your mind: Never let your mind talk you out of your dreams, trick you into giving up. Never let your mind become the greatest obstacle to success. To get your mind on the right track, the rest will follow.
success.author: Roy T. Bennett

success.quote: Success is most often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
success.author: Coco Chanel

success.quote: Never stop dreaming, never stop believing, never give up, never stop trying, and never stop learning.
success.author: Roy T. Bennett

success.quote: Do not let arrogance go to your head and despair to your heart; do not let compliments go to your head and criticisms to your heart; do not let success go to your head and failure to your heart.
success.author: Roy T. Bennett

success.quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
success.author: Robert F. Kennedy

success.quote: If you try and lose then it isn't your fault. But if you don't try and we lose, then it's all your fault.
success.author: Orson Scott Card

success.quote: At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Kites rise highest against the wind, not with it.
success.author: Winston S. Churchill

success.quote: Keep your best wishes, close to your heart and watch what happens
success.author: Tony DeLiso

success.quote: I don't care if you're black, white, straight, bisexual, gay, lesbian, short, tall, fat, skinny, rich or poor. If you're nice to me, I'll be nice to you. Simple as that.
success.author: Robert Michaels MD - 2007 - Graduation Speaker

success.quote: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
success.author: Napoleon Hill

success.quote: Make a pact with yourself today to not be defined by your past. Sometimes the greatest thing to come out of all your hard work isn't what you get for it, but what you become for it. Shake things up today! Be You...Be Free...Share.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: When you show yourself to the world and display your talents, you naturally stir all kinds of resentment, envy, and other manifestations of insecurity... you cannot spend your life worrying about the petty feelings of others
success.author: Robert Greene

success.quote: Supreme excellence consists of breaking the enemy's resistance without fighting.
success.author: Sun Tzu

success.quote: Over the years, I have come to realize that the greatest trap in our life is not success, popularity, or power, but self-rejection. Success, popularity, and power can indeed present a great temptation, but their seductive quality often comes from the way they are part of the much larger temptation to self-rejection. When we have come to believe in the voices that call us worthless and unlovable, then success, popularity, and power are easily perceived as attractive solutions. The real trap, however, is self-rejection. As soon as someone accuses me or criticizes me, as soon as I am rejected, left alone, or abandoned, I find myself thinking, "Well, that proves once again that I am a nobody." ... [My dark side says,] I am no good... I deserve to be pushed aside, forgotten, rejected, and abandoned. Self-rejection is the greatest enemy of the spiritual life because it contradicts the sacred voice that calls us the "Beloved." Being the Beloved constitutes the core truth of our existence.
success.author: Henri J.M. Nouwen

success.quote: If you hang out with chickens, you're going to cluck and if you hang out with eagles, you're going to fly.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Renew, release, let go. Yesterday’s gone. There’s nothing you can do to bring it back. You can’t "should’ve" done something. You can only DO something. Renew yourself. Release that attachment. Today is a new day!
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: We are all failures- at least the best of us are.
success.author: J.M. Barrie

success.quote: Forget yesterday - it has already forgotten you. Don't sweat tomorrow - you haven't even met. Instead, open your eyes and your heart to a truly precious gift - today.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Judge your success by what you had to give up in order to get it.
success.author: Dalai Lama XIV

success.quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
success.author: Vince Lombardi

success.quote: I've come to believe that each of us has a personal calling that's as unique as a fingerprint - and that the best way to succeed is to discover what you love and then find a way to offer it to others in the form of service, working hard, and also allowing the energy of the universe to lead you.
success.author: Oprah Winfrey

success.quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any one thing.
success.author: Abraham Lincoln

success.quote: Never was anything great achieved without danger.
success.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

success.quote: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
success.author: Bill Cosby

success.quote: A kind gesture can reach a wound that only compassion can heal.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Never allow the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game!
success.author: Babe Ruth

success.quote: To become a master at any skill, it takes the total effort of your: heart, mind, and soul working together in tandem.
success.author: Maurice Young

success.quote: Success teaches us nothing; only failure teaches.
success.author: Hyman G. Rickover

success.quote: Success is not what you have done compared to what others have done. Success is what you have done compared to what you were supposed to do.
success.author: Tony Evans

success.quote: Success goes to the ones who do. Get up. Show up. Throw up if you have to. Do it afraid, but do it no matter.
success.author: Toni Sorenson

success.quote: An intelligent woman is a goldmine! She has the ability to learn, reason and understand things better and faster than her contemporaries. She is competent, alert and can reason out stuffs easily.
success.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

success.quote: How we feel is not who we are. We might feel like failures, but as long as we are still trying, we are not failures. We are works in progress.
success.author: Toni Sorenson

success.quote: For the rest of history, for most of us, our bright promise will always fall short of being actualised; it will never earn us bountiful sums of money or beget exemplary objects or organisations....Most of us stand poised at the edge of brilliance, haunted by the knowledge of our proximity, yet still demonstrably on the wrong side of the line, our dealings with reality undermined by a range of minor yet critical psychological flaws (a little too much optimism, an unprocessed rebelliousness, a fatal impatience or sentimentality). We are like an exquisite high-speed aircraft which for lack of a tiny part is left stranded beside the runway, rendered slower than a tractor or a bicycle.
success.author: Alain de Botton

success.quote: When we fail, our pride supports us, and when we succeed it betrays us.
success.author: Charles Colton

success.quote: Know what you want and reach out eagerly for it.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Some of the most powerful speeches I have given have been delivered in the dedicated silence of my actions.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Do not let your grand ambitions stand in the way of small but meaningful accomplishments.
success.author: Bryant McGill

success.quote: Nothing that happens to you was meant to be. The only thing about you that was meant to be is you. Blaze your own trail.
success.author: George Alexiou

success.quote: The key ingredient to any kind of happiness or success is to never give less than your best
success.author: Russell Simmons

success.quote: Timing, perseverance, and ten years of trying will eventually make you look like an overnight success.
success.author: Biz Stone

success.quote: The condition and characteristic of an uninstructed person is this: he never expects from himself profit (advantage) nor harm, but from externals. The condition and characteristic of a philosopher is this: he expects all advantage and all harm from himself.
success.author: Epictetus

success.quote: Life is a web of intersections and choices. Your 1st choice is to recognize an intersection. Your 2nd choice is to be grateful for it.
success.author: Ryan Lilly

success.quote: How much you can learn when you fail determines how far you will go into achieving your goals.
success.author: Roy   Bennett

success.quote: I am not afraid of tomorrow for I have seen yesterday, I have today and I know Him who holds tomorrow so I know tomorrow will be beautiful for me.
success.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

success.quote: Before you were born, and were still too tiny for the human eye to see, you won the race for life from among 250 million competitors. And yet, how fast you have forgotten your strength, when your very existence is proof of your greatness.
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavour.
success.author: Truman Capote

success.quote: Some people dream of SUCCESS while other wake up and work hard at it.
success.author: Barbara Rubel

success.quote: success awaits those who steadfastly commit to any requisite sacrifice
success.author: Ken Poirot

success.quote: The word "seek" is a verb. Are you treating it as such in your life? If you seek change, success, or love, DO it - BE it!
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: If your failure is not a lesson, it's indeed a failure.
success.author: Ogwo David Emenike

success.quote: How would your life be different if...you had a plan of action towards your goals? Let today be the day...You stop allowing your days to be stolen by busy nothingness and take calculated steps towards your goals.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Credentials are like potential energy, the compliments of a name on paper, in documents, word of mouth, but faith is like kinetic energy, the motion and the force that which is witnessed. Hence in the end it is the faith rather than the credentials that really takes you places.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: And for all those years, we never talked about the disaster at the recital or my terrible accusations afterward at the piano bench. All that remained unchecked, like a betrayal that was now unbreakable. So I never found a way to ask her why she had hoped something so large that failure was inevitable. And even worse, I never asked her what frightened me the most: Why had she given up hope?
success.author: Amy Tan

success.quote: You are successful if you are able to work on the kind of material that you want to - if your life conforms to your dreams, regardless of outside acceptance or acclaim.
success.author: James Franco

success.quote: Success is not to discover what others like, it is to acquire and practise the skills that help one gain their love.
success.author: Muhammad Adb Al-Rahman Al-Arifi

success.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
success.author: Winston S. Churchill

success.quote: He has achieved success who has lived well, laughed often, and loved much;Who has enjoyed the trust of pure women, the respect of intelligent men and the love of little children;Who has filled his niche and accomplished his task;Who has never lacked appreciation of Earth's beauty or failed to express it;Who has left the world better than he found it,Whether an improved poppy, a perfect poem, or a rescued soul;Who has always looked for the best in others and given them the best he had;Whose life was an inspiration;Whose memory a benediction.
success.author: Bessie Anderson Stanley

success.quote: I can't give you a sure-fire formula for success, but I can give you a formula for failure: try to please everybody all the time.
success.author: Herbert Bayard Swope

success.quote: If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. Then quit. No use being a damn fool about it.
success.author: W.C. Fields

success.quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
success.author: Albert Einstein

success.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
success.author: Herman Melville

success.quote: Dare to BeWhen a new day begins, dare to smile gratefully.When there is darkness, dare to be the first to shine a light.When there is injustice, dare to be the first to condemn it.When something seems difficult, dare to do it anyway.When life seems to beat you down, dare to fight back.When there seems to be no hope, dare to find some.When you’re feeling tired, dare to keep going.When times are tough, dare to be tougher.When love hurts you, dare to love again.When someone is hurting, dare to help them heal.When another is lost, dare to help them find the way.When a friend falls, dare to be the first to extend a hand.When you cross paths with another, dare to make them smile.When you feel great, dare to help someone else feel great too.When the day has ended, dare to feel as you’ve done your best.Dare to be the best you can –At all times, Dare to be!
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: So be sure when you step, Step with care and great tact. And remember that life's A Great Balancing Act. And will you succeed? Yes! You will, indeed! (98 and ¾ percent guaranteed) Kid, you'll move mountains.
success.author: Dr. Seuss

success.quote: Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get
success.author: W. P. Kinsella

success.quote: Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history, but not a part of your destiny.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
success.author: Truman Capote

success.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
success.author: Roy T. Bennett

success.quote: Have no fear of perfection - you'll never reach it.
success.author: Salvador Dali

success.quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
success.author: Winston S. Churchill

success.quote: Anyone whose goal is 'something higher' must expect someday to suffer vertigo. What is vertigo? Fear of falling? No, Vertigo is something other than fear of falling. It is the voice of the emptiness below us which tempts and lures us, it is the desire to fall, against which, terrified, we defend ourselves.
success.author: Milan Kundera

success.quote: The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
success.author: Bette Midler

success.quote: Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.
success.author: Coco Chanel

success.quote: If A is a success in life, then A equals x plus y plus z. Work is x; y is play; and z is keeping your mouth shut
success.author: Albert Einstein

success.quote: Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: I'm a success today because I had a friend who believed in me and I didn't have the heart to let him down.
success.author: Abraham Lincoln

success.quote: Let the improvement of yourself keep you so busy that you have no time to criticize others.
success.author: Roy T. Bennett

success.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
success.author: Walt Disney

success.quote: Sometimes it takes a good fall to really know where you stand
success.author: Hayley Williams

success.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
success.author: Oliver Goldsmith

success.quote: All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence; then success is sure.
success.author: Mark Twain

success.quote: Don't aim at success. The more you aim at it and make it a target, the more you are going to miss it. For success, like happiness, cannot be pursued; it must ensue, and it only does so as the unintended side effect of one's personal dedication to a cause greater than oneself or as the by-product of one's surrender to a person other than oneself. Happiness must happen, and the same holds for success: you have to let it happen by not caring about it. I want you to listen to what your conscience commands you to do and go on to carry it out to the best of your knowledge. Then you will live to see that in the long-run—in the long-run, I say!—success will follow you precisely because you had forgotten to think about it
success.author: Viktor E. Frankl

success.quote: Sometimes life knocks you on your ass... get up, get up, get up!!! Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.
success.author: Theodore Roosevelt

success.quote: No matter how old you are now. You are never too young or too old for success or going after what you want. Here’s a short list of people who accomplished great things at different ages1) Helen Keller, at the age of 19 months, became deaf and blind. But that didn’t stop her. She was the first deaf and blind person to earn a Bachelor of Arts degree.2) Mozart was already competent on keyboard and violin; he composed from the age of 5.3) Shirley Temple was 6 when she became a movie star on "Bright Eyes."4) Anne Frank was 12 when she wrote the diary of Anne Frank.5) Magnus Carlsen became a chess Grandmaster at the age of 13.6) Nadia Comăneci was a gymnast from Romania that scored seven perfect 10.0 and won three gold medals at the Olympics at age 14.7) Tenzin Gyatso was formally recognized as the 14th Dalai Lama in November 1950, at the age of 15.8) Pele, a soccer superstar, was 17 years old when he won the world cup in 1958 with Brazil.9) Elvis was a superstar by age 19.10) John Lennon was 20 years and Paul Mcartney was 18 when the Beatles had their first concert in 1961.11) Jesse Owens was 22 when he won 4 gold medals in Berlin 1936.12) Beethoven was a piano virtuoso by age 2313) Issac Newton wrote Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica at age 2414) Roger Bannister was 25 when he broke the 4 minute mile record15) Albert Einstein was 26 when he wrote the theory of relativity16) Lance E. Armstrong was 27 when he won the tour de France 17) Michelangelo created two of the greatest sculptures "David" and "Pieta" by age 2818) Alexander the Great, by age 29, had created one of the largest empires of the ancient world19) J.K. Rowling was 30 years old when she finished the first manuscript of Harry Potter20) Amelia Earhart was 31 years old when she became the first woman to fly solo across the Atlantic Ocean21) Oprah was 32 when she started her talk show, which has become the highest-rated program of its kind22) Edmund Hillary was 33 when he became the first man to reach Mount Everest23) Martin Luther King Jr. was 34 when he wrote the speech "I Have a Dream."24) Marie Curie was 35 years old when she got nominated for a Nobel Prize in Physics 25) The Wright brothers, Orville (32) and Wilbur (36) invented and built the world's first successful airplane and making the first controlled, powered and sustained heavier-than-air human flight26) Vincent Van Gogh was 37 when he died virtually unknown, yet his paintings today are worth millions.27) Neil Armstrong was 38 when he became the first man to set foot on the moon.28) Mark Twain was 40 when he wrote "The Adventures of Tom Sawyer", and 49 years old when he wrote "Adventures of Huckleberry Finn"29) Christopher Columbus was 41 when he discovered the Americas30) Rosa Parks was 42 when she refused to obey the bus driver’s order to give up her seat to make room for a white passenger31) John F. Kennedy was 43 years old when he became President of the United States32) Henry Ford Was 45 when the Ford T came out.33) Suzanne Collins was 46 when she wrote "The Hunger Games"34) Charles Darwin was 50 years old when his book On the Origin of Species came out.35) Leonardo Da Vinci was 51 years old when he painted the Mona Lisa.36) Abraham Lincoln was 52 when he became president.37) Ray Kroc Was 53 when he bought the McDonalds Franchise and took it to unprecedented levels.38) Dr. Seuss was 54 when he wrote "The Cat in the Hat".40) Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger III was 57 years old when he successfully ditched US Airways Flight 1549 in the Hudson River in 2009. All of the 155 passengers aboard the aircraft survived41) Colonel Harland Sanders was 61 when he started the KFC Franchise42) J.R.R Tolkien was 62 when the Lord of the Ring books came out43) Ronald Reagan was 69 when he became President of the US44) Jack Lalane at age 70 handcuffed, shackled, towed 70 rowboats45) Nelson Mandela was 76 when he became President
success.author: Pablo

success.quote: How would your life be different if…You stopped making negative judgmental assumptions about people you encounter? Let today be the day…You look for the good in everyone you meet and respect their journey.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: The level of success you achieve will be in direct proportion to the depth of your commitment.
success.author: Roy T. Bennett

success.quote: Don't set your goals by what other people deem important.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: To be heroic is to be courageous enough to die for something; to be inspirational is to be crazy enough to live a little.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: The merit of all things lies in their difficulty.
success.author: Alexandre Dumas

success.quote: The victim mindset dilutes the human potential. By not accepting personal responsibility for our circumstances, we greatly reduce our power to change them.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: To succeed in the world it is not enough to be stupid - one must also be polite.
success.author: Voltaire

success.quote: One of the lessons that I grew up with was to always stay true to yourself and never let what somebody else says distract you from your goals. And so when I hear about negative and false attacks, I really don't invest any energy in them, because I know who I am.
success.author: Michelle Obama

success.quote: Don't give up! It's not over. The universe is balanced. Every set-back bears with it the seeds of a come-back.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: It is extraordinarily entertaining to watch the historians of the past ... entangling themselves in what they were pleased to call the "problem" of Queen Elizabeth. They invented the most complicated and astonishing reasons both for her success as a sovereign and for her tortuous matrimonial policy. She was the tool of Burleigh, she was the tool of Leicester, she was the fool of Essex; she was diseased, she was deformed, she was a man in disguise. She was a mystery, and must have some extraordinary solution. Only recently has it occrurred to a few enlightened people that the solution might be quite simple after all. She might be one of the rare people were born into the right job and put that job first.
success.author: Dorothy L. Sayers

success.quote: The real glory is being knocked to your knees and then coming back. That's real glory. Thats the essence of it.
success.author: Vince Lombardi

success.quote: Who you are tomorrow begins with what you do today.
success.author: Tim Fargo

success.quote: Decide what you want to be....Pay the Price ...And be what you want to be.
success.author: John A Widtsoe

success.quote: Be curious about the world in which you live. Look things up. Chase down every reference. Go deeper than anybody else--that's how you'll get ahead.
success.author: Austin Kleon

success.quote: I am not a victim. No matter what I have been through, I'm still here. I have a history of victory.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Failure should be our teacher, not our undertaker. Failure is delay, not defeat. It is a temporary detour, not a dead end. Failure is something we can avoid only by saying nothing, doing nothing, and being nothing.
success.author: Denis Waitley

success.quote: Anyone who imagines they can work alone winds up surrounded by nothing but rivals, without companions. The fact is, no one ascends alone.
success.author: Lance Armstrong

success.quote: If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: Your success and happiness lie in you.
success.author: Helen Keller

success.quote: As Aristotle said, 'Excellence is a habit.' I would say furthermore that excellence is made constant through the feeling that comes right after one has completed a work which he himself finds undeniably awe-inspiring. He only wants to relax until he's ready to renew such a feeling all over again because to him, all else has become absolutely trivial.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: It doesn't matter how great your shoes are if you don't accomplish anything in them.
success.author: Martina Boone

success.quote: Courage to me is doing something daring, no matter how afraid, insecure, intimidated, alone, unworthy, incapable, ridiculed or whatever other paralyzing emotion you might feel. Courage is taking action....no matter what.  So you're afraid? Be afraid.  Be scared silly to the point you're trembling and nauseous, but do it anyway!
success.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

success.quote: If you're not gonna go all the way, why go at all?
success.author: Joe Namath

success.quote: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
success.author: Anthony Robbins

success.quote: Don't look so worried. Most successful missions are just a series of barely averted disasters.
success.author: Sabaa Tahir

success.quote: أتعلم لو كنت بقربي الآن ؟لكنت ضممتك إلي بكل ما أوتيت من عشق وشوق إليك ..ووضعت رأسي على قلبك الذي لطالما أدمنت هواه حد الثمالة !وسألتك بوجع هذه الأرض وماحوت :بربك لمَ أبعدتني عنك ؟
success.author: نجلاء حسن

success.quote: When you go in search of honey, you must expect to be stung by bees.
success.author: Joseph Joubert

success.quote: The most important thing is this: to sacrifice what you are now for what you can become tomorrow.
success.author: Shannon Alder

success.quote: Those who don't jump will never fly.
success.author: Leena Ahmad Almashat

success.quote: There's no reason to have a plan B because it distracts from plan A.
success.author: Will Smith

success.quote: I am so grateful for my troubles. As I reflect back on my life, I have come to realize that my greatest triumphs have been born of my greatest troubles.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Losing means winning if you are resilient and persistent. Everything great now has its imperfect versions in the past.
success.author: Thomas Vato

success.quote: There are no spa hotels on the road to success.
success.author: Ljupka Cvetanova

success.quote: People who think I'm crazy are people who are still not sure about themselves.
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: People will always see the success that is present and disregard the hardwork
success.author: Morifi Ernest

success.quote: We will never rise on the wings of our own ingenuity or wisdom, for those are the things that lift nothing other than our ego in the process of crashing our lives. Rather, it is the surrender of the smallness of self to the enormity of God that allows us to soar.
success.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

success.quote: Resting is bad for people who thrive on inertia.
success.author: A.D. Aliwat

success.quote: A success? After all the failures to get a chance for yet another failure.
success.author: Ljupka Cvetanova

success.quote: Failure, I don't fear, because I know without it I can't succeed.
success.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

success.quote: Imati stila je bijeg od vulgarnosti cime doprinosimo bolje drustvu.
success.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

success.quote: I’m the person who is less available for more people and more available for less people
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: This world is full of ordinary people, one who works extra hard becomes extraordinary
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: My dreams are nothing less than war
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: People who think, speak and act are the ones who change the world.
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: Nothing is necessary to become an extraordinary person except extra in every action of your life towards your goal
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: The best or nothing, is the tag line of my life and it will always be the same
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: Before you are a leader, success is all about growing yourself. When you become a leader, success is all about growing others. —Jack Welch
success.author: Lao Tzu

success.quote: I am very confident that I will not die until I win, because my victory is important to all those 7.7 billion people.
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: When I will win I know I will celebrate less than this world
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: I am an open source person, I am 100% public domain, I have no right to my own life
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: When my vision becomes a reality, this world will live rest in peace alive
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: There's nothing wrong with failure, it's just people's opinion and your over-thinking about opinions prevents you from doing it again
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: 99% of the things we worry about never happen, it's happening around our negative thoughts in our minds and we accept it as reality and kill millions of dreams.
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: Entrepreneurs don't keep more friends, they keep the real army
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: हर वक़्त को बदलने के लिये थोडा वक़्त दो, वो वक़्त भी बदल गया था, ये वक़्त भी बदल जायेगा
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: Life is about saving the lives of people who actually died today for some bullshit reason.
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: Saving people's lives is the most amazing feeling which you can't describe in words.
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: When you think you want to do it tomorrow, do it right away, and push yourself harder to achieve your dreams, yes you have a time but not more than others and if you don’t make it fast You will lose the real game
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: People die with regret, and I want to die with respect and for that I am willing to take all the risks.
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: My life is all about risk, in the other words you can call me a risk, yes every morning, every evening, every night, every day, every second, I'm taking all the risks to make my dreams come true
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: Everyday is a Monday
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: Stop dwelling in the past and worrying about what can go wrong in your life, and get excited about the future and what can go right in your life.
success.author: Cliff Hannold

success.quote: Some habits just translate well to other undertakings. Some things are just in one’s nature.
success.author: A.D. Aliwat

success.quote: First an empress, then an empire.
success.author: A.D. Aliwat

success.quote: There's a single path to success. Yours.
success.author: Mario Maruffi

success.quote: Just because you get there first doesn’t mean you’re the best.
success.author: A.D. Aliwat

success.quote: Losers read, winners skim.
success.author: A.D. Aliwat

success.quote: Failure is only a figment of your imagination, which cannot turn real till you give in to it.
success.author: Abhijit Naskar

success.quote: In a scrum team, no one is boss but a partner, for the success of a project.
success.author: Vikrmn: CA Vikram Verma

success.quote: It's a shallow achievement that brings prosperity only to you and does nothing to improve the lives of others.
success.author: Abhijit Naskar

success.quote: Today life measured by success and success is measured by wealth. Then where is the time to measure the original qualities of human being.
success.author: Pranita  P deshpande

success.quote: People who think they are smart. Who play other people or who rob, fraud ,cheats, scam or swindle other people. Life rob, fraud ,cheats, scam or swindle them their success and happiness.
success.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

success.quote: Of course, perseverance does not guarantee success, but success is often unattainable without it.
success.author: Christopher Peterson

success.quote: Success solves old and creates new problems.
success.author: Thomas Vato

success.quote: Inequality may not be fair but is necessary for progress. When resources are distributed to people equally, you establish equality of outcome. If you photograph for a living or build rockets to colonize solar system - equality of outcome will establish the same value for both. It does not reward for resource-intensive and risky operations and discourages the development & progress because it's as valuable as photographing. Any reasonable person will do less complicated things if he is compensated in the same way.BUT, when resources are unequally distributed - it distributes values too. It means it systemically designs 'rich & poor' people. It means if you are poor, then you can become rich. To complete this transformation, you must do something valuable. In this way, minor and huge progress happens. No matter if you are rich or poor - you will need opportunities. It is the way we interact with opportunities constructs inequality.
success.author: Thomas Vato

success.quote: Success is about significance. Significance is about leaving a mark and making a difference that outlives us. The acquisition of wealth and power is temporal. Positively impacting lives is eternal!
success.author: Adeniké Aina

success.quote: There are two rules to success:1. Never reveal everything you know.
success.author: Anonymous

success.quote: It takes one woman to make a change it takes many women to make the difference
success.author: International Women's Day Collective

success.quote: Succes is krijgen wat je wilt; geluk is willen wat je krijgt.
success.author: Ingrid Bergman

success.quote: The dictionary is the only place that success comes before work. Hard work is the price we must pay for success. I think you can accomplish anything if you're willing to pay the price.
success.author: Vince Lombardi

success.quote: The greatest gift one can receive from god is craziness towards your goal, without it you can't succeed.
success.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

success.quote: Realizing that ‘possession’ is an illusion finally liberates us to possess something that is never an illusion and is always liberating; and that is the reality that we are God’s cherished possession. Therefore, life is not about acquiring possessions. Rather, it’s about being one.
success.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

success.quote: Our success is determined by how many people we are able to help solve a problem, or helping others to improve the level and quality of something in their life.
success.author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

success.quote: They say, Success is measured by wealth; by achieving the dreamed goals, by being renowned, by withholding power.But I truly believe success is nothing but just an abstract word which is imaginary, it has no horizon, you can be closer to it but never can achieve it.
success.author: Pravin Dhandre

success.quote: Failure does not predict future failure. It is simply a delay, not defeat. Failure is the seed from which success springs.
success.author: Cindy Lin

success.quote: Life is progress, and stopping from progress is death. Failure does not matter in life for a progressive person, even a thousand failures do not matter. He has before his view success, and success is his even after a thousand failures. The greatest pity in life is the standstill when life does not move further. A sensible person prefers death to such a life. It is as a paralysis of the soul, of the spirit, and is always caused by holding bad impressions in mind. No soul is deprived of happiness in reality. The soul’s very being is happiness. Man brings unhappiness upon himself by holding in his hands the clouds of bad impressions, which fall as a shadow upon his soul. Once a person is able to clear from his mind, by whatever process, the undesirable impressions, a new power begins to spring from his heart, opening a way before him to accomplish all he wishes, attracting to him all he requires, clearing his path of all obstacles, and making his atmosphere clear, for him to live and move and to accomplish all he wishes to accomplish.
success.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

success.quote: Success is leading an honorable life. Honor implies that there are some actions you would categorically never do, regardless of the material rewards. It also means that there are things you would do unconditionally, regardless of the consequences.
success.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

success.quote: SUCCESUL înseamnă și să oferi. Și nu doar de sărbători...
success.author: Liviu C Tudose

success.quote: Two step forward and one step back, so as to bring in the inertia, and control the impending setback,Slowly, and surely it will lead to success, lest your fear should limit all initiatives to be held back!
success.author: Priyavrat Thareja

success.quote: If you chase the money, you will never be great. However If You did chase the greatness, you will become rich!
success.author: Alex Haditaghi

success.quote: The carnal culture spins something like this: Aim at wealth and you will get women thrown in; aim at women and you will get neither.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: I believe that you're great, that there's something magnificent about you. Regardless of what has happened to you in your life, regardless of how young or how old you think you might be, the moment you begin to think properly, there's something that is within you, there's power within you, that's greater than the world. It will begin to emerge. It will take over your life. It will feed you. It will clothe you. It will guide you, protect you, direct you, sustain your very existence, if you let it. Now, that is what I know for sure.
success.author: Michael Beckwith

success.quote: Pretend that every single person you meet has a sign around his or her neck that says, "Make me feel important." Not only will you succeed in sales, you will succeed in life.
success.author: Mary Kay Ash

success.quote: Perfection' is man's ultimate illusion. It simply doesn't exist in the universe.... If you are a perfectionist, you are guaranteed to be a loser in whatever you do.
success.author: David D. Burns

success.quote: We may place blame, give reasons, and even have excuses; but in the end, it is an act of cowardice to not follow your dreams.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: The comfort zone is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure. If you always do what is easy and choose the path of least resistance, you never step outside your comfort zone. Great things don’t come from comfort zones.
success.author: Roy T. Bennett

success.quote: You’ve got to be sure of yourself beforeYou can ever win a prize.
success.author: Napoleon Hill

success.quote: Why are you going to choose failure when success is an option?
success.author: Jillian Michaels

success.quote: There is nothing worse for the lying soul than the mirror of reality.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: If you think someone or something other than yourself is responsible for your happiness or success, I'd guess you're not that happy or successful.
success.author: Rob Liano

success.quote: Whether you try too hard to fit in or you try too hard to stand out, it is of equal consequence: you exhaust your significance.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: To do more for the world than the world does for you - that is success.
success.author: Henry Ford

success.quote: A lack of clarity could put the brakes on any journey to success.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Make a pact with yourself today to not be defined by your past. Instead, shake things up today! Live through today. Don’t just exist through it - LIVE through it!
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: You need mountains, long staircases don't make good hikers.
success.author: Amit Kalantri

success.quote: We must transcend the illusion that money or power has any bearing on our worthiness as children of God.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: If you want to be successful, it's just this simple. Know what you are doing. Love what you are doing. And believe in what you are doing.
success.author: Will Rogers

success.quote: There's nothing in the world that breeds success like success.
success.author: Bob Ross

success.quote: Who is willing to be satisfied with a job that expresses all his limitations? He will accept such work only as a 'means of livelihood' while he waits to discover his 'true vocation'. The world is full of unsuccessful businessmen who still secretly believe they were meant to be artists or writers or actors in the movies.
success.author: Thomas Merton

success.quote: I don't do that kind of negativity. If you put your energy into thinking about how much the fall would hurt, you're already halfway down.
success.author: Tana French

success.quote: You have to be uncomfortable in order to be successful, in some ways. If you stay in your comfort zone! You would never do the things that you need to do.
success.author: Lights Poxlietner

success.quote: There is no tomorrow and there was no yesterday; if you truly want to accomplish your goals you must engulf yourself in today.
success.author: Noel DeJesus

success.quote: A life fueled by passions is like riding on the back of a dragon.
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: If failure has the strength to turn your life into bitterness itself, then patience has the strength to turn your life into the sweetest joy. Do not surrender to fate after a single failure. Failure, at most, precedes success.
success.author: Sri Chinmoy

success.quote: Rise to the challenge of bringing your dreams to life! Do not be discouraged by resistance, be nourished by it. Success is the experience of rising to the level of your true greatness.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: You are likely to fall when you stop paddling your bicycle. Such is life. As long as you don’t give up, you will never end up failing!
success.author: Israelmore Ayivor

success.quote: They say you should know your limits and work within them. But how can you really know your limits unless you try to expand them?
success.author: Jonathan Cainer

success.quote: An average man is egoistic, proud and has strong self esteem. They always require partners who massage their ego not those who will drag their ego to the mud.
success.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

success.quote: Integrity is a powerful force, keeping you alive to others long after you’ve left their presence.
success.author: Mollie Marti

success.quote: Once you bid farewell to discipline you say goodbye to success
success.author: Alex Ferguson

success.quote: Becoming well known (at least among your prospects & connections) is the most valuable element in the connection process.
success.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

success.quote: Rich people have small TVs and big libraries, and poor people have small libraries and big TVs.
success.author: Zig Ziglar

success.quote: Success is a state of mind. If you want success, start thinking of yourself as a success.
success.author: Joyce Brothers

success.quote: My past has not defined me, destroyed me, deterred me, or defeated me; it has only strengthened me.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are. Failure is part of the process of success. People who avoid failure also avoid success.
success.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

success.quote: Plant seeds of happiness, hope, success, and love; it will all come back to you in abundance. This is the law of nature.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: You were put on this earth to achieve your greatest self, to live out your purpose, and to do it courageously.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: The good news is that the moment you decide that what you know is more important than what you have been taught to believe, you will have shifted gears in your quest for abundance. Success comes from within, not from without.
success.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

success.quote: Success is determined not by whether or not you face obstacles, but by your reaction to them. And if you look at these obstacles as a containing fence, they become your excuse for failure. If you look at them as a hurdle, each one strengthens you for the next.
success.author: Ben Carson

success.quote: Successful people have no fear of failure. But unsuccessful people do. Successful people have the resilience to face up to failure—learn the lessons and adapt from it.
success.author: Roy T. Bennett

success.quote: If you care about what you do and work hard at it, there isn't anything you can't do if you want to.
success.author: Jim Henson

success.quote: It is impossible to escape the impression that people commonly use false standards of measurement — that they seek power, success and wealth for themselves and admire them in others, and that they underestimate what is of true value in life.
success.author: Sigmund Freud

success.quote: Spending time with God is the key to our strength and success in all areas of life. Be sure that you never try to work God into your schedule, but always work your schedule around Him.
success.author: Joyce Meyer

success.quote: When you take risks you learn that there will be times when you succeed and there will be times when you fail, and both are equally important.
success.author: Ellen DeGeneres

success.quote: Understanding the difference between healthy striving and perfectionism is critical to laying down the shield and picking up your life. Research shows that perfectionism hampers success. In fact, it's often the path to depression, anxiety, addiction, and life paralysis.
success.author: Brené Brown

success.quote: People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing.
success.author: Dale Carnegie

success.quote: Great Leaders Create More LeadersGood leaders have vision and inspire others to help them turn vision into reality. Great leaders create more leaders, not followers. Great leaders have vision, share vision, and inspire others to create their own.
success.author: Roy T. Bennett

success.quote: If at first you don't succeed, destroy all evidence that you tried.
success.author: Steven Wright

success.quote: Fortune sides with him who dares.
success.author: Virgil

success.quote: To be independent of public opinion is the first formal condition of achieving anything great.
success.author: HEGEL

success.quote: Possessions, outward success, publicity, luxury - to me these have always been contemptible. I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best for both the body and the mind.
success.author: Albert Einstein

success.quote: Success, after all, loves a witness, but failure can't exist without one.
success.author: Junot Díaz

success.quote: Don't blow off another's candle for it won't make yours shine brighter.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Failures are the stairs we climb to reach success.
success.author: Roy T. Bennett

success.quote: The harder you fall, the heavier your heart; the heavier your heart, the stronger you climb; the stronger you climb, the higher your pedestal.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: Be an Encourager: When you encourage others, you boost their self-esteem, enhance their self-confidence, make them work harder, lift their spirits and make them successful in their endeavors. Encouragement goes straight to the heart and is always available. Be an encourager. Always.
success.author: Roy T. Bennett

success.quote: I advise you to stop sharing your dreams with people who try to hold you back, even if they're your parents. Because, if you're the kind of person who senses there's something out there for you beyond whatever it is you're expected to do - if you want to be EXTRA-ordinary- you will not get there by hanging around a bunch of people who tell you you're not extraordinary. Instead, you will probablybecome as ordinary as they expect you to be.
success.author: Kelly Cutrone

success.quote: Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: Happiness is part of who we are. Joy is the feeling
success.author: Tony DeLiso

success.quote: To be successful you need friends and to be very successful you need enemies.
success.author: Sidney Sheldon

success.quote: The only real battle in life is between hanging on and letting go.
success.author: Shannon L. Alder

success.quote: We set out to save the Shire, Sam and it has been saved - but not for me.
success.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

success.quote: Sky is not a limit for me; because I have no limit for myself in life. Because life is a world full of risk taking and possibilities. No matter how hard or easy life is; I will always find a way to enjoy myself; even in the mist of circumstances; because problems is a sense of adventure in sheep's clothing.
success.author: Temitope Owosela

success.quote: Success is getting what you want; happiness is wanting what you get.
success.author: Ingrid Bergman

success.quote: Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely upon what you think. So start each day by thinking of all the things you have to be thankful for. Your future will depend very largely on the thoughts you think today. So think thoughts of hope and confidence and love and success.
success.author: Dale Carnegie

success.quote: Stop allowing your day-to-day life to be clouded by busy nothingness.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: At any given moment the choice to be happy is present- we just have to choose to be happy.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: The most critical time in any battle is not when I’m fatigued, it’s when I no longer care.
success.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

success.quote: Then what is good? The obsessive interest in human affairs, plus a certain amount of compassion and moral conviction, that first made the experience of living something that must be translated into pigment or music or bodily movement or poetry or prose or anything that's dynamic and expressivee--that's what's good for you if you're at all serious in your aims. William Saroyan wrote a great play on this theme, that purity of heart is the one success worth having. "In the time of your life--live!" That time is short and it doesn't return again. It is slipping away while I write this and while you read it, the monosyllable of the clock is Loss, loss, loss, unless you devote your heart to its opposition.
success.author: Tennessee Williams

success.quote: How many people you bless is how you measure success
success.author: Rick Ross

success.quote: Diligence is the mother of good fortune.
success.author: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra

success.quote: Stop lying to yourself. When we deny our own truth, we deny our own potential.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: ...If there is no risk, there is no reward.
success.author: Christy Raedeke

success.quote: Happiness simply cannot be relied upon as a measure of success.
success.author: John C. Maxwell

success.quote: Change is in the air. This change reminds us that we are made and beautifully sculpted by the same power that orchestrates the change of season. Let this be the season you embrace and align yourself with this change.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Participate in your own dreams, don’t just say what you want or complain about what you don’t have.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: أنا أخبئ بين أقفاص صدري أوجاع نساء الأرض ودموع الصغار ،أنا أحمل على عاتقي خيبات ثكلى !وفي حنجرتي تستقر حشرجة حزن مدوية ..أنا الأنثى التي تقام كل ليلة على مدائن قلبهامآتم الخذلان !وبالرغم من ذلك الأسى المفرط .. .تبتسم وتمضي دونما إكتراث !
success.author: نجلاء حسن

success.quote: No matter how good you get you can always get better, and that's the exciting part.
success.author: Tiger Woods

success.quote: Success ... seems to be connected with action. Successful men keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
success.author: Conrad Hilton

success.quote: When the actions becomes frequent than the words, success becomes heavier than the dreams. Do more, say less.
success.author: Israelmore Ayivor

success.quote: Chanel is an institution, and you have to treat an institution like a whore – and then you get something out of her
success.author: Karl Lagerfeld
