success.quote: Success is counted sweetestBy those who ne’er succeed.To comprehend a nectarRequires sorest need.
success.author: Emily Dickinson

success.quote: If life didn’t give you at least one person not wanting you to succeed then half of us would lose are motivation to climb that cliff, in order to prove them wrong.
success.author: Shannon Alder

success.quote: Excuses are merely nails used to build a house of failure.
success.author: Habeeb Akande

success.quote: Success and failure, ultimately, have little to do with living the gospel. Jesus just stood with the outcasts until they were welcomed or until he was crucified — whichever came first.
success.author: Gregory Boyle

success.quote: Before I ever knew what the word Entrepeneur was, I realized in America and in the Western part of the world in general, you are given the opportunity to be whatever you want to be. And that is all anyone should ever expect from the Capitalist system. The rest is up to you.It's up to you to educate yourself.It's up to you to learn speaking skills and people skills.It's up to you to try (and usually fail, but to try again) all sorts of ventures.The rest is a combination of hard work, being at the right place ...at the right time...with the right thing...oh yes...and more (never ending) hard work.
success.author: Gene Simmons

success.quote: Once you can write an alphabet, you can write a book of 100 million pages. It's just a matter of believing it as possible, and taking the cross millimetre by millimetre.
success.author: Israelmore Ayivor

success.quote: Busy with the ugliness of the expensive success We forget the easiness of free beautyLying sad right around the corner, Only an instant removed, Unnoticed and squandered.
success.author: Dejan Stojanovic

success.quote: I have some advice for the young generation who are wanting to become successful in life: become more grateful. Once you do that, Allah says, "If you are grateful, I will surely increase you (in everything)." If you're having a hard time in math, science, language and whatever else, become grateful to Allah and He will open doors for you. You'll even get better at basketball and become more athletic. I pray that Allah makes you grateful young people who are examples for others all over the world, ameen.
success.author: Nouman Ali Khan

success.quote: Some people will insult your intelligence by suddenly being nice or nicer to you once you make it … or they think you have.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: The lesson of Buffett was: To succeed in a spectacular fashion you had to be spectacularly unusual.
success.author: Michael Lewis

success.quote: Resistance is a powerful motivator precisely because it enables us to fulfill our longing to achieve our goals while letting us boldly recognize and name the obstacles to those achievements.
success.author: Derrick Bell

success.quote: If you want to be a successful runner, you have to consider everything. It's no good just thinking about endurance and not to develop fine speed.
success.author: Arthur Lydiard

success.quote: Those who keep sitting idle and waiting for miracles to happen cannot be a part of the process and hence, their ideas never get any closer to reality.
success.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

success.quote: I've always believed that one woman's success can only help another woman's success.
success.author: Gloria Vanderbilt

success.quote: Apply yourself. Get all the education you can, but then...do something. Don't just stand there, make it happen.
success.author: Lee Iacocca

success.quote: It is questionable, for that matter, whether success is an adequate response to life. Success can eliminate as many options as failure.
success.author: Tom Robbins

success.quote: Whoever is under a man's power is under his protection, too.
success.author: David Schwartz

success.quote: Enlightenment is like quantum tunneling - when everyone sees walls and barriers, enlightened one sees infinite possibilities.
success.author: Amit Ray

success.quote: As a child, at the age when others promise to be Chateaubriand or nothing, I had written that I would be myself or nothing. I had certainly not foreseen that one day I would find myself in the position of being both myself and nothing. 65
success.author: Marcel Benabou

success.quote: So here I am with this double life, one where my grammatically incorrect writing is a nice success with tens of thousands of readers, and another one where my carefully written books are read by a dozen people.
success.author: Christian A. Dumais

success.quote: ...at some point you need to stop looking out at others and start looking inward, at yourself, at your own accomplishments, at your own foibles, at your own successes and your own failures. It's only when you begin to look inward that you can begin to have an effect on those out there, the ones with the greedy eyes and outstretched hands.
success.author: Scott F. Falkner

success.quote: Actually, I'm an overnight success. But it took twenty years.
success.author: Monty Hall

success.quote: Os livros são escritos devido a anos virados do avesso por ideias que não nos libertam até serem escritas e, até mesmo então, a escrita é o último recurso, um resgate desesperado que pagamos para que a vida nos seja devolvida.
success.author: Richard Bach

success.quote: Anything worthy is worth the fight!
success.author: Besa Kosova

success.quote: It had evidently not occurred to her as yet that those who consent to share the bread of adversity may want the whole cake of prosperity for themselves.
success.author: Edith Wharton

success.quote: Success comes to those who hustle wisely.
success.author: K.A. Jordan

success.quote: Success is messy. But so is life. Deal with it. Poverty is messier.
success.author: James Arthur Ray

success.quote: Bukan doa orang lain yang membuat anda sukses atau gagal,tapi karena anda telah mengaminkannya, sadar atau tak sadar.
success.author: Toba Beta

success.quote: When you've succeeded, you'd say:'Indeed I'd to go through those hell before fit into all of this happiness.
success.author: Toba Beta

success.quote: The best way of handling astrological transits is to go with the flow. If the Universe is leading you to a certain place by hook or by crook, there’s probably a reason.
success.author: Cate East

success.quote: النجاح في الحياة ليس هو ما تنجزه لنفسك، أو تحصل عليه لشهواتك الخاصة، بل النجاح الحقيقي هو ما تنجزه للآخرين، ما يستفيد منه غيرك، لأن شهواتك زائلة، ولا أحد غيرك يذكرها، أما إنجازاتك للآخرين فإن العالم كله سيذكرها، وستصبح تاريخاً، فتاريخ البشرية هو تاريخ الأفعال المؤثرة على المجموع، لا تاريخ الأحداث الشخصية للفرد الواحد.
success.author: محمد الشموتى

success.quote: Even if yesterday was wildly successful, I still don’t want to repeat it. Rather, I want to build on it.
success.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

success.quote: Successful people play the part of being successful consistently in all that they do.
success.author: Lorii Myers

success.quote: I realized that success in most things depends on finding people stupid enough to volunteer to try doing them but smart enough to have a chance of succeeding.
success.author: Jack Campbell

success.quote: when you want to go up that mountain and everyone else around you is telling you that is too hard, and you’ll never going to make it, please listen to that small voice inside your heart and one day you will reach the mountain top
success.author: Manuel Corazzari

success.quote: I thank you for your time. I can’t say that I wish you success—as we all have our turns with it, after all. However, I will wish you peace, happiness, and enlightenment—things that not everyone, even the most powerful, is successful at having.
success.author: Cate East

success.quote: Stop Being Incremental! If your system no longer delivers the results you want, don’t go for incremental changes, instead go for complete transformation.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Good life is not a sprint. It’s an exerting marathon of purpose, passion, patience and perseverance. It’s the road where faith and hard work meet. It is an unusual love adventure between success and failure. It is where truth is a belt and integrity a shield. It is knowing your lane, staying on your lane and running your own race. It’s a road loathed and less traveled by most men.
success.author: Abiodun Fijabi

success.quote: Don't die before you're dead.
success.author: Pep Talk Radio

success.quote: It is easier for one to take risks and to chase his dreams with a mindset that he has nothing to lose. In this lies the immense passion, the great advantage of avoiding a materialistic, pleasure-filled way of life.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: It is easy to surpass a predecessor, but difficult to avoid being surpassed by a successor.
success.author: Eiji Yoshikawa

success.quote: Money. The ultimate motivation. The ultimate way of keeping score.
success.author: Michael Connelly

success.quote: Patience and persistence are the keys... The keys to unlock doors of success... With these two virtues, you grow in reasoning and experience.
success.author: Ogwo David Emenike

success.quote: Things get done only if the data we gather can inform and inspire those in a position to make difference.
success.author: Mike Schmoker

success.quote: Blame is the creed of the disempowered.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: The quest for a lost city erodes your body, damaging you beyond all reason. But it is your mind that bears the heaviest toll. Listen to the doubters, the worriers and the weak, and the vaguest hope of success evaporates.
success.author: Tahir Shah

success.quote: You can actually recreate your world with the Word of the Creator in your mouth.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Sometimes success is simply being willing to give it your all.
success.author: Amanda Beard

success.quote: If you want to continue to be the best in the world, then you have to train and compete like you are second best in the world.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: I am unique...I play by a different set of rules; I am not intimidated by anything.
success.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

success.quote: 100% of a Guru’s marketing plan depends on you holding the belief that you are not enough; that you were created less equipped than necessary to fulfill your purpose. What if you let go of that belief and connected with the truth of your innate power to change and shape your life? You ARE enough. You CAN change and shape your own life. Anyone who tells you different is simply lying. Your life has immeasurable potentiality for greatness; act accordingly.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Human beings have an extraordinary capacity to imagine possibilities and then turn those possibilities into realities. Evident in the gifts of civilization—in our arts, languages, sciences, technologies, businesses, governments, and so on—it is clear that we are a profoundly creative species. Yet many of us only access a smidgen of our creativity.
success.author: Scott Edmund Miller

success.quote: God is not ecstatic about the lack you are experiencing; He is not delightful over your failures, He is not happy about your stagnancy.
success.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

success.quote: Previous journeys in search of treasure have taught me that a zigzag strategy is the best way to get ahead.
success.author: Tahir Shah

success.quote: (Ulrich, 100 year old Bulgarian man): in Solo, by Rana Dasgupta"Ulrich has sometimes wondered whether his life has been a failure. Once he would have looked at all this and said yes. But now he does not know what it means for a life to succeed or fail. How can a dog fail its life, or a tree? A life is just a quantity; and he can no more see failure in it than he can see failure in a pile of earth, or a bucket of water. Failure and success are foreign terms to such blind matter." (p. 160)
success.author: Rana Dasgupta

success.quote: The way to achieve your goals is step by step, you just need to build enough track, to be ahead of the train." ~ John Milton Lawrence
success.author: John Milton Lawrence

success.quote: Knowledge is very vital in life`s transformation and transition
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: I felt sure we could gain the upper hand by putting ourselves in the mindset of the Incas.
success.author: Tahir Shah

success.quote: Try to turn as many soft, aspirational goals as possible into success criteria, and make them specific enough that you can actually tell whether or not you've met them.
success.author: Erin Kissane

success.quote: Yes, all you need do is to change your orientation and have faith in the Lord Jesus Christ that He can make you whole, change your status, and add value to your destiny.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Your world of poverty can be recreated to that of affluence simply by speaking the Prince's language.
success.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

success.quote: Life will be a whole lot better if we understand what our salvation in Christ means.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Dining with the King; your attire, attitude and mentality must change.
success.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

success.quote: Set out time to worship God in your closet, give Him quality praise and watch Him raise you.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: your right standing with God and your connection to Him remains your strongest defense in the day of calamity.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: When the Prince comes into your life, you will stop thinking and start reasoning.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Being poor in the Spirit means you are humble, gentle, meek, God-fearing,kind and exhibit the fruits of the Spirit but being Spiritually poor is lacking in every thing that pertains to life and godliness.
success.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

success.quote: Options abound in our world. You can choose where to stay and how to stay there. Where you are Today is as a result of the option you took yesterday and no doubt where you will be Tomorrow is embedded in your option Today. Choose right; choose wisely, Take THE BEST OPTION. The Best Option will deliver your inheritance to you. It will change your state and deliver to you, your brand new estate. You do not blame anyone for failing to do it right the first time. You accept the blame. The Best Option will cause you to get it right the first time and always.
success.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

success.quote: He would never again need anything from his mother and father but their love.
success.author: Frederick Drimmer

success.quote: We do not live to think, but, on the contrary, we think in order that we may succeed in surviving.
success.author: José Ortega y Gasset

success.quote: Two types of choices seem to me to have been crucial in tipping the outcomes [of the various societies' histories] towards success or failure: long-term planning and willingness to reconsider core values. On reflection we can also recognize the crucial role of these same two choices for the outcomes of our individual lives.
success.author: Jared Diamond

success.quote: ‎Determination, effort, and practice are rewarded with success.
success.author: Mary Lydon Simonsen

success.quote: Erase self-doubt by working to build your strengths instead of focusing on your weaknesses.
success.author: Rodolfo Costa

success.quote: Strength and success - they are above morality, above criticism. It seems, then, that it is not what you do, but how you do it and what you call it. Is there a check in men, deep in them, that stops or punishes? There doesn't seem to be. The only punishment is for failure. In effect no crime is committed unless a criminal is caught.
success.author: John Steinbeck

success.quote: Whoever submits himself to a super-discipline can expect great triumphs.
success.author: Samael Aun Weor

success.quote: It was ironic, but when you scratched the surface, most successful men were working for one thing only--to retire--and the sooner the better. Whereas women were the complete opposite. She had never heard a woman say she was working so she could retire to a desert island or to live on a boat. It was probably, she thought, because most women didn't think they deserved to do nothing.
success.author: Candace Bushnell

success.quote: Success nullifies. You then have to do it again, preferably differently
success.author: Karl Lagerfeld

success.quote: When you’re busy, avoid taking the quickest action. Instead make the extra effort to truly serve the customer.
success.author: Marilyn Suttle

success.quote: If you are a success in life, there are places you must go and pay to be humiliated. It is an unwritten law that human beings must be tormented throughout their lives in one way or another. If you are fortunate enough to have risen to a social level where no one does it to you for free, then you must pay for the service.
success.author: Jonathan Carroll

success.quote: It’s a shame how much artists have to bleed for people to enjoy their work.
success.author: Solange nicole

success.quote: In Paris, where raillery is so quick to throw emotion out the window, silence, in a roomful of clever people after a story, is the most flattering of all marks of success
success.author: Jules Barbey d'Aurevilly

success.quote: The futility of action does not absolve one from the failure to act. -
success.author: Janette Turner Hospital

success.quote: Success is more a function of consistent common sense than it is of genius.
success.author: An Wang

success.quote: Success for a woman means absolute surrender, in whatever direction. Whether she paints a picture, or loves a man, there is no division of labor possible in her economy. To the attainment of any end worth living for, a symmetrical sacrifice of her nature is compulsory upon her.
success.author: Elizabeth Stuart Phelps

success.quote: Success certainly isn’t achievement of popularity. Success in God’s kingdom is loving God, loving one another, and being faithful to what He’s called us to do.
success.author: Gabriel Wilson

success.quote: It's not so much what you accomplish. But what's more important is how far you've come to accomplish what you have.Success is the measure of not mere achievement, but also how hard one had to work.
success.author: Therone Shellman

success.quote: The goal of retirement is to live off your assets-not on them
success.author: Frank Eberhart

success.quote: the old maxim... "there are three things necessary to success in life--Impudence! Impudence! Impudence!
success.author: william hazlitt

success.quote: The way to be nothing is to do nothing
success.author: Nathaniel Howe

success.quote: Do an evening review at the end of the day to reflect on what went well, and what you'd do differently next time.
success.author: Marilyn Suttle

success.quote: Sharing your success with others reveals your true humanity. Don't ever be afraid to open your heart to that practice. It has made all the world of difference to me.
success.author: Andrea Michaels

success.quote: The person who makes a success of living is the one who sees his goal steadily and aims for it unswervingly. That is dedication.
success.author: Cecil B. DeMille

success.quote: Ideas and philosophies have a shelf-life. They must be kept fresh and renewed or they will spoil. If left unattended, the same ideas and philosophies that once nourished you and helped you grow can poison you and make you sick. Become aware of new ideas that can refresh your way of life and be open to the fact that your old ideas and philosophies can work for you for some time, but when the shelf-life has passed, those ideas and philosophies could also harm you.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: hard work + smart work = eye caching success, shortcut is not ever
success.author: Chiranjit Paul

success.quote: You have had many successes, and you have earned the right to be respected.
success.author: Lorii Myers

success.quote: I am learning, and I believe I shall do quite well.
success.author: Shannon Drake

success.quote: One person's success doesn't take away from your own.
success.author: Jeremy Piven

success.quote: [T]he concern of man is not his future but his present, not the world but his soul. We must be just, we must strive, we must engage ourselves with the business of the world for our own sake, because through that, and through contemplation in equal measure, our soul is purified and brought closer to the divine. ... Thought and deed conjoined are crucial. ... The attempt must be made; the outcome is irrelevant. Right action is a pale material reflection of the divine, but reflection it is, nonetheless. Define your goal and exert reason to accomplish it by virtuous action; successs or failure is secondary.
success.author: Iain Pears

success.quote: To be successful, you must decide exactly what you want to accomplish, then resolve to pay the price to get it.
success.author: Bunker Hunt

success.quote: If you are not the hero of your own story, then you're missing the whole point of your humanity.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Life always begins with one step outside of your comfort zone.
success.author: Shannon L. Alder

success.quote: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funnybone.
success.author: Reba McEntire

success.quote: Sometimes it is good to be in uncomfortable situations because it is in finding our way out of such difficulties that we learn valuable lessons.
success.author: Idowu Koyenikan

success.quote: Acquiring wisdom is great but it is not the goal, applying it is.
success.author: idowu koyenikan

success.quote: Whosoever desires constant success must change his conduct with the times.
success.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

success.quote: Integrity is doing what is right and truthful, and doing as you say you would do.
success.author: Roy T. Bennett

success.quote: You have a unique gift to offer this world. Be true to yourself, be kind to yourself, read and learn about everything that interests you and keep away from people who bring you down. When you treat yourself kindly and respect the uniqueness of those around you, you will be giving this world an amazing gift... YOU!
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Judgment is a negative frequency.
success.author: Stephen Richards

success.quote: It's failure that gives you the proper perspective on success.
success.author: Ellen DeGeneres

success.quote: People don't need love. What they need is success in one form or another. It can be love but it needn't be.
success.author: Charles Bukowski

success.quote: Edit your life frequently and ruthlessly. It's your masterpiece after all.
success.author: Nathan W. Morris

success.quote: There is strange comfort in knowing that no matter what happens today, the Sun will rise again tomorrow.
success.author: Aaron Lauritsen

success.quote: Act as if! Act as if you're a wealthy man, rich already, and then you'll surely become rich. Act as if you have unmatched confidence and then people will surely have confidence in you. Act as if you have unmatched experience and then people will follow your advice. And act as if you are already a tremendous success, and as sure as I stand here today - you will become successful.
success.author: Jordan Belfort

success.quote: A quitter never wins-and-a winner never quits.
success.author: Napoleon Hill

success.quote: No matter what your history has been, your destiny is what you create today. What are you going to create?
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Every single time you help somebody stand up you are helping humanity rise.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: There are going to be times when you learn more about the world you’re entering and feel defeated when you see the gap between the ideal and the reality… But that’s something we’ll all face. The people that face those obstacles and overcome them are people whose dreams come true.
success.author: Tsugumi Ohba

success.quote: You’re frustrated because you keep waiting for the blooming of flowers of which you have yet to sow the seeds.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Before you can successfully make friends with others, first you have to become your own friend.
success.author: Stephen Richards

success.quote: When you are living the best version of yourself, you inspire others to live the best versions of themselves.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: No matter how small you start, always dream big.
success.author: Stephen Richards

success.quote: To get what you want, you have to deserve what you want. The world is not yet a crazy enough place to reward a whole bunch ofundeserving people.
success.author: Charles T. Munger

success.quote: I do not like to repeat successes I like to go on to other things.
success.author: Walt Disney

success.quote: Become the leader of your life. Lead yourself to where you want to be. Breathe life back into your ambitions, your desires, your goals, your relationships.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it’s determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
success.author: Mario Andretti

success.quote: There are no secrets to success: don’t waste time looking for them. Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty to those for whom you work, and persistence.
success.author: Colin Powell

success.quote: Last night as I was sleeping, I dreamt --O, marvelous error -- That there was a beehive here inside my heartAnd the golden bees were making white combsAnd sweet honey from all my failures.
success.author: Antonio Machado

success.quote: Sure it could get rough sometimes, but life wasn't a Hollywood movie. Shit happened. You fought, you screamed, and somehow you worked like hell to get out the other side still intact.
success.author: Samantha Young

success.quote: REMEMBER YOUR GREATNESSBefore you were born,And were still too tiny forThe human eye to see,You won the race for lifeFrom among 250 million competitors.And yet,How fast you have forgottenYour strength,When your very existenceIs proof of your greatness.You were born a winner,A warrior,One who defied the oddsBy surviving the most gruesomeBattle of them all.And now that you are a giant,Why do you even doubt victoryAgainst smaller numbers,And wider margins?The only walls that exist,Are those you have placed in your mind.And whatever obstacles you conceive,Exist only because you have forgottenWhat you have alreadyAchieved.Poetry by Suzy Kassem
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: One does not have to be a philosopher to be a successful artist, but he does have to be an artist to be a successful philosopher. His nature is to view the world in an unpredictable albeit useful light.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: Have nuts and be nuts.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: WINNER:is A Runner who "Wins Inspite Of Ninety Nine ExcellentRunners!
success.author: Sujit Lalwani

success.quote: This just gets worse and worse," Rob Pierre sighed as he skimmed Leonard Boardman's synopsis of his latest gleanings from the Solarian League reporters covering the PRH. "How can one person—one person, Oscar!—do this much damage? She's like some damned elemental force of nature!"Harrington?" Oscar Saint-Just quirked an eyebrow and snorted harshly at Pierre's nodded confirmation."She's just happened to be in the right places—or the wrong ones, I suppose, from our perspective—for the last, oh, ten years or so. That's the official consensus from my analysts, at least. The other theory, which seems to have been gaining a broader following of late, is that she's in league with the Devil.
success.author: David Weber

success.quote: COMPETITOR is one who can steal a few deals, but, the pinch of which, A VISIONARY Never feels...!
success.author: Sujit Lalwani

success.quote: Giving is the master key to success, in all applications of human life.
success.author: Bryant McGill

success.quote: Some of you may be perfectly happy with mediocrity. Some of you will get nothing but heartbreak. Some of you will be heralded as geniuses and become huge. Of course, all of you think that one describes you...hence the delusion necessary to push on.
success.author: Marc Maron

success.quote: The harder you work, the luckier you are, and I worked like hell.
success.author: Gerald Ford

success.quote: Let All Your Life’s Experiences Lead To More Writing & Encourage More Reading..!
success.author: Sujit Lalwani

success.quote: When every minute of your day is planned & you are packed for days, you shall soon realize that the pain of past fades, vision of life gets clearer and all that seemed to poison your life Ceases to exist.
success.author: Sujit Lalwani

success.quote: No matter how loud the sirens or how numerous the hazard signs, we all touch the flames at least once to prove they're hot.
success.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

success.quote: There is a funny story I always tell my students...when I came for the first time to the US. I didn’t speak English (Only Spanish) & I saw on every door the word "exit" which in Spanish means Success = Exito. And then I said :"No wonder Americans are winners ,every door they take leads to success" ~smile :)
success.author: Pablo

success.quote: Success comes to us when we have a burning desire to achieve and we focus our full power on achieving that.
success.author: Sakshi Chetana

success.quote: Failure has its successes.
success.author: Brian  Howard

success.quote: You mark and celebrate errors, transforming failures into successes.
success.author: Dejan Stojanovic

success.quote: Result of HARDWORK Is Neither Friends Nor Enemy,To the AGE Of the ACHIEVER!
success.author: Sujit Lalwani

success.quote: I've never considered the possibility of defeat. I've never planned for it. That's the job for those people who plan for such things. My job is to only plan for success...victory; it has my complete focus.
success.author: Spuds Crawford

success.quote: Success is Never Ending, Failure Is Never Final.
success.author: Dr. Robert Schuller

success.quote: Everybody achieves success in life—a blessed few early in their careers, the rest of us when we lower our standards
success.author: Dag Ekeberg

success.quote: I shall not dwell in the past...I shall not dread the present...I shall not fear the Future...For as Long as I live...I shall only think of success.
success.author: Oscar Trejo Jr.

success.quote: Success is not the end of the journey. It is the beginning of the expression of your infinite potential.
success.author: Sakshi Chetana

success.quote: We must thank to all the failed people in the history as they showed us the true way to success!
success.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

success.quote: There are more triumphs than defeats with Cosmic Ordering.
success.author: Stephen Richards

success.quote: To fail is nothing, unless you continue to ignore Cosmic Ordering.
success.author: Stephen Richards

success.quote: Nothing is impossible, Everything should be possible when we trying for achieve the goal
success.author: Sanjeev Murukan

success.quote: Often the only difference between success and failure is not using Cosmic Ordering.
success.author: Stephen Richards

success.quote: Be as successful as a Smith.
success.author: Gregory C Dugger

success.quote: Success is not only a goal. It is a journey. When you commit yourself to the journey, the goal is surely there to be attained.
success.author: Sakshi Chetana

success.quote: Success will not come to you like a baby who came to his mother
success.author: Isra

success.quote: If you say you can't, you won't!The only thing holding you back from success is yourself.
success.author: Jody Provost

success.quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise
success.author: Oscar Wilde

success.quote: Judging is preventing us from understanding a new truth. Free yourself from the rules of old judgments and create the space for new understanding.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Fear can only grow in darkness. Once you face fear with light, you win.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.
success.author: Bruce Feirstein

success.quote: Your life is a print-out of your thoughts.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Are you going to allow the world around you to change while you remain stagnant? Make this the time you throw away old habits that have hindered your happiness and success and finally allow your greatest self to flourish.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: How would your life be different if…You pretended those around you were deaf to your words? Let today be the day…You let your actions speak and communicate your feelings and intentions.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Don't be afraid of failure. This is the way to succeed.
success.author: LeBron James

success.quote: Life itself is simple...it's just not easy.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: I cannot say this too strongly: Do not compare yourselves to others. Be true to who you are, and continue to learn with all your might.
success.author: Daisaku Ikeda

success.quote: You are where you are right now because of the actions you've taken, or maybe, the inaction you've taken.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: With one day's reading a man may have the key in his hands.
success.author: Ezra Pound

success.quote: Your life begins to change the day you take responsibility for it.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: There is absolutely no greater high than challenging the power structure as a nobody, giving it your all, and winning!
success.author: Abbie Hoffman

success.quote: You will find the key to success under the alarm clock.
success.author: Benjamin Franklin

success.quote: If you don’t know exactly where you’re going, how will you know when you get there?
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: God’s word is not just to be heard and repeated, it is to be breathed, lived, and emulated with each action.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Life's trials will test you, and shape you, but don’t let them change who you are."~ Aaron Lauritsen, ‘100 Days Drive
success.author: Aaron Lauritsen

success.quote: Life is a balanced system of learning and evolution. Whether pleasure or pain; every situation in your life serves a purpose. It is up to us to recognize what that purpose could be.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: You are in danger of living a life so comfortable and soft, that you will die without ever realizing your true potential.
success.author: David Goggins

success.quote: Sometimes not getting what you want is a brilliant stroke of luck.
success.author: Lorii Myers

success.quote: Sometimes success demands a certain refined insanity.
success.author: Isobelle Carmody

success.quote: If you want to give yourself a fair chance to succeed, never expect too much too soon
success.author: Po Bronson

success.quote: As naturally as the ruled always took the morality imposed upon them more seriously than did the rulers themselves, the deceived masses are today captivated by the myth of success even more than the successful are. Immovably, they insist on the very ideology which enslaves them. The misplaced love of the common people for the wrong which is done to them is a greater force than the cunning of the authorities.
success.author: Theodor Adorno

success.quote: Flaming enthusiasm, backed by horse sense and persistence, is the quality that most frequently makes for success.
success.author: Dale Carnegie

success.quote: The problem for a lot of people is that they don't really know what they want. They have vague desire: to 'do something creative' or to earn more money or 'to be free', but they can't really pin down what it is precisely that they want. So they drift from one thing to another, enjoying some moments and hating others, but never really finding fulfillment or success. (..)This is why it's hard to lead a successful life (whatever that means to you) when you don't know what you want.
success.author: John C. Parkin

success.quote: One of the most healing things you can do is recognize where in your life you are your own poison.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: I think for anyone to become good at something, they have to fail a lot too. And they have to be completely unafraid to fail or they'll never make it to the next level.
success.author: Amy Schumer

success.quote: With ordinary talent and extraordinary perseverance, all things are attainable
success.author: Thomas Fowell Buxton

success.quote: Small good decisions will lead you to the glorious path of success.
success.author: Zain Hashmi

success.quote: The roughest roads often lead to the top.
success.author: Christina Aguilera

success.quote: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don’t try.
success.author: Beverly Sills

success.quote: You don't have to get a job that makes others feel comfortable about what they perceive as your success. You don't have to explain what your plan to do with your life. You don't have to justify your education by demonstrating its financial rewards. You don't have to maintain an impeccable credit score. Anyone who expects you to do any of those things has no sense of history of economics or science or the arts.
success.author: Cheryl Strayed

success.quote: The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.
success.author: Will Rogers

success.quote: It’s a lack of clarity that creates chaos and frustration. Those emotions are poison to any living goal.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: When emerging from humble beginnings, those around you tend to underestimate your authenticity because they knew you before you were 'somebody'.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one's destiny to do, and then do it.
success.author: Henry Ford

success.quote: The struggles we endure today will be the ‘good old days’ we laugh about tomorrow.
success.author: Aaron Lauritsen

success.quote: Stop blaming outside circumstances for your inside chaos.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Opinions are the cheapest commodities on earth. Everyone has a flock of opinions ready to be wished upon anyone who will accept them. If you are influenced by "opinions" when you reach DECISIONS, you will not succeed in any undertaking.
success.author: Napoleon Hill

success.quote: You rarely win, but sometimes you do.
success.author: Harper Lee

success.quote: Early success is a terrible teacher. You're essentially being rewarded for a lack of preparation, so when you find yourself in a situation where you must prepare, you can't do it. You don't know how.
success.author: Chris Hadfield

success.quote: When God takes out the trash, don't go digging back through it. Trust Him.
success.author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana

success.quote: What do you mean I have to wait for someone's approval?  I'm someone.  I approve.  So I give myself permission to move forward with my full support!
success.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

success.quote: Our business in life is not to succeed, but to continue to fail in good spirits.
success.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

success.quote: The bird dares to break the shell, then the shell breaks open and the bird can fly openly. This is the simplest principle of success. You dream, you dare and and you fly.
success.author: Israelmore Ayivor

success.quote: Successful people enjoy the journeys they embark on, irrespective of whether they reach their destination or not.
success.author: Zain Hashmi

success.quote: Nearly' only counts in horseshoes and hand-grenades.
success.author: Neil Gaiman

success.quote: You have succeeded in life when all you really WANT is only what you really NEED.
success.author: Vernon Howard

success.quote: You make mistakes, mistakes don't make you
success.author: Maxwell Maltz

success.quote: When you fail, that is when you get closer to success.
success.author: Stephen Richards

success.quote: Never run from the enemy, tackle them
success.author: Victoria Addino

success.quote: Sure I am this day we are masters of our fate, that the task which has been set before us is not above our strength; that its pangs and toils are not beyond our endurance. As long as we have faith in our own cause and an unconquerable will to win, victory will not be denied us.
success.author: Winston S. Churchill

success.quote: There is only one success-to be able to spend life in your own way.
success.author: Christopher Morley

success.quote: Doing the tough things sets winners apart from losers.
success.author: Stephen Richards

success.quote: ولو إستطعت أن أعود بعجلة الزمان إلى الوراء ،لما إخترتك لي عاشقاً !ولأبقيتك عابراً غريباً يزور مدائني دون أن يحدث بداخلي أي ضجيج !
success.author: نجلاء حسن

success.quote: Whole life is a search for beauty. But, when the beauty is found inside, the search ends and a beautiful journey begins.
success.author: Harshit Walia

success.quote: Failure is an opportunity.If you blame someone else,there is no end to the blame.Therefore the Masterfulfills her own obligationsand corrects her own mistakes.She does what she needs to doand demands nothing of others.
success.author: Lao Tzu

success.quote: No guts, no story.
success.author: Chris Brady

success.quote: Make the choice to embrace this day. Do not let your TODAY be stolen by the ghost of yesterday or the "To-Do" list of tomorrow! It’s inspiring to see all the wonderfully amazing things that can happen in a day in which you participate.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
success.author: Woody Allen

success.quote: Persistence. Perfection. Patience. Power. Prioritize your passion. It keeps you sane.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: We do not get to choose how we start out in life. We do not get to choose the day we are born or the family we are born into, what we are named at birth, what country we are born in, and we do not get to choose our ancestry. All these things are predetermined by a higher power. By the time you are old enough to start making decisions for yourself, a lot of things in your life are already in place. It’s important, therefore, that you focus on the future, the only thing that you can change.
success.author: Idowu Koyenikan

success.quote: Those with a grateful mindset tend to see the message in the mess. And even though life may knock them down, the grateful find reasons, if even small ones, to get up.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Whenever I am in a difficult situation where there seems to be no way out, I think about all the times I have been in such situations and say to myself, "I did it before, so I can do it again.
success.author: Idowu Koyenikan

success.quote: Before success comes in any man’s life, he is sure to meet with much temporary defeat, and, perhaps, some failure. When defeat overtakes a man, the easiest and most logical thing to do is to quit. That is exactly what the majority of men do. More than five hundred of the most successful men this country has ever known told the author their greatest success came just one step beyond the point at which defeat had overtaken them.
success.author: Napoleon Hill

success.quote: Accepting oneself does not preclude an attempt to become better.
success.author: Flannery O'Connor

success.quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
success.author: Michael Jordan

success.quote: Success comes from the inside out. In order to change what is on the outside, you must first change what is on the inside.
success.author: Idowu Koyenikan

success.quote: Don’t let mental blocks control you. Set yourself free. Confront your fear and turn the mental blocks into building blocks.
success.author: Dr Roopleen

success.quote: There is great change to be experienced once you learn the power of letting go. Stop allowing anyone or anything to control, limit, repress, or discourage you from being your true self! Today is YOURS to shape - own it - break free from people and things that poison or dilute your spirit.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: I want to do it because I want to do it. Women must try to do things as men have tried. When they fail, their failure must be but a challenge to others.
success.author: Amelia Earhart

success.quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: But if you forgive someone for something they did to you, it doesn’t mean you agree with what they did or believe it was right. Forgiving that person means you have chosen not to dwell on the matter anymore; you have moved on with your life.
success.author: Idowu Koyenikan

success.quote: There is no failure except in no longer trying.
success.author: Elbert Hubbard

success.quote: Success is a little like wrestling a gorilla. You don't quit when you're tired. You quit when the gorilla is tired.
success.author: Robert Strauss

success.quote: Failure is constructive feedback that tells you to try a different approach to accomplish what you want.
success.author: Idowu Koyenikan

success.quote: At the end, someone or something always gives up. It is either you give up and quit or the obstacle or failure gives up and makes way for your success to come through.
success.author: Idowu Koyenikan

success.quote: The money you make is a symbol of the value you create.
success.author: Idowu Koyenikan

success.quote: There are many aspects to success; material wealth is only one component. ...But success also includes good health, energy and enthusiasm for life, fulfilling relationships, creative freedom, emotional and psychological stability, a sense of well-being, and peace of mind.
success.author: Deepak Chopra

success.quote: It takes nothing to stay in poverty, but everything to break free from it.
success.author: Idowu Koyenikan

success.quote: There is no progress or accomplishment without sacrifice.
success.author: Idowu Koyenikan

success.quote: To dream of success is to set a goal of where you want to be; to wake up, take action, and achieve it is what true success is all about.
success.author: Idowu Koyenikan

success.quote: All the time you're saying to yourself, 'I could do that, but I won't,' — which is just another way of saying that you can't.
success.author: Richard P. Feynman

success.quote: You may be the only person left who believes in you, but it's enough. It takes just one star to pierce a universe of darkness. Never give up.
success.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

success.quote: Missing a train is only painful if you run after it! Likewise, not matching the idea of success others expect from you is only painful if that’s what you are seeking.
success.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

success.quote: If you’re in the luckiest one per cent of humanity, you owe it to the rest of humanity to think about the other 99 per cent.
success.author: Warren Buffett

success.quote: Having a low opinion of yourself is not 'modesty.' It's self-destruction. Holding your uniqueness in high regard is not 'egotism.' It's a necessary precondition to happiness and success.
success.author: Bobbe Sommer

success.quote: Our way of thinking creates good or bad outcomes.
success.author: Stephen Richards

success.quote: Strike the shepherd and the sheep will scatter
success.author: Robert Greene

success.quote: There are three types of people in this world. Firstly, there are people who make things happen. Then there are people who watch things happen. Lastly, there are people who ask, what happened? Which do you want to be?
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Too often, people get stuck in a state of over-thinking, the result is that they never reach a decision.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Compete like you cannot fail.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: The first step is the most important. It is the most crucial and the most effective as it will initiate the direction you have chosen.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: If not now, when?
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: If obstacles are large, jump higher.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Act like a champion, and then become one.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Look for solutions, instead of being difficult; be more thoughtful, instead of allowing anger to burn you out. Look at things from a different perspective, embrace change, look out for opportunities and you will feel much more in control.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: It is action that creates motivation.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Share your aspirations only with those who will support you, not those who will respond with doubt or lack of interest.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: If you remain static and wait for success to come to you it will certainly not happen.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: The challenge for you is to decide not what is important, but what is most important and then focus your attention on that.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Your current apathy is simply your soul telling you that it is confused.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: When you think a positive thought, you become positive.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: It is one thing to know what should be done, it is another to do it.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Do you want to know what one of the secrets to achieving all of your goals is? You’ve got to be committed.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: If not you, who?
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Nothing could be any worse than having to turn to your friends, your colleagues and your loved ones and say –‘I gave up too soon’.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: The people and successes in your life mirror your beliefs.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Success is simply never giving in to failure - either in mind or body.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Mix with positive-minded people as a means to tap into your unexploited potential.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Tell me your thinking, and I’ll tell you what your life looks like.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Success is virulent. Once you get the bug then it’s in you.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: The only test is what you see when you look in a mirror.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: It is true to say that the secret of a winning formula is the ability to accept that there is a vast area of unexploited potential beyond what you currently perceive to be your maximum.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: See it, feel it, trust it!
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: You have to create your self-belief by going to your core to find the probable reasons for the negativity in you, and then demolish them.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: If you are able to focus unswervingly on your goals, then all that you desire will become yours.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Just identify the very first physical action you need to take, and do it.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: The sprint is like life ... blink and you miss it.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Your employees play an important role in writing the chapter on the success of your product.
success.author: Pooja Agnihotri

success.quote: You need to stand out in the crowd and be unique. This is the only way that can lead you to success.
success.author: Pooja Agnihotri

success.quote: In the end, all we have to do is to be in the shoes of our audience and our product will hardly fail.
success.author: Pooja Agnihotri

success.quote: If you want to succeed and leave your competitors behind, you need great plans and even greater strategies.
success.author: Pooja Agnihotri

success.quote: The more you plan, the more you will know the likelihood of your idea is successful, the time needed for that, and the other resources required.
success.author: Pooja Agnihotri

success.quote: We forget many times, but changes are not threatening as they are the only way to move forward.
success.author: Pooja Agnihotri

success.quote: Our success is determined by how many people we are able to help solve a problem, or helping others to improve the level and quality of their life.
success.author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

success.quote: For me, failure is just part of the game, even though I don’t like it.
success.author: Sijin Bt

success.quote: The majority fail to realize their dreams, not due to failed attempts; but due to ‘failing to attempt’ because of disgusting feedbacks.
success.author: Sijin Bt

success.quote: Success inspired confidence; confidence produced success.
success.author: Daniel Z. Lieberman

success.quote: Patience is not a virtue, it’s a waste of time. I lived by the golden rule of practicing patience as a virtue and wasted so much time waiting for it to pay off. Very often it was subtle persistence and more effort that led me to achieve my goals — don’t wait too for a long time for something to happen, go for it again if you feel like you’re at a halt.
success.author: Salman Jaberi

success.quote: Failure should motivate you to succeed.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Failure should force to seek to succeed.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: There are many shortcuts to success. These shortcuts will cut short the glory of your success.
success.author: Sijin Bt

success.quote: Failing to win is not a problem, but failing to try is the problem.
success.author: Sijin Bt

success.quote: There is a hero in every heart just waiting for ignition.
success.author: Sijin Bt

success.quote: Failing to win is not a problem, but failing to try is the problem
success.author: Sijin B T

success.quote: The mantra here is the more value you are going to create, the more profitable customer relationships you are going to build this the more successful your business is going to be.
success.author: Pooja Agnihotri

success.quote: The CREATER is GREATER; He that create is Great.
success.author: Jonah Takon

success.quote: What have I accomplished other than staying alive long enough to ask what I’ve accomplished. But is that, in fact, not an accomplishment?
success.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

success.quote: When we stick to our views and aren’t even willing to consider what others have to say, we lose an opportunity to grow and become better.
success.author: Pooja Agnihotri

success.quote: Own the lesson, not the loss.
success.author: SeKeithia Johnson

success.quote: Life begins when you start something, and blooms when you keep doing it.
success.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

success.quote: If you really know yourself, It is enough to live life to the fullest regardless of circumstances.
success.author: Shiva Negi

success.quote: The ultimate purpose of human life is to be free from the bondage of karma despite performing his duty.
success.author: Shiva Negi

success.quote: The highest vision of the soul lies in being united with God in every thought and action.
success.author: Shiva Negi

success.quote: True happiness and satisfaction comes from the attainment of self-knowledge.
success.author: Shiva Negi

success.quote: वह जो अपना कर्तव्य सही ज्ञान और भक्ति के साथ करता है वह उच्च चेतना के साथ भगवान को प्राप्त करता है।
success.author: Shiva Negi

success.quote: The one who performs his duty with the right knowledge and devotion attains God with higher consciousness.
success.author: Shiva Negi

success.quote: Life begins at the very moment of the Self-realization of God with higher consciousness.
success.author: Shiva Negi

success.quote: It is said we learn more from our failures than our successes.
success.author: Holly Black

success.quote: I will eliminate hatred, envy, jealousy, selfishness, and cynicism, by developing love for all humanity, because I know that a negative attitude toward others can never bring me success. I will cause others to believe in me, because I will believe in them, and in myself.
success.author: Napoleon Hill

success.quote: The secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
success.author: Benjamin Disraeli

success.quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
success.author: Dale Carnegie

success.quote: The way to wealth is as plain as the way to market. It depends chiefly on two words, industry and frugality: that is, waste neither time nor money, but make the best use of both. Without industry and frugality nothing will do, and with them everything.
success.author: Benjamin Franklin

success.quote: The road to success is always under construction.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: No matter how dim the light filtering through the trees is, you can still try your best to grasp it. -Kaien Cross
success.author: Matsuri Hino

success.quote: Those who achieve the extraordinary are usually the most ordinary because they have nothing to prove to anybody. Be Humble.
success.author: Aaron Lauritsen

success.quote: The difference between Success and failure is not giving up.
success.author: steven redhead

success.quote: إحدى يديه كانت منهمكة بالعبث في خصلات شعريوالأخرى كان ينفث بها سيجارته ،إلتقطتها منه بغضب وبإمتعاض ممقوتوهمست له : دعها تلك اللعينة فلن أسمح بأن تشاركني فيك !
success.author: نجلاء حسن

success.quote: If at first you don't succeed, remove all evidence you ever tried.
success.author: David Brent

success.quote: Do not get obsolete like an old technology, keep innovating yourself.
success.author: Sukant Ratnakar

success.quote: There's no talent here, this is hard work. This is an obsession. Talent does not exist, we are all equals as human beings. You could be anyone if you put in the time. You will reach the top, and that's that. I am not talented. I am obsessed.
success.author: Conor McGregor

success.quote: At some point, you just gotta forgive the past, your happiness hinges on it.
success.author: Aaron Lauritsen

success.quote: Explore, Experience, Then Push Beyond.
success.author: Aaron Lauritsen

success.quote: Success to me is being happy, truly fulfilled, being proud of myself, and doing different things all the time.
success.author: Leighton Meester

success.quote: In a situation of manipulation, the Left is almost always tempted by a "quick return to power," forgets the necessity of joining with the oppressed to forge an organization, and strays into an impossible "dialogue" with the dominant elites. It ends by being manipulated by these elites, and not infrequently itself falls in an elitist game, which it calls "realism."Manipulation, like the conquest whose objectives it serves, attempts to anesthetize the people so they will not think. For if the people join to their presence in the historical process critical thinking about that process, the threat of their emergence materializes in revolution…One of the methods of manipulation is to inoculate individuals with the bourgeois appetite for personal success. This manipulation is sometimes carried out directly by the elites and sometimes indirectly, through populist leaders.
success.author: Paulo Freire

success.quote: If at first you don't succeed, lower you expectations
success.author: Jonathan Tropper

success.quote: Now I know what success is: living your truth, sharing it.
success.author: Kamal Ravikant

success.quote: Great losses are great lessons.
success.author: Amit Kalantri

success.quote: * نجلاء .. نجلااااء ...نجلااااااااء ... .- الساعة الآن التاسعة صباحاً إنهضيوإنفضي عن وسادتكِ رذاذ الأحلام ،كان هذا صوتها أمي لتفيقني من ذاكالحلم الذي كنت أهذي به كل ليلة !تمنيت حينها لو أصيبت ذاكرتي بغيبوبة عنواقع لا يحتويه ،عن واقع لا يعانق وجوده !أفقت وكعادتي أمضي إلى طريق مجهولومسافات غريبة أحمل حقائب أحلاميوأجمع بها لوحاتي وأمل أتسكع بهعلى دهاليز مدينتي الباريسية !
success.author: نجلاء حسن

success.quote: Many people succeed when others do not believe in them. But rarely does a person succeed when he does not believe in himself.
success.author: Herb True

success.quote: The number of ways to live in one lifetime is limitless. So why limit yourself?
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: Prepare yourself for success. You have to see it coming to get there.
success.author: Destiny Booze

success.quote: But man's duty is to try and endeavour, success depends upon chance and environments.
success.author: Bhagat Singh

success.quote: Society functions in a way much more interesting than the multiple-choice pattern we have been rewarded for succeeding at in school. Success in life comes not from the ability to choose between the four presented answers, but from the rather more difficult and painfully acquired ability to formulate the questions.
success.author: David Mamet

success.quote: Never again will I underestimate the greatness inside of me just because of the hate and limited thinking inside of others.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: To Succeed, you must reach for the stars, and let your imagination find its own path
success.author: Tahir Shah

success.quote: We're all to driven by materialism. Obsessed with success. With money. With trying to impress people who'll never be impressed.
success.author: Sophie Kinsella

success.quote: Can I do it? I'd rather not try and fail."That's stupid talk, Maya. Every try will not succeed. But if you're going to live, live at all, your business is trying. And if you fail once, so what? Old folks say, Every shuteye ain't sleep and every goodbye ain't gone. You fail, you get up and try again.
success.author: Maya Angelou

success.quote: If you want to lead an extraordinary life, find out what the ordinary do–and don't do it.
success.author: Tommy Newberry

success.quote: The greater the loyalty of a group toward the group, the greater is the motivation among the members to achieve the goals of the group, and the greater the probability that the group will achieve its goals.
success.author: Rensis Likert

success.quote: Like everything in life, it is not what happens to you but how you respond to it that counts.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Because memory is time folding back on itself. To remember is to disengage from the present. In order to reach any kind of success in automobile racing, a driver must never remember.
success.author: Garth Stein

success.quote: It is never about who is right or wrong, it is about what is best.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Just like your body and lifestyle can be healthy or unhealthy, the same is true with your beliefs. Your beliefs can be your medicine or your poison.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Success works as a cycle - growth and contraction, balancing and unbalancing - all while you're encountering hurdles that get higher and higher over time.
success.author: Julien Smith

success.quote: Philosophy, art, politics, religion and bohemia have never sought to do away entirely with the status hierarchy; they have attemptee, rather, to institute new kinds of hierarchies based on sets of values unrecognised by, and critical of, those of the majority.. They have provided us with persuasive and consoling reminders that there is more than one way of succeeding in life.
success.author: Alain de Botton

success.quote: You can start to change your luck today. Begin believing that you can have what you desire and superior things will arrive.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Getting lost is not fatal. Almost every time, it will make your world.
success.author: Julien Smith

success.quote: If you wish success in life, make perseverance you bosom friend, experience your wise councellor, caution your elder brother, and hope your guardian genius.
success.author: Joseph Addison

success.quote: Nothing succeeds like indifference to success.
success.author: Marty Rubin

success.quote: Man is an end in himself.
success.author: Ayn Rand

success.quote: The thrust of continuous action is the firewood which fuels motivation.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: life is a continous journey of transformation
success.author: Sukant Ratnakar

success.quote: Only great fools remain ungrateful.
success.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

success.quote: On your quest to spirituality it is often required to suspend your rationality; but true spirituality asks that you enhance your rationality.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Faith is the poetry of our dreams; action is the builder of our reality.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: I wokeup in morning and saw, world has move on
success.author: Sukant Ratnakar

success.quote: Success is counted sweetest by those ne'er succeed.
success.author: Emily Dickinson

success.quote: We are pathfinders on a mission, Beholders following the Light, Runners gunning for the prize and Fighters remaining focused...You have been described, do not accept any other description!
success.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

success.quote: character is not made in a crisis- it is only exhibited
success.author: Robert Freedman

success.quote: Not matter what your sacred or religious book is, it's not how well you know the book, it's how well you're in alignment with the author.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Never sit back and wait for a opportunity to find you, get up and search for one, it exists find it!
success.author: Victoria Addino

success.quote: The ladder of success is there waiting for you... you just have to realize it and reach towards and climb as high as you can you will surely be successful.
success.author: Noor Ahmad

success.quote: Failure is The Way of Success
success.author: Chiranjit Paul

success.quote: I don't define success by how much money someone makes. I don't define success by how many trophies or plaques or awards someone has.I don't define it by membership in exclusive clubs or the ability to name-drop about someone's famous friends.I don't define it by how many luxury cars or opulent homes someone might own or how many sumptuous vacations they might taken in exotic locales all over the globe.I don't define success...oh, hell, I'm just kidding. Actually, all that stuff is fantastic!
success.author: Celia Rivenbark

success.quote: I couldn't do no yodelin', so I turned to howlin'. And it's done me just fine.
success.author: Howlin' Wolf

success.quote: Do the things you were sent here to do effectively.
success.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

success.quote: The devil can be a clown of prizes in moments like these. Moments of knowing you’ve ventured too far down the wrong path and all you can do is accept more prizes ...
success.author: J.M. August

success.quote: The universe doesn't give you what you want in your mind; it gives you what you demand with your actions.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Without struggle, success has no value.
success.author: Aaron Lauritsen

success.quote: No human ever became interesting by not failing. The more you fail and recover and improve, the better you are as a person. Ever meet someone who’s ALWAYS had EVERYTHING work out for them with ZERO struggle? They usually have the depth of a puddle. Or they don’t exist.
success.author: Chris Hardwick

success.quote: To turn your dreams into reality, all your resources, efforts and concentration should be aligned in the same direction.
success.author: Dr Roopleen

success.quote: Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
success.author: Arnold H. Glasow

success.quote: The only walls that exist are those you have placed in your mind. And whatever obstacles you conceive, exist only because you have forgotten what you have already achieved.
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: Quitting is never an option on the road to success. Find the way forward. If you have a positive mindset and are willing to persevere, there is little that is beyond your reach. The attitude of being ready to work even in the face of challenges and despite odds is what will make all the difference in your life.
success.author: Roopleen

success.quote: The elegance under pressure is the result of fearlessness.
success.author: Ashish Patel

success.quote: When you give appreciation IN ORDER TO get something– it's manipulation and people can sense it. Appreciate genuinely.
success.author: Marilyn Suttle

success.quote: The key to flow is to pursue an activity for its own sake, not for the rewards it brings.
success.author: Susan Cain

success.quote: You have had a dream for so many years. Let today be the day you make a plan for it. Just think about how much more likely you are to hit your target when you finally aim at it.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: When your intentions are pure, so too will be your success.
success.author: Charles F. Glassman MD

success.quote: Isana felt her throat tighten. "We failed." Serai lifted her chin and patted Isana's arm firmly."We have not yet succeeded. There is a difference.
success.author: Jim Butcher

success.quote: Once you figure out what you want in life—expect nothing less.
success.author: Lorii Myers

success.quote: Once you understand how powerful you are within, you exponentially increase the power and potentiality of everything outside of you.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: If we are looking for insurance against want and oppression, we will find it only in our neighbors' prosperity and goodwill and, beyond that, in the good health of our worldly places, our homelands. If we were sincerely looking for a place of safety, for real security and success, then we would begin to turn to our communities - and not the communities simply of our human neighbors but also of the water, earth, and air, the plants and animals, all the creatures with whom our local life is shared.(pg. 59, "Racism and the Economy")
success.author: Wendell Berry

success.quote: Success is not determined by the outcome. The outcome is the result of having already decided that you are successful to begin with.
success.author: T.F. Hodge

success.quote: That is why enemies can be great motivators. They serve as fuel for your fire.
success.author: Simon Zingerman

success.quote: I dont write books so that you can be fascinated with me. I write them so you can be fascinated with YOU!
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Dear Fellow Human Being,You are born wild, You do not deserve to be tamed!Tell yourself,You do not deserve this!All those toxic words you have to listen from people,All those fears they try to pin on your mind,All those giggles they aim at your dreams,All those judgmental stares inspecting your individuality,All those fingers pointing towards your crude character,All those shackles that tie your feet to social expectations,All those cages that do not let your imagination fly free,Listen deeply, you do not deserve any of it.My dear fellow human, you do not deserve this hostility.You are born wild, You do not deserve to be tamed!
success.author: Jasz  Gill

success.quote: It's impossible to walk through solid rock... You have to walk between the molecules that make up the rock.
success.author: J.M. Dattilo

success.quote: I suppose the secret of his success is in his tremendous idleness which almost approaches the supernatural.
success.author: Lawrence Durrell

success.quote: We can’t continuously be a society of well-wishers. We must take action to bring those wishes to fruition.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Do the best you can, with what you can, while you can, and success in inevitable.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Los Angeles is a town where status is all and status is only given to success. Dukes and millionaires and playboys by the dozen may arrive and be glad-handed for a time, but they are unwise if they choose to live there because the town is, perhaps even creditably, committed to recognising only professional success, and nothing else, to be of lasting value. The burdensome obligation imposed on all its inhabitants is therefore to present themselves as successes, because otherwise they forfeit their right to respect in that environment ... There is no place in that town for the "interesting failure" or for anyone who is not determined on a life that will be shaped in a upward-heading curve.
success.author: Julian Fellowes

success.quote: Success is something you experience when you act accordingly. Success is not something you have, it’s something you do.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Discovering While Doing Is Natural...But,Doing Immediately After Discovering Is The Attitude of Winners!
success.author: Sujit Lalwani

success.quote: You only struggle because you're ready to grow but aren't willing to let go.
success.author: Drew Gerald

success.quote: If a craftsman wants to do good work, he must first sharpen his tools.
success.author: Confucius

success.quote: I haven't failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that don't work.
success.author: Thomas Jefferson

success.quote: Do not let another day go by where your dedication to other people's opinions is greater than your dedication to your own emotions!
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Although time seems to fly, it never travels faster than one day at a time. Each day is a new opportunity to live your life to the fullest. In each waking day, you will find scores of blessings and opportunities for positive change. Do not let your TODAY be stolen by the unchangeable past or the indefinite future! Today is a new day!
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: I am struck by how sharing our weakness and difficulties is more nourishing to others than sharing our qualities and successes.
success.author: Jean Vanier

success.quote: Don't worry about being effective. Just concentrate on being faithful to the truth.
success.author: Dorothy Day

success.quote: If your success is not on your own terms, if it looks good to the world but does not feel good in your heart, it is not success at all.
success.author: Anna Quindlen

success.quote: The line between failure and success is so fine. . . that we are often on the line and do not know it.
success.author: Elbert Hubbard

success.quote: No other success can compensate for failure in the home.
success.author: J. E. McCulloch

success.quote: The secret to success is constancy of purpose.
success.author: Benjamin Disraeli

success.quote: Most men either compromise or drop their greatest talents and start running after, what they perceive to be, a more reasonable success, and somewhere in between they end up with a discontented settlement. Safety is indeed stability, but it is not progression.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: Lack of confidence, sometimes alternating with unrealistic dreams of heroic success, often leads to procrastination, and many studies suggest that procrastinators are self-handicappers: rather than risk failure, they prefer to create conditions that make success impossible, a reflex that of course creates a vicious cycle.
success.author: James Surowiecki

success.quote: When you live your life by poor standards, you inflict damage on everyone who crosses your path, especially those you love.
success.author: Jordan Belfort

success.quote: The secret to doing anything is believing that you can do it. Anything that you believe you can do strong enough, you can do. Anything. As long as you believe.
success.author: Bob Ross

success.quote: If you think you can then you can.
success.author: Stephen Richards

success.quote: To burn always with this hard gemlike flame, to maintain this ecstasy, is success in life.
success.author: Walter Pater

success.quote: Participate in your dreams today. There are unlimited opportunities available with this new day. Take action on those wonderful dreams you've had in your mind for so long. Remember, success is something you experience when you act accordingly.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Never feel shame for trying and failing for he who has never failed is he who has never tried.
success.author: Og Mandino

success.quote: You can have it all, just not all at the same time.
success.author: Betty Friedan

success.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
success.author: Albert Einstein

success.quote: A person who doubts himself is like a man who would enlist in the ranks of his enemies and bear arms against himself. He makes his failures certain by himself being the first person to be convinced of it.
success.author: Alexandre Dumas

success.quote: Stop waiting for the perfect day or the perfect moment... Take THIS day, THIS moment and lead it to perfection.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Your story may not have such a happy beginning but that does not make you who you are, it is the rest of it- who you choose to be
success.author: Soothsayer from Kung Fu Panda 2

success.quote: Writing is really just a matter of writing a lot, writing consistently and having faith that you'll continue to get better and better. Sometimes, people think that if they don't display great talent and have some success right away, they won't succeed. But writing is about struggling through and learning and finding out what it is about writing itself that you really love.
success.author: Laura Kasischke

success.quote: Today, many will choose to live free of conditions and rules governing their own happiness. Why not you? Do not let another day go by where your dedication to other people's opinions is greater than your dedication to your own emotions! Today's a new day!
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Small shifts in your thinking, and small changes in your energy, can lead to massive alterations of your end result.
success.author: Kevin Michel

success.quote: Success is a great deodorant.
success.author: Elizabeth Taylor

success.quote: Today is the only day in which we have any power.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: No one can travel so far that he does not make some progess each day. So let us never give up. Then we shall move forward daily in the Lord's way. And let us never despair because of our limited success. Even though it is so much less than we would like, our labour is not wasted when today is better than yesterday!
success.author: John Calvin

success.quote: There is no try. There is only do.
success.author: John Green

success.quote: Ultimate prosperity is one's value within. It takes a man of depth, morality, and charm to be envied yet without a sign of wealth or romance. A passion to prove such inner worth is his permission to achieve whatever he desires.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: Bad luck with women is a determined man's road to success. For every affliction, he makes, out of indignation, yet another advancement in order to exceed the man that the woman chose over him. This goes to show that great men are made great because they once learned how to fight the feeling of rejection.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: In those things toward which we exerted our best endeavors we succeeded.
success.author: George Clason
