success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Do not dilute the truth of your potential. We often convince ourselves that we cannot change, that we cannot overcome the circumstances of our lives. That is simply not true. You have been blessed with immeasurable power to make positive changes in your life. But you can't just wish it, you can't just hope it, you can't just want it... you have to LIVE it, BE it, DO it.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: It's no use saying, "We are doing our best." You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.
success.author: Winston S. Churchill

success.quote: I don't know where this pressure came from. I can't blame my parents because it has always felt internal. Like any other parent, my mother celebrated the A grades and the less-than-A grades she felt there was no need to tell anybody about. But not acknowledging the effort that ended in a less than perfect result impacted me as a child. If I didn't win, then we wouldn't tell anyone that I had even competed to save us the embarrassment of acknowledging that someone else was better. Keeping the secret made me think that losing was something to be ashamed of, and that unless I was sure I was going to be the champion there was no point in trying. And there was certainly no point to just having fun.
success.author: Portia de Rossi

success.quote: When you experience a negative circumstance or event, do not dwell on it. Be proactive — put your attention on what you need to do to bring the situation to a positive result.
success.author: Rodolfo Costa

success.quote: Remember how far you’ve come, and you won’t have to rely on a destiny for your future. It will come on your own.
success.author: Shannon A. Thompson

success.quote: What good has impatience ever brought? It has only served as the mother of mistakes and the father of irritation.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Success doesn't come to you; you go to it.
success.author: T. Scott McLeod

success.quote: You measure the size of the accomplishment by the obstacles you have to overcome to reach your goals.
success.author: Booker T. Washington

success.quote: The French say you get hungry when you’re eating, and I get inspired when I’m working. It’s my engine
success.author: Karl Lagerfeld

success.quote: Success has always been the greatest liar - and the "work" itself is a success; the great statesman, the conqueror, the discoverer is disguised by his creations, often beyond recognition; the "work," whether of the artist or the philosopher, invents the man who has created it, who is supposed to have create it; "great men," as they are venerated, are subsequent pieces of wretched minor fiction
success.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

success.quote: If at first you don’t succeed, you’re doing it wrong. Learn from the experience. Try again, but with a different approach.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: When you are just EXISTING, life happens to you… and you manage; when you are truly LIVING, you happen to life… and you lead.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: There are no environments where you're only going to win, because life just isn't like that.
success.author: Bobby Orr

success.quote: This moment is yours and yours alone! Take charge, seize this moment and allow it to propel you to the high levels of an empowered life. Allow upon this fertile moment to be planted the seeds of your happiness and success.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: The people we consider successful in our society are all people that seize every moment and make the best of each situation.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: It is important that when we make a resolution, or establish a goal, that we take the ACTION necessary to accomplish that goal.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: بربك لا تبكِ بكاء المظلوم !إن زرت أوطاني يوماً ولمحت نوافذ إنتظاري مغلقةوأبواب فقدي لك مؤصدة ،بربك لا تبكِ بكاء المظلوم !إن إحتفلوا بيوم ميلادك وبحثت عن صوتي بينهم ..ولم تجده ؟ وبحثت عن هداياي من بين هداياهم ولم تصلك
success.author: نجلاء حسن

success.quote: to be successful, you have to be out there, you have to hit the ground running
success.author: Richard Branson

success.quote: There will be times in your life when things simply have to be replaced because they are tired, broken, worn out, harmful, outdated, or irrelevant. Take an inventory of the things that no longer serve your best and highest good so you can replace them with things which do.
success.author: Susan C. Young

success.quote: The success of my rule does not rely on my ability to recite obscure Latin verse.
success.author: Sherry Thomas

success.quote: You must learn from your past mistakes, but not lean on your past successes.
success.author: Denis Waitley

success.quote: Plant your tiny seeds and keep watering them every day. Soon, they’ll grow.
success.author: Israelmore Ayivor

success.quote: If a writer of prose knows enough about what he is writing about he may omit things that he knows and the reader, if the writer is writing truly enough, will have a feeling of those things as strongly as though the writer had stated them. The dignity of movement of an ice-berg is due to only one-eighth of it being above water. A writer who omits things because he does not know them only makes hollow places in his writing. A writer who appreciates the seriousness of writing so little that he is anxious to make people see he is formally educated, cultured or well-bred is merely a popinjay. And this too remember; a serious writer is not to be confounded with a solemn writer. A serious writer may be a hawk or a buzzard or even a popinjay, but a solemn writer is always a bloody owl.
success.author: Ernest Hemingway

success.quote: Eighty percent of success is just showing up.
success.author: Stephen King

success.quote: Whatever one does for a living, three questions need to be confronted before it is too late: What really matters to me? What price do my spouse and kids pay for my career success? What price does my soul pay?
success.author: Dennis Prager

success.quote: Stunt dwarf or destroy the imagination of a child and you have taken away its chances of success in life. Imagination transforms the commonplace into the great and creates the new out of the old.
success.author: L. Frank Baum

success.quote: Remember, results aren't the criteria for success — it's the effort made for achievement that is most important.
success.author: John Wooden

success.quote: Life is too short to be anything but happy. So kiss slowly. Love deeply. Forgive quickly. Take chances and never have regrets. Forget the past but remember what it taught you.
success.author: Abhishek Shukla

success.quote: Success involves going to where others believe is too far.
success.author: Jeffrey Fry

success.quote: The power behind taking responsibility for your actions lies in putting an end to negative thought patterns. You no longer dwell on what went wrong or focus on whom you are going to blame. You don't waste time building roadblocks to your success. Instead, you are set free and can now focus on succeeding.
success.author: Lorii Myers

success.quote: You don't believe that your friend could ever do anything great. You despise yourself in secret, even – no, especially – when you stand on your dignity; and since you despise yourself, you are unable to respect your friend. You can't bring yourself to believe that anyone you have sat at table with, or shared a house with, is capable of great achievement. That is why all great men have been solitary. It is hard to think in your company, little man. One can only think 'about' you, or 'for your benefit', not 'with' you, for you stifle all big, generous ideas.
success.author: Wilhelm Reich

success.quote: Trustful people are the pure at heart, as they are moved by the zeal of their own trustworthiness.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: Some people talk about other people’s failures with so much pleasure that you would swear they are talking about their own successes.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: I like Dancing of Indian girls more than my parents’ prayers . Because they dance with love and passion . But my parents just say their prayers because they got used to it .
success.author: Ali Shariati

success.quote: Have you found someone to share your heart with? Are you giving to your community? Are you at peace with yourself? Are you trying to be as human as you can be?
success.author: Mitch Albom

success.quote: At any given point you can release your greatest self. Don’t let anyone hold you back. Don’t let anyone dilute you. Don’t be peer pressured into being less than you are. People willing to dilute themselves for the sake of others is one of the great tragedies of our time. Stop letting others define and set the pace for your life. Get out there and be your best. Do your best. Live your best. Make every day count and you’ll see how exponentially more exciting, thrilling, successful, happy and full your life will be.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: if you gone come in second, you're just the first loser!
success.author: Tiger Woods

success.quote: What is success? It is being able to go to bed each night with your soul at peace
success.author: Paulo Coelho

success.quote: It is true that success is the most boring thing, it is tinny and brittle, failure runs deeper. Success is dangerous. I have a very complicated relationship with that word.
success.author: Arundhati Roy

success.quote: How many of us stop short of success on purpose? How many of us sabotage our own happiness because failure, while miserable, is a fear we're familiar with? Success, however, dreams come true, are a whole new kind of terrifying, an entire new species of responsibilities and disillusions, requiring a new way to think, act and become. Why do we REALLY quit? Because it's hopeless? Or because it's possible...
success.author: Jennifer DeLucy

success.quote: You must immerse yourself in your work. You have to fall in love with your work … You must dedicate your life to mastering your skill. That’s the secret of success.
success.author: Chef Jiro

success.quote: Using your talent, hobby or profession in a way that makes you contribute with something good to this world is truly the way to go.
success.author: Simon Zingerman

success.quote: Beware of those who are bitter, for they will never allow you to enjoy your fruit.
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: You cannot score a goal when you are sitting on the bench. To do so, you have to dress up and enter the game.
success.author: Israelmore Ayivor

success.quote: Her failure was a useful preliminary to success.
success.author: Edith Wharton

success.quote: It's not always what we don't know that gets in our way; sometimes it's what we think we know that keeps us from learning.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: practice only envisioning yourself at the finish line and be unrelenting and fervent in racing towards that finish line. Undue preoccupation and fixation with the how's, whens, and what ifs will not only derail and further distance you from your destination, but will also feed your mind with those fatal seeds of doubt that make failure inevitable" ~ Awaken and Unleash your Victor
success.author: Ogor Winnie Okoye

success.quote: He shrugged his shoulders to shift the pain of failure---the pain that is so much greater than the pleasure of success.
success.author: Ian Fleming

success.quote: Racing is about discipline and intelligence, not about who has the heavier foot. The one who drives smart will always win in the end.
success.author: Garth Stein

success.quote: Success is that old ABC - ability, breaks and courage.
success.author: Charles Luckman

success.quote: The logic of worldly success rests on a fallacy: the strange error that our perfection depends on the thoughts and opinions and applause of other men!
success.author: Thomas Merton

success.quote: FOCUS = Follow On Course Until Successful.
success.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

success.quote: If fame is a curse, successful people
success.author: Vizi Andrei

success.quote: 5 Ways To Build Your Brand on Social Media:1 Post content that add value2 Spread positivity3 Create steady stream of info4 Make an impact5 Be yourself
success.author: Germany Kent

success.quote: One often has to do what they have to do in order to do what they want to do; however if you only do what you want to do then you will never do what you have to do!
success.author: Dr. C. Moorer

success.quote: Optimists move through life with a happy exterior. What happens on the inside shows up on the outside.
success.author: Marilyn Suttle

success.quote: Success, for most people, requires unlearning as much as learning.
success.author: Orrin Woodward

success.quote: The ladder of success is never crowded at the top.
success.author: Napoleon Hill

success.quote: With sticky thinking you can become unstuck!
success.author: Stephen Richards

success.quote: That some achieve great success, is proof to all that others can achieve it as well.
success.author: Abraham Lincoln

success.quote: Why be a man when you can be a success.
success.author: Bertolt Brecht

success.quote: No one can take the shot for you.
success.author: Lorii Myers

success.quote: Your environment will eat your goals and plans for breakfast.
success.author: Steve Pavlina

success.quote: Reconnect to what makes you happy and brings you Joy. If there is something that used to make you happy which you have stopped doing, do it again. Seek to find deeper meaning and significance rather than living on the surface.
success.author: Susan C. Young

success.quote: When you know you can do something, and you feel good about yourself, you do not have to devalue others.
success.author: John Patrick Hickey

success.quote: If you can show people how to build castles, make sure you do not neglect building and nurturing your own.
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: We all have our youthful follies, embarassing to recall -- but people somehow find it hard to dismiss as a youthful folly anything that has happened to be a financial success.
success.author: John Wyndham

success.quote: Get off the treadmill of consumption, replication, and mediocrity. Begin lifting the weights of creativity, originality, and success.
success.author: Ryan Lilly

success.quote: Momentum builds success.
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: Don’t grieve when people fail to recognize your ability. Grieve for your lack of ability instead.
success.author: Confucius

success.quote: This is an inevitable and easily recognizable stage in every revolutionary movement: reformers must expect to be disowned by those who are only too happy to enjoy what has been won for them.
success.author: Doris Lessing

success.quote: If you want to be truly successful invest in yourself to get the knowledge you need to find your unique factor. When you find it and focus on it and persevere your success will blossom.
success.author: Sidney Madwed

success.quote: The really essential factors of success in any undertaking are money and opportunity, and as a rule, the man who can make the first can make the second.
success.author: Dorothy L. Sayers

success.quote: With adequate planning, passion and perseverance, you can achieve the God-given goals.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: While spirituality provides an efficient and endless fuel for your mind and body, you must burn that fuel with human action towards your goals, dreams, and desires.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: I'd rather strive for the kind of interview where instead of me asking to introduce myself to society, society asks me to introduce myself to society.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: When you encourage others, you boost their self-esteem, enhance their self-confidence, make them work harder, lift their spirits and make them successful in their endeavors. Encouragement goes straight to the heart and is always available. Be an encourager. Always.
success.author: Roy   Bennett

success.quote: I'm happy for all who reached for the stars happily and successfully.
success.author: Ana Monnar

success.quote: A failure establishes only this, that our determination to succeed was not strong enough.
success.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

success.quote: It's better to dare to dream big and achieve half of your dreams than to dream small dreams and achieve all
success.author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

success.quote: The noble-minded worry about their lack of ability, not about people’s failure to recognize their ability.
success.author: Confucius

success.quote: There's sometimes a tugging feeling you get to push further when you aren't being challenged enough or when things get too comfortable.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: Moving forward implies MOTION when in all actuality it may be simply standing STILL and seeing the salvation of the Lord.
success.author: John Paul Warren

success.quote: Make plans for your new goals. And press towards achieving the goals with all your strength.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Ephron insisted, "It will be a little messy, but embrace the mess. It will be complicated, but rejoice in the complications. It will not be anything like what you think it will be like, but surprises are good for you. And don't be frightened: you can always change your mind. I know: I've had four careers and three husbands.
success.author: Sheryl Sandberg

success.quote: With honest and straightforward business principles, close and careful attention to details, and the ability to take advantage of favourable opportunities and circumstances, there is a scope for success.
success.author: Jamsetji Tata

success.quote: We should learn to smile as we fall, So much so as when we have it all.
success.author: Ana Claudia Antunes

success.quote: Don't let your mind talk you out of your dreams, trick you into giving up; don't let your mind become the greatest obstacle to success. To get your mind on the right track, the rest will follow.
success.author: Roy   Bennett

success.quote: Happy people produce. Bored people consume.
success.author: Stephen Richards

success.quote: Fortunate are those who take the first steps.
success.author: Paulo Coelho

success.quote: So, I must be taken as I have been made. The success is not mine, the failure is not mine, but the two together make me.
success.author: Charles Dickens

success.quote: Stuff your brain with knowledge.
success.author: Karl Lagerfeld

success.quote: Do you wait for things to happen, or do you make them happen yourself? I believe in writing your own story.
success.author: Charlotte Eriksson

success.quote: It may take little time to get where you want to be, but if you pause and think for a moment, you will notice that you are no longer where you were. Do not stop—keep going.
success.author: Rodolfo Costa

success.quote: Any fool can hope when success lies plainly in view. It wants genuine strength to hope when matters are hopeless.
success.author: Michael Flynn

success.quote: There is a difference between talented people and gifted people.Talented people are good AT something; Gifted people ARE that something.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: My dreams are worthless, my plans are dust, my goals are impossible.All are of no value unless they are followed by action.
success.author: Og Mandino

success.quote: Success is a decision, not a gift.
success.author: Steve Backley

success.quote: Don't nourish your fears more than you nourish your hopes.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Success is realising the true joy and wonder of life can only be yours if you follow your own intuition, aiming to achieve your bliss.
success.author: Steven Redhead

success.quote: A knock down has never been a knockout unless you allow it.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Nothing makes a person desire improvement like failure
success.author: Chris Stocking

success.quote: Get out of your own way… stop the paralysis by analysis… decide what you want, create a simple plan, and get moving!
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: For some people, their fear to lose is greater than their desire to succeed, so they end up doing nothing and their dreams become impossible.
success.author: Rodolfo Costa

success.quote: Imagine in vibrant, wonderful detail your heart’s desire—a reality only you can envision, an adventure only you can direct.Then cradle your creation. Caress it. Mold it. Coddle it until it comes to life.And when your precious treasure grows so grand as to steal your breath away, set it free for all the world to experience. For that is how you live your dreams.
success.author: Richelle Goodrich

success.quote: I believe that everyone should have a dream and believe in it. Make it real, bring it to life. You'll never regret trying. Trying is what strengthens your heart and delivers courage. Once you believe in yourself, nothing can stop you.
success.author: Richard Denney

success.quote: Ambition is not what a man would do, but what a man does, for ambition without action is fantasy.
success.author: Bryant McGill

success.quote: Don`t allow ignorance to further enslave your destiny.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Doubts in your mind are a much greater roadblock to success than obstacles on the journey.
success.author: Orrin Woodward

success.quote: Some people have just rented your body to live in it for sometime and depart. Others consider you as a permanent residence to dwell in forever. Which ever, you must remember to accommodate all those who want to be accommodated. Be each other's keeper
success.author: Israelmore Ayivor

success.quote: Nothing succeeds like success.
success.author: Alexandre Dumas

success.quote: When the awareness of what is achievable brushes your life, your journey has begun.
success.author: Lorii Myers

success.quote: Success is assured when a person fears the pain of regret more than the pain of the process.
success.author: Orrin Woodward

success.quote: And the thing is, we can’t fail. We’ve already hit the bottom and come out of it. From here on out, if we just love and listen, we can’t go wrong, babe.
success.author: Erin McCarthy

success.quote: The disempowered mind believes dreams come true; the empowered mind knows you bring your dreams to life.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Those who reach for the Sun, usually drop the world.
success.author: Lionel Suggs

success.quote: Since when is failure more appealing? Never give up.
success.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

success.quote: Unbreakable, would you thought they called me Mr. GlassLook back on my life like the ghost of Christmas pastToys R Us where I used to spend that Christmas cashAnd I still won't grow up, I'm a grown ass kidSwear I should be locked up for stupid shit that I didBut I'm a champion, so I turned tragedy to triumphMake music that's fire, spit my soul through the wire
success.author: Kanye West

success.quote: سؤال دائما ما يطرح نفسه فى حياتنا.. ليه كل ما هو "صح" و "كويس" و "مفيد" صعب؟ و ليه كل ما هو "غلط" و "وحش" و "مؤى" سهل؟
success.author: عمرو سلامة

success.quote: It is safer to search in the maze than to remain in a cheeseless situation
success.author: Spencer Johnson

success.quote: Sometimes we have to soak ourselves in the tears and fears of the past to water our future gardens.
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: A confident woman wears a smile and has this air of comfortability and pleasantness about her.
success.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

success.quote: To be successful, one has to be one of three bees - the queen bee, the hardest working bee, or the bee that does not fit in.
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: A real decision is measured by the fact that you've taken a new action. If there's no action, you haven't truly decided.
success.author: Anthony Robbins

success.quote: Every flower blooms at a different pace.
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: You have to take your own bold approach, and if you do you will be rewarded with success. Or calamitous failure. That can happen too.
success.author: Steven Moffat

success.quote: Challenges in life can either enrich you or poison you. You are the one who decides.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: If you have to ask if you’ve done enough, you haven’t. Each day brings with it the opportunity to do more than you did yesterday.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Recognize that throughout this beautiful day,you have an incredible amount of opportunities to move your life into the direction you want it to go.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Powerful words come with powerful intent. Where you have passion, strength, courage, and determination you can accomplish anything!
success.author: K.L. Toth

success.quote: A person who makes few mistakes makes little progress.
success.author: Bryant McGill

success.quote: Before the fruits of prosperity can come, the storms of life need to first bring the required rains of testing, which mixes with the seeds of wisdom to produce a mature harvest.
success.author: Lincoln Patz

success.quote: Living as we do in an age of noise and bluster, success is now measured accordingly. We must all be seen, and heard, and on the air.
success.author: Daphne du Maurier

success.quote: Intent without dedicated action is simply not enough. Action without a clear intent is a waste. It is when these two powerful forces are aligned that the energy of the universe conspires in your favor.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Each day gives the opportunity for you to be treated right, to feel worthy, and to be successful. It’s a choice you have to make, a faith you have to embrace, and a standard you have to set.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: If you have money, power, and status today, it is due to the century and place in which you were born, to your talents and capacities and health, none of which you earned. In short, all your resources are in the end the gift of God.
success.author: Timothy Keller

success.quote: If you want to be successful, you must respect one rule. NEVER TO LIE TO YOURSELF.
success.author: Paulo Cohelo

success.quote: You are the point of origin for everything in your world: you set the standard for yourself.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Where would his torture be, indeed, if at every step the hope of succeeding upheld him?
success.author: Albert Camus

success.quote: Should-haves solve nothing. It's the next thing to happen that needs thinking about.
success.author: Alexandra Ripley

success.quote: The time has come to harness the blessed power within us and to use it to transcend from our current existence into a more empowered reality.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: It is not enough to be busy; so are the ants. The question is: What are we busy about?
success.author: Henry David Thoreau

success.quote: We need more than just the Law of Attraction. We need to connect with its more successful twin, the Law of Generosity. And further entwine ourselves with their parent; the Law of Love.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Success sometimes may be defined as a disaster put on hold. Qualified. Has to be.
success.author: Nadine Gordimer

success.quote: I tell you, life is extraordinary. A few years ago I couldn’t write anything or sell anything, I’d passed the age where you know all the returns are in, I’d had my chance and done my best and failed. And how was I to know the miracle waiting to happen round the corner in late middle age? 84, Charing Cross Road was no best seller, you understand; it didn’t make me rich or famous. It just got me hundreds of letters and phone calls from people I never knew existed; it got me wonderful reviews; it restored a self-confidence and self-esteem I’d lost somewhere along the way, God knows how many years ago. It brought me to England. It changed my life.
success.author: Helene Hanff

success.quote: You would not be here TODAY if YESTERDAY was your defining moment. LIVE THIS DAY and move towards your dreams.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Creativity is the brain's invisible muscle -- that when used and excercised routinely -- becomes better and stronger.
success.author: Ashley Ormon

success.quote: Remember diamonds are created under pressure so hold on, it will be your time to shine soon.
success.author: Sope Agbelusi

success.quote: Well, if it can be thought, it can be done, a problem can be overcome,
success.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

success.quote: One may not always know his purpose until his only option is to monopolize in what he truly excels at. He grows weary of hearing the answer 'no' time and time again, so he turns to and cultivates, monopolizes in his one talent which others cannot possibly subdue. Then, beyond the crowds of criticism and rejection, the right people recognize his talent - among them he finds his stage.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: Be a King. Dare to be Different, dare to manifest your greatness.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Don't die without fulfilling your purpose.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Listen for the call of your destiny, and when it comes, release your plans and follow.
success.author: Mollie Marti

success.quote: INTENT reveals desire; ACTION reveals commitment.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Every man has a specific skill, whether it is discovered or not, that more readily and naturally comes to him than it would to another, and his own should be sought and polished. He excels best in his niche - originality loses its authenticity in one's efforts to obtain originality.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: Never let success get to your head and never let failure get to your heart.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: Dare to be different. Represent your maker well and you will forever abide in the beautiful embrace of his loving arms.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: God is never tired of bringing the sun out every morning, taking it in the evenings and bringing out the moon.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Your words are powerful so what you say goes a long way to either establish or destroy you; this is why you should say things that God has said concerning you, not things that situations or circumstances say.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: We think a wise person is someone who solves problems. Truth is, a wise person is someone who avoids problems.
success.author: Prem Rawat

success.quote: Stop worrying about someone taking your spot. God already have it reserved. Do the work to get there and fill it!
success.author: Yvonne Pierre

success.quote: The ultimate story of success: When a nobody, who has never once in his entire life known the feeling of being remembered or respected, suddenly snaps and becomes a world dictator. On one hand it sounds just, but on the other, it illustrates the reason why a prosperity message has and needs its limitations.
success.author: Criss Jami

success.quote: Without enthusiasm then what we have surrounded ourselves with becomes worthless.
success.author: Stephen Richards

success.quote: The secret code of success is patience,a virtue that can not be replaced. It takes time to build great dreams.
success.author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

success.quote: BREAKING NEWS: You're awesome and designed for success; live this day accordingly!
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Want something else more than success. Success is a lovely thing, but your desire to say something, your worth, and your identity shouldn’t rely on it, because it’s not guaranteed and it’s not permanent and it’s not sufficient. So work hard, fall in love with the writing—the characters, the story, the words, the themes—and make sure that you are who you are regardless of your life circumstances. That way, when the good things come, they don’t warp you, and when the bad things hit you, you don’t fall apart.
success.author: Veronica Roth

success.quote: Behind a life of influence you will find a masterful storyteller.
success.author: Mollie Marti

success.quote: Whether you dance, draw, make music, shoot field goals, build houses, tune engines, or sit around all day watching television, you are an artist. Your single greatest work of art is your self. As with any art form, the more you understand and develop your talents, the more empowered and masterful you become as an artist. This is particularly important when engaging in the art of consciously shaping your own life.
success.author: Scott Edmund Miller

success.quote: I would hesitate to use the word 'success' in the way many people do. I don't know that I would apply it to what I've done as though I have now reached the ultimate goal. To me success is a continuing thing. It is growth and development. It is achieving one thing and using that as a stepping stone to achieve something else. Success comes as you have confidence in yourself. Self-confidence is built by succeeding, even if the success is small. It is the believing that makes it possible.
success.author: Walter Knott

success.quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.[Eddie Scissons]
success.author: W.P. Kinsella

success.quote: Take action! An inch of movement will bring you closer to your goals than a mile of intention.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Do not look down with disdain on what Christ spent so much to achieve for you.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: To soar, we must leave anything that weighs us down...
success.author: Saru Singhal

success.quote: The awful penalty of success is the haunting dread of subsequent failure.
success.author: A.C. Benson

success.quote: The fundamental virtue of success is that it allows you to know the true significance of what it means to have the freedom to make your dreams come true.
success.author: Stacy Keach

success.quote: The mind is the mine of man, wherein he digs out good or evil.
success.author: Ogwo David Emenike

success.quote: Moja putanja spiralnog je oblika i život je postupno odmata. Sudjelujem, svakodnevno gubim ponešto slobode, umaram glasnice, ali uspjet ću već zbog toga što nisam motiviran koristoljubljem.
success.author: Jasna Horvat

success.quote: No man succeeds without faith. Whether you call it religious faith or label it something else. I don't feel anything worthwhile is accomplished without it. When you believe there is a Supreme Being guiding the destiny of this universe and that within each of us there is a little part of that Being, then you will have faith in yourself, in your country, in that Supreme Being, and in humanity itself.
success.author: Walter Knott

success.quote: If you find yourself drawn to an event against all logic, go. The universe is telling you something.
success.author: Gloria Steinem

success.quote: All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers.
success.author: Orison Swett Marden

success.quote: Opportunity doesn't make appointments, you have to be ready when it arrives.
success.author: Tim Fargo

success.quote: The fishing is best where the fewest go and the collective insecurity of the world makes it easy for people to hit home runs while everyone is aiming for base hits.
success.author: Timothy Ferriss

success.quote: If the fire in your heart is strong enough, it will burn away any obstacles that come your way.
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: Separate yourself from those who hinder your vision. Make a choice to walk away from the trap set to ensnare you. Realize when someone is pulling you backwards every time you take a step forward. Separate from them and the result of your action will be a life of success.
success.author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana

success.quote: Don't try to follow trends. Create them.
success.author: Simon Zingerman

success.quote: Reconnect with the highest truth and ignite the divine sparks in you.
success.author: Amit Ray

success.quote: Encouragement is like water to the soul, it makes everything grow.
success.author: Chris Burkmenn

success.quote: A dream is a seed.Vision plants it.Imagination nurtures growth.Opportunities create blooms.Thoughts become things!
success.author: Donna McGoff

success.quote: Formal education and current position can define your worthiness. What makes you extraordinary is defined by your attitude towards others.
success.author: Ashish Patel

success.quote: Every achievement is a servitude. It compels us to a higher achievement.
success.author: Albert Camus

success.quote: Marriage is the union of two 'I's to form a 'V'. Both 'I's have to tilt equally to make a good 'V'. 'I's standing tall can never make a 'V'.
success.author: Ashok  Kallarakkal

success.quote: Do you know where your breakthrough begins? Your breakthrough begins where your excuses ends.
success.author: Patience Johnson

success.quote: Success and failure come and go, but don't let them define you. It's who you are that matters.
success.author: Kamal Ravikant

success.quote: A master in the art of living draws no sharp distinction between her work and her play; her labor and her leisure; her mind and her body; her education and her recreation. She hardly knows which is which. She simply pursues her vision of excellence through whatever she is doing, and leaves others to determine if she is working or playing. To herself, she always appears to be doing both.
success.author: Francois Rene De Chateaubriand

success.quote: But in the military you don't get trusted positions just because of your ability. You also have to attract the notice of superior officers. You have to be liked. You have to fit in with the system. You have to look like what the officers above you think that officers should look like. You have to think in ways that they are comfortable with.The result was that you ended up with a command structure that was top-heavy with guys who looked good in uniform and talked right and did well enough not to embarrass themselves, while the really good ones quietly did all the serious work and bailed out their superiors and got blamed for errors they had advised against until they eventually got out.That was the military.
success.author: Orson Scott Card

success.quote: As much as I would really like to have saved myself heartache, embarrassment or gossip, I also know that my biggest mistakes have turned into my best lessons. And sometimes my greatest career triumphs. If my life had been turbulence-free, maybe my music would be beige, maybe the stadiums wouldn’t be full and the mantle would be a little more empty.
success.author: Taylor Swift

success.quote: The choice to make good choices is the best choice you can choose. Fail to make that choice and on most choices you will lose.
success.author: Ryan Lilly

success.quote: If you always do what is easy and choose the path of least resistance, you never step outside your comfort zone. Great things don’t come from comfort zones.
success.author: Roy   Bennett

success.quote: You see it as me going back. I see it as me staying on track.
success.author: Germany Kent

success.quote: As an Odd-Fish, it is not my job to be right,' said Sir Oort. 'It is my job to be wrong in new and exciting ways.
success.author: James Kennedy

success.quote: Be aware that how you feel has a direct impact on your thinking process. When we set standards for ourselves they seem objective, but standards and goal-setting are totally subjective and personal." From The Biology of Success.
success.author: Robert Arnot

success.quote: No amount of reading or memorizing will make you successful in life. It is the understanding and application of wise thought that counts." -Bob Proctor
success.author: Bob Proctor

success.quote: Let us waste no further time looking for the secret of success or the key to happiness. Already the door is open and whosoever will may enter.
success.author: Ernest Holmes

success.quote: Courage to me is doing something daring, no matter how afraid, insecure, intimidated, alone, unworthy, incapable, ridiculed or whatever other paralyzing emotion you might feel. Courage is taking action.....no matter what. So you're afraid? Be afraid. Be scared silly to the point you're trembling and nauseous, but do it anyway!
success.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

success.quote: Success is nothing if you don't have the right people to share it with; you're just gonna end up Lonley.
success.author: selena gomez

success.quote: The First Law: Performance drives success,but when performance can’t be measured,networks drive success.
success.author: Albert-László Barabási

success.quote: Be like water,Flow like a river,Crash like the rain,Fly like the cloud again!
success.author: Md. Ziaul Haque

success.quote: Don't say negative things about your spouse and children.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: When we are connected to the source, we will not be afraid of any task set before us.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: You recreate your world to your taste with God's Word in your mouth.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: A strong man does not succumb to pressures, he knows that without pressures he will not find pleasures and so he will not be made.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: God rewards every act of obedience to His Will.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: You may not attain the highest height with one leap but my dear; you will reach your destination.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Your mouth is not given to you for feeding alone; it is given to you to programme events and circumstance around you.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: I awoke one morning to find myself famous.
success.author: Lord Byron

success.quote: Your decision not to join the crowd may be what God is waiting for to grant you revelation on how to deliver your family, your country, business, profession or even your church!
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: The presence of God is so important in the life of believers. There is abundance of all you need to make your life comfortable in His presence.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Worship is the marriage of two Spirits - the Spirit of God and the Spirit of man.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Happy roads is bunk. Weary roads is right. Get you nowhere fast. That's where I've got—nowhere. Where everyone lands in the end, even if most of the suckers won't admit it.
success.author: Eugene O'Neill

success.quote: So cheer up Beloved; for your God is able, He is the maker of all things.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Another way of remaining in intimacy with God is by remaining in His presence.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: He is the only option for better living.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: The presence of the Lord destroys a life of struggle. You will struggle until you encounter His presence.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Man is like a bride unto God. God is jealous when man veers away from Him.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: An exceedingly well-informed report,' said the General. 'You have given yourself the trouble to go into matters thoroughly, I see. That is one of the secrets of success in life.
success.author: Anthony Powell

success.quote: We cannot prevail by our own might or strength, we need to plug on to the source of our strength so that we will remain resourceful always.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: God wants all man's attention, thoughts and focus to be on Him.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: The choice is yours. Don't let your pronouncements destroy your destiny rather let them build your future up!
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Are you the fruit of redemption? If yes, then make a delightful noise unto Him.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: The minute you start talking about what you’re going to do if you lose, you have lost.
success.author: George P. Shultz

success.quote: God is not a thief. That which steals, kills and destroys is the devil - not God!
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: God comes down in the evenings to chat with man, enjoy man's company and find out how man faired in the course of the day.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: You don't need to go running from pillar to post looking for what God looks like.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Everyone that enters through Him is secured and the person shall find pastures for himself. Jesus really cares!
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: The Prince came to give life unto those whose lives were almost being snuffed out by the devil via the cares of this world.
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: On the road to success, even little stones may cause you fall down! If you are not serious and careful, forget about reaching your target!
success.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

success.quote: It doesn't matter how wealthy you may be in material things, what matters is do you know what to do with those wealth?
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Stop trying to 'fix' yourself; you're NOT broken! You are perfectly imperfect and powerful beyond measure.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: We have forty million reasons for failure, but not a single excuse.
success.author: Rudyard Kipling

success.quote: Whatever your passion is, keep doing it. Don't waste time chasing after success or comparing yourself to others. Every flower blooms at a different pace. Excel at doing what your passion is and only focus on perfecting it. Eventually people will see what you are great at doing, and if you are truly great, success will come chasing after you.
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: The more you can have control over your ego rather than let it run amuck, the more successful you’ll be in all areas of life.
success.author: Roy T. Bennett

success.quote: You were born a winner, a warrior, one who defied the odds by surviving the most gruesome battle of them all - the race to the egg. And now that you are a giant, why do you even doubt victory against smaller numbers and wider margins? The only walls that exist are those you have placed in your mind. And whatever obstacles you conceive, exist only because you have forgotten what you have already achieved.
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: The empowered woman is powerful beyond measure and beautiful beyond description.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Whenever you should doubt your self-worth, remember the lotus flower. Even though it plunges to life from beneath the mud, it does not allow the dirt that surrounds it to affect its growth or beauty.
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: Just pick a goal and stick to it
success.author: Richelle Goodrich

success.quote: You become what you think about
success.author: Napoleon Hill

success.quote: Luck is a word the bitter teach to the ignorant.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Notice the difference between being in control and needing control.
success.author: Marilyn Suttle

success.quote: If there were a master of stupidity in this world, I would really love to listen to his success story.
success.author: Toba Beta [Betelgeuse Incident]

success.quote: Everything is easier said than done. Wanting something is easy. Saying something is easy. The challenge and the reward are in the doing.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Every beginner possesses a great potential to be an expert in his or her chosen field.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: While others were dreaming about it - I was getting it done.
success.author: Nathan W. Morris

success.quote: The possibility of the dream gives strength.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
success.author: Helen Keller

success.quote: If you can transcend from the dark rut of disempowered thinking to the bright light of an empowered agreement with reality, you will see opportunities not barriers. You will see the finish line, not the hurdles.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Without being push to the wall, we will have remained in our comfortable zone. But this circumstance challenges us to find the courage to move on.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Believe in yourself. Under-confidence leads to a self-fulfilling prophecy that you are not good enough for your work.
success.author: Dr Roopleen

success.quote: Sometimes I feel proud of myself, not because of any success I’ve achieved, but because I’m aware of all the difficulties that I have suffered or went through.I’m an eyewitness at all the fear, weakness, frustration, failure, depression, refraction and bad luck moments that I’ve been through alone and which affected significantly but never was able to beat me for so long.This is why I’m proud, because I’m here now stronger that yesterday, I'm still able to stand and continue on my way, still following up my dreams, still trying my best to build better future for me and my family and I will never ever give up!
success.author: Shadi Kamal Kandil

success.quote: To win an argument, rely on logic. To win in life, question logic.If you’re not willing to often take actions that don’t make much sense, having a mediocre life will make perfect sense.
success.author: Vizi Andrei

success.quote: There are many, many, many worlds branching out at each moment you become aware of your environment and then make a choice.
success.author: Kevin Michel

success.quote: There is little success where there is little laughter.
success.author: Andrew Carnegie

success.quote: You‘ve been given the innate power to shape your life.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Never mind those failures till yesterday. Each new day is a sequel of a wonderful life; gifted with hopes to succeed.
success.author: Aniruddha Sastikar

success.quote: You think intelligence and grit can succeed by themselves, but I'm telling you that's a pretty illusion.
success.author: Nancy Kress

success.quote: Every conscious thought you have, every moment you spend on an idea, is a commitment to be stuck with that idea and with aspects of that level of thinking, for the rest of your life. Spending just 10 seconds focusing on a topic that does not serve your interests is to invest your energy along a path that will continue to draw from you and define you.
success.author: Kevin Michel

success.quote: Failures make you humble, they make you realize that you are not the center of the world, proving that we are all alike, and they also shower you with wisdom. That’s why I have always been a great fan of failures as they offer you more than success can.
success.author: Neeraj Agnihotri

success.quote: It is strange the way the ignorant and inexperienced so often and so undeservedly succeed when the informed and the experienced fail. All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure.
success.author: Mark Twain

success.quote: success isn't supposed to feel comfortable
success.author: Jordan Hoechlin

success.quote: Some people deny the existence of God in order to give themselves credit for their successes. Some accept His existence in order to deny responsibility for their failures.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
success.author: Ritu Ghatourey

success.quote: Havingness is not a problem of doingness but a problem of willingness! And hence: success is not a result but a mindset.
success.author: Meir Ezra

success.quote: It will always sound like bragging to those who are slacking.
success.author: Darnell Lamont Walker

success.quote: No investment in STEM education is too big or small, we must invest in it always, our investment in it will pave way for future growth in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics.
success.author: Bamigboye Olurotimi

success.quote: When you fill an organization with good fits, those who believe what you believe, success just happens.
success.author: Simon Sinek

success.quote: Procrastination is indeed the real enemy of success. Kill it, and you will see rapid growth.
success.author: Vincent Okeke

success.quote: Strive for success, it means you must sacrifice your space of time to achieve your goals.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Strive for success.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Without any sacrifice, is there any success?
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Everyone is a friend of the strong, the only friend of a poor is himself.Stepping on the shoulders of the weak, the strong succeed in their futile attempt to touch the sky.
success.author: Srinivas Mishra

success.quote: No one has the power to keep you from achieving what God has promised but you.
success.author: Carlos Wallace

success.quote: Go girl, you got to give it all your best.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: We can't get the future we wanted if we fail to take advantage of the STEM education, we must open students all over the world to it, in order for us to get the future we can all be proud of.
success.author: Bamigboye Olurotimi

success.quote: Choose to use your energy, time and resources in uplifting others , rather than bringing them down. Choose to put efforts and means in building , rather than destroying others.
success.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

success.quote: Research and development is very important in the growth and success of mankind, no nation or people becomes great without these two, and the STEM education is here to assist us.
success.author: Bamigboye Olurotimi

success.quote: In order for us to sustain growth and stability, there is need for us to embrace and promote the STEM education, STEM education is a gateway to improved economy, and also an avenue for technological advancement.
success.author: Bamigboye Olurotimi

success.quote: STEM education is very important to mankind just like the water we drink and the air we breathe in, we need it to produce more critical thinkers, problem solvers, innovators, and the world best economy drivers.
success.author: Bamigboye Olurotimi

success.quote: Being an ignoramus is not enough to prevent one from being famous.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: We generally outlive premature success and inherited riches.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: Sacrifice is the seed of success.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Children these days are very intelligent and brilliant, they are enthusiastic in nature. We need to grow their knowledge, understanding, and curiosity using the STEM education.
success.author: Bamigboye Olurotimi

success.quote: Loser is the Sance that Gives Triumph it's Savour..
success.author: Dubey Kashish

success.quote: There is no true prosperity, without a painful toil.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Perseverance is the price for success.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: The road may be long, tortuous and wearied. But the resulting success is enduring, sure and sweet. The fool abandons hope in the wearied journey of life. The wise gets going - holding firmly to the promise of a better tomorrow. He that gives up too soon fails to understand that life rewards with success only those who cling on to hope against hope. Those who hope when it is unfashionable to hope.
success.author: Abiodun Fijabi

success.quote: I became a course or a subject to those who were trying to teach me lessons in life, because they had to study me.
success.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

success.quote: Still the greatest success is salvation.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: The Scripture Is Given To You To Create The Picture of Your Lovely Future...
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: People who believe that money makes people rich have the poorest heart and weakest mind in the world
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: Your actions are very important to change your direction
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: My beginning was emotional, journey was painful and the end would be cheerful
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: It's always important before the trash gets in the trash, so respect everyone, no one knows which trash will become a trillionaire tomorrow.
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: If you are willing to pay the price for success then this world is all yours
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: You can't become a legend just by sharing your thoughts around the world
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: If you really want to know what life is, then just detach yourself from everything that money can buy.
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: The ultimate AIM of my life is to share happiness in all possible ways
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: The war has started, and the worst part of this war is that no one knows that the war has started
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: Try not to look forward 50 years, just do it, and everything you have done in your life will be connected to your future. You are not wasting your time working as a junior designer, or at the grocery store, or automobile sales man, trust me, 100%.
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: Do not stop until you win because it is important to change the lives of millions of people.
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: ज़िंदगी में पैर चलाना सीख जाओगे तो हाथ फैलाने की नौबत कभी नहीं आयेगी
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: I'm not gonna die before i serve my purpose
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: I really wonder how millions of people run after money everyday without the purpose of life, I probably would have died if I had no purpose in life.
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: If you are very much influenced by materialistic things in life then you are just passing your time on this earth, your existence has no meaning
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: Degree is just a piece of paper, knowledge is everything, if you are able to show your talent and knowledge then you will win
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: when you work for others, your purpose is greater than someone's prescription or prediction about your life.
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: जो कुछ नहीं करते वो कमाल करते है
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: if you really want to become a rich, then start sharing everything you have
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: those who give more than they receive, are the most powerful and intelligent people on this planet.
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: The super powerful person is the one who knows how to use all the powers to spread happiness in this world
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: Time is limited, everything else is unlimited. to accomplish unlimited in limited is real success
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: Make sure your plan of action is better than your plan, and your action is better than your plan of action, that’s what makes you successful in life
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: falling down is a great thing that has happened to you but staying down is the worst choice you have made in your life
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: if you still don’t have a mentor in life, then follow the entrepreneurial ideology instead of the entertainer in this world.
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: Do not allow anyone's opinion on you because someone who knows you better then you is only you
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: I share my words on the internet and social media, because, it is the most powerful way to spread your ideology around the world, and change the way people think about you.
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: I feel really happy when I see people succeeding in their lives, and it makes me feel better about myself
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: One life is enough to change this world
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: The most important thing is to appreciate people and wish them success and the most surprising thing is that 99% of people do not understand this.
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: We cannot even imagine the complex forces behind every event that occurs in our lives.You never know how and when any life experience will reappear. You never know when a coincidence will lead to the opportunity of a lifetime.
success.author: Deepak Chopra

success.quote: To believe in one's self is to take a worthwhile risk.
success.author: Ogwo David Emenike

success.quote: Success is about handling the setbacks, problems and mess, over and over.
success.author: Sharon Pearson

success.quote: Never let success go to your head, and never let failures go to your heart.
success.author: Anthony Joshua

success.quote: From experience in the past we create memories, which are the basis of imagination and desire. Desire is the basis of action, once again. And so the cycle perpetuates itself. In Vedic tradition and in Buddhism this cycle is known as the Wheel of Samsara, the basis of earthly existence.That’s why, if you really want to break out of the mundane, you must learn to think and dream the impossible. Only with repeated thoughts can the impossible be made possible through the intention of the nonlocal mind.
success.author: Deepak Chopra

success.quote: Take five minutes every day and just sit in silence. In that time, put these questions to your attention and heart: "Who am I? What do I want for my life? What do I want from my life today?" Then let go, and let your stream of consciousness, your quieter inner voice, supply the answers. Then, after five minutes, write them down. Do this every day and you’ll be surprised at how situations, circumstances, events, and people will orchestrate themselves around the answers. This is the beginning of synchrodestiny.
success.author: Deepak Chopra

success.quote: When you accept you have to rescue yourself, then you're adulting.
success.author: Sharon Pearson

success.quote: Attention and intention are the most powerful tools of the spiritually adept. They are the triggers for attracting both a certain kind of energy and a certain kind of information.
success.author: Deepak Chopra

success.quote: We're not here to hide under fears. We're here to do cool shit despite them.
success.author: Sharon Pearson

success.quote: Whom are we attracted to? People who have the same traits as we have, but more so. We want to be in their company because subconsciously we feel that by doing so we, too, might manifest more of those traits as well. By the same token we are repelled by people who reflect back to us traits that we deny in our own selves. So if you are having a strong negative reaction to someone, you can be sure that they possess some traits in common with you, traits that you are not willing to embrace. If you were willing to accept those qualities, then they wouldn’t upset you.

success.quote: India’s primordial nationalisms—whether expressed in language, religion, caste, or even commensality—would have pulled the country apart, as happened in several other postcolonial states, had it not been for the fact that India consciously gave itself a constitutional order that incorporated universal franchise and the rule of law; guaranteed individual rights and a federal system that promulgated separation of powers at the center and limits on the central government’s authority over the states; and established recurring elections that tested the strength of contending political parties and endowed them with the privilege of rule for limited periods of time. By adopting such a framework, India enshrined the twin components that mark all real democracies: contestation, or the peaceful struggle for power through an orderly process that confirms the preferences of the polity, and participation, or the right of all adult citizens, irrespective of wealth, gender, religion, or ethnicity, to vote for a government of their choice.
success.author: Bibek Debroy

success.quote: A bird seldom depends on the strength of the breeze for its flight. It relies solely on its own wings to soar higher.

success.quote: What is a word? What is the word death without its meaning to us? What is the word life without it’s meaning to us? Is it meaningless? Does it in fact have less meaning? Less meaning implies opposition. Less meaning than what? What is life or death without the meaning we attach to it. Without the words life or death, If In fact we knew them not, what then would they be? The answer is simple, nothing... no thing. So then what is a word, if not a fabrication made to solve the problem of not knowing. Not knowing is the beautiful landscape of life, of being. We act like we know what death is, and go on experiencing it while we think we are living. The word for this is irony or more specifically tragedy.

success.quote: I don't worry about how other people perceive me. I figure out what I want, and I work very hard to make it happen. Simple recipe. I didn't achieve any goals by having it given to me on a silver platter, through fibbing or exaggeration, nor through favours. When you work hard, the universe almost always brings people to you - synergy. The universe will reflect the energy you give it. Stop worrying about what other people think of you, or worrying about the limit(s) they have, in their heads, about your potential. The universe will bring you into your purpose organically. Nothing out of force tastes as good as what you have worked your ass off to achieve, and for which the universe synergistically opens up for you, and brings into your world. As well it is not about proving other people wrong; first and foremost prove your own negative inner voice wrong. The inner voice that internalized the negative energies of others. Sometimes we are our own biggest hurdle. And as a subsequent outcome of rewiring your inner voice, you'll leave others speechless at contesting their limitations of you...seeing the supernova you are.

Change passwords immediately, protect yourself and practice smart online behavior.

success.quote: Embracing an attitude of gratitude is a great antidote for the natural negativity within us and that surrounds us.

success.quote: How would you do what you are doing if there was no reward, no goal, no measure of Success or Failure attached to it? How would you perform if you only focused on doing something for the joy of doing it? When you live Life, working only for joy, then neither Success nor Failure can hold you hostage. Of course, please demand a premium for your service or offering in the commercial market, but please don’t fall into the trap of valuing what you do only on economic or material parameters. When you enjoy the journey and realize that it is the only reward, you will never be keyed up over the outcomes. This is the way to a perennial state of Happiness, to Bliss!

success.quote: If you want appreciation go by the applaud of the masses but if you want to truly succeed go by the criticism of the few.

success.quote: Mediocrity rules in this world, and successful is he who knows how to appease them - the mediocre class.

success.quote: Patience pays tons better than urge to get quick profit with same amount of investment.

success.quote: The world will progress with you or without you, it's always a choice either you part of something that really matters.

success.quote: Fear will keep you grounded in the wrong way; take the leap and soar.

success.quote: Purpose, Vision and Values are crucial to the journey of Life. Why are you doing what you are doing (Purpose), where are you headed (Vision) and what guiding principles (Values) will you never compromise on? When you are clear about these aspects of your Life then the result does not matter. Yes, there will be times you will get what you want, but that Success will sit lightly on you. And in the times when you don’t get what you want, Failure will not torment you, it will not weigh you down. Being unmoved by both Failure and Success is the only art you need to master to get through Life; this is what leads you to being happy despite the circumstances.

success.quote: إنّ جزءًا كبيرًا من النجاح الذي نحقّقه، ونظلّ نلوكُه فيما بعد، يعود في المقام الأوّل إلىٰ ما هو غير مرئيّ، إلىٰ الجذور

success.quote: Progress on the social ladder is almost always the result of progress in other areas of your life.

success.quote: Dear Life,I am always prepared for the Worst, making no space for sorrow surprises. Mistakenly Yours,Life Member

success.quote: Most of the maps that I create go from the nowhere of where I am to the nowhere of what I think is a somewhere. For without God, my nowhere and my somewhere will not take me anywhere.

success.quote: Fowls are incessant feeders and early risers, if we incessantly feed our minds healthfully and rise early to our possibilities and responsibilities, we will crow with success.

success.quote: Your improvement may bother people who are used to you existing below their level. They may openly campaign for you to get your life together, but they secretly relish their superiority over you.

success.quote: Hard work never cheats, it leads to success.

success.quote: There is no magic wand to get rid of haters. There is no secret spell to win them over to your side.

success.quote: It is a good time to remind ourselves that everything begins with a thought!

success.quote: As everything we do in this world, be it work, business, politics or relationships, it is through humans, and we may still be successful if we understand and use the basic laws governing human nature and behavior to our advantage.

success.quote: In the times of uncertainties, it is best to focus on ‘what we can control’ and just drop ‘what we can’t control’.

success.quote: In good times as well as in bad times, the basics of success remains the same. When you are caught up in the rat race and totally immersed in chasing your goals, it is highly likely that you might be missing the very basics that will define your success.

success.quote: The only quality to be successful and content is Mindfulness.
success.author: Renjith R.

success.quote: Death is the light by which the shadow of all of life's meaning is measured. Without death, everything would feel inconsequential, all experience arbitrary, all metrics and values suddenly zero.
success.author: Mark Manson

success.quote: Happiness comes from the same thing: caring about something greater than yourself, believing that you are a contributing component in some much larger entity, that your life is but a mere side process of some great unintelligible production.

success.quote: Is everything okay? How are you feeling?' I pause for a moment, still smiling. 'Alive. Very alive.

success.quote: That means the more something threatens to change how you view yourself, how successful/unsuccessful you believe yourself to be, how well you see yourself living up to your values, the more you will avoid ever getting around to doing it.
success.author: Mark Manson

success.quote: Focus on your goals, work hard and finish what you have started.

success.quote: Refuse to give up,. Put your best efforts towards the realization of your dreams.

success.quote: It appears that the prostitute, not the salesman, best exemplifies the qualities indispensable to success in American society.
success.author: Christopher Lasch

success.quote: If there really is no reason to do anything, then there is also no reason to not do anything.
success.author: Mark Manson

success.quote: Action --> Inspiration --> Motivation
success.author: Mark Manson

success.quote: Don't just sit there. Do something. The answers will follow.
success.author: Mark Manson

success.quote: The unprecedented COVID19 disruptions have made these basics even more relevant and critical for success in life and at work.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: To experience a crisis is to live in a world that is momentarily up for grabs. This book will help you in preparing yourself to grab the best opportunities and thrive in the post COVID19 outbreak era.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: COVID19 will have a deep and lasting impact on the world we live in. Our world will get clearly divided into two eras – Pre COVID19 and Post COVID19 era.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: No one knows exactly what will come, but one things is certain, our society—government, healthcare, the economy, our lifestyles and more—will change fundamentally and forever.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: If you're stuck on a problem, don't sit there and think about it; just start working on it. Even if you don't know what you're doing, the simple act of working on it will eventually cause the right ideas to show up in your head.

success.quote: Just shut up and do it.
success.author: Mark Manson

success.quote: If it feels like it's you versus the world, chances are it's really just you versus yourself.
success.author: Mark Manson

success.quote: There's a certain comfort that comes with knowing how you fit in the world. Anything that shakes up that comfort- even if it could potentially make your life better- is inherently scary.

success.quote: Mental strength will be the biggest key to success in post COVID19 outbreak era.

success.quote: All that we humans have achieved until now be it our space outreach or the most advanced automation, it is due to the power of our minds.

success.quote: We will need more of mental resilience; innovation, creative thinking and social connect to overcome and thrive post the COVID19 outbreak crisis.

success.quote: Mindset is the most important factor for success in any sports.

success.quote: At the moment of a decision, you are always right.

success.quote: When the odds are stacked against you, break them down, deal one on one with each odd, you'll have a better chance, eventually you'll end up with an even slate

success.quote: Our success is directly related to our clarity and honesty about who we are, who we’re not, where we want to go, and how we’re going to get there.

success.quote: Is God a Statue? Is God a Saint? NO! God is a Power that no artist can Paint.

success.quote: You may see me as the "Skin", but I am the One that lives Within!

success.quote: As you persevere and find success, the sweet voice of praise from your own mind and those around you will whisper, "You are amazing. You did it." Acknowledge that voice, but don't allow it to seduce you. Instead of dwelling on my successes, I see clearly the areas where I'm still growing and improving. However good you think you are, you can always be better. This is the nature of ceaseless self-improvement—you can always dig a little deeper, work a little harder, and push a little further than before. There is always more.
success.author: Chris Duffin

success.quote: There are many rules for success, but none of them will work unless you do.

success.quote: Treat people nice, because you'll never know who can be your breakthrough in disguise.

success.quote: Success in our society is currently measured through material wealth and not intellectual wealth.

success.quote: Make Every Day Your Life's Work. Make Every Moment Your Life's Work.

success.quote: Nothing that is perfect can be taught

success.quote: When you have no one to help, your helpless.

success.quote: Growth occurs at the intersection of thoughtful encouragement and action.
success.author: Mike Stagnitta

success.quote: Complete and uninterrupted awareness of one’s self beyond the scope of material form and removed from worldly creation is pure consciousness. To be is to simply be.

success.quote: The simple truth that many fail to realize is that we are much more than we construct ourselves to be. It is only until life brings, usually in the form of tragedy or unique circumstance, an awakening upon our soul, that we become aware of this truth.

success.quote: When you are your only competition in life, the only person you ever have to prove anything to is yourself.

success.quote: We are divine energy; simplicity and complexity made to be.
success.author: Mike Stagnitta

success.quote: Your unconscious mind is like a program that is constantly searching for problems to solve.
success.author: Mike Stagnitta

success.quote: There is no such thing as tomorrow. It simply does not exist.
success.author: Mike Stagnitta

success.quote: Your truth is the current force within you that creates positive energy and inspires decisiveness.
success.author: Mike Stagnitta

success.quote: The human ability to create what your mind can imagine is our greatest gift, though many people are unaware they possess it.
success.author: Mike Stagnitta

success.quote: The timelessness of existence should be all you need to understand the constant state of renewal and opportunity that lives in abundance in us.
success.author: Mike Stagnitta

success.quote: The question we need to ask ourselves is: what is success to us? More money? That's fine. A healthy family? A happy marriage? Helping others? To be famous? Spiritually sound? To express ourselves? To create art? To leave the world a better place than we found it? What is success to me? Continue to ask yourself that question. How are you prosperous? What is your relevance? Your answer may change over time and that's fine but do yourself this favor – whatever your answer is, don't choose anything that would jeopardize your soul. Prioritize who you are, who you want to be, and don't spend time with anything that antagonizes your character. Don't depend on drinking the Kool-Aid – it's popular, tastes sweet today, but it will give you cavities tomorrow. Life is not a popularity contest. Be brave, take the hill. But first answer the question.
success.author: Matthew McConaughey

success.quote: What does it mean to be self aware? In a sense, it's what it sounds like, but it also goes deeper than that. Self awareness is awareness that goes beyond the surface of the self; it's becoming aware not just of who we are, but what we stand for, and all the little things that make us up. When you become self aware, you learn about what makes you tick. You delve into the experiences that make you up as well as your thought patterns, perspectives, predominant emotions, and overarching beliefs. Self awareness without judgement is the key to a deep understanding of oneself, and the beginning of the healing process. Becoming self aware helps us to better understand our wants and needs, and only then can we move forward in taking care of ourself the right way, meeting our needs, and being secure enough in ourselves to go after our dreams.
success.author: LeeNor Dikel

success.quote: The secret to becoming unbreakable is realizing that you are already broken. We all are.
success.author: Brant Menswar

success.quote: Breakthroughs don't get planned, they are prepared for.

success.quote: People think good times will last forever…until they don’t.
