success.quote: When you take thestage you either shake or you make them stand.Choice is yours.

success.quote: When reading books or listening to podcasts or taking advice, remember that everyone is biased to their personal history. The world is complex and there is no single path to a success. Look for patterns that are repeated across many successful people, not single stories.

success.quote: To have success you must have had the option of failure.
success.author: Xander M Staley

success.quote: Life is a series of trial- the important ones are not the ones we fail, but the ones you succeed at at.
success.author: Xander M Staley

success.quote: Life is a series of trial- the important ones are not the ones you fail, but the ones in which you succeed.

success.quote: Conservation of energy," said Churchill, "Never stand up when you can sit down. And never sit down when you can lie down.

success.quote: How you are doing is often shaped by who you are doing.

success.quote: Learn from your history but don’t get mired in it. Don't build walls! Because the same wall that keeps pain out also keeps happiness out. The same wall that keeps bad people out also keeps the good ones out. The same wall that keeps disappointments out also keeps opportunities out.

success.quote: Inspiration within your inner spirit is neccesary for any success.

success.quote: The sacred success is to be saved from sin.

success.quote: Falsehood leads to wickedness, and wickedness leads to the Hell Fire

success.quote: Shall I inform you about the people of the Fire? They comprise every cruel, violent, proud and conceited person

success.quote: Shall I inform you about the people of Paradise? They comprise every obscure unimportant humble person, and if he takes GOD's oath that he will do that thing, GOD will fulfill his oath

success.quote: Do the kinds of things that come from the heart. When you do, you won't be dissatisfied, you won't be envious, you won't be longing for somebody else's things. On the contrary, you'll be overwhelmed with what comes back. (pg. 128)

success.quote: People have't found meaning in their lives so they're running all the time looking for it. (pg. 136)

success.quote: When the success of one is inspiring to others, it is the real success.After success, gratitude and dedication need to come, rather than arrogance. When the ego arrives, the decay begins, that may be leading to stigma in Society.

success.quote: Everything is within you. You need to discover it.

success.quote: Whoever believes in GOD and the Last Day, should serve his guest generously

success.quote: Art must never be labelled good or bad but as having value simply because it exists. For the brave and tortured soul who created it went to hell and back just so you could stroll by with your coifed hair and your clean fingernails and look at your pathetically myopic life in a completely new way.

success.quote: Do you really need that money there? Success can only come by starting with what we have and implementing it in our life. Fortunately, my life is not driven by those things of glory.

success.quote: Nothing is worse to an organisation than culture of fear

success.quote: Achievement, I find, has as much to do with what we don't do as what we do do.

success.quote: Without hesitation, I can tell you that it wasn’t the ability to get it right that got me here. Rather, it was the ability to learn every time that I got it wrong.

success.quote: Never having made a mistake is a success that is always inferior to having made a mistake and having learned from it.

success.quote: what's a failure to you, can be success to someone. Its all about how you define it.

success.quote: Life sometimes delays giving us the thing we are forever praying or working hard for, until it has managed to show us that that thing is not that important, or important at all.

success.quote: Some people get a lot of pleasure from sharing their success with those who were adamant that they would not or would never succeed, but get very little or even no pleasure from sharing their success with those who have supported them.

success.quote: Success may require many steps. But progress only requires one.

success.quote: Sorry Houston, but failure is an option.

success.quote: Success can be reached only by first getting started. Courage is something we call upon when we are afraid but know we must continue on. Determination is that inner spirit that keeps us getting up every single time life knocks us down and Will is that switch that we click on inside our mind that has no off button and controls every forward thought we make.

success.quote: Life is connected moments of precise stumbling; an infinite and beautiful dance you must learn to do with grace.

success.quote: To be great is to be a fruit from the tree of life. If you squeeze a "great," guess what comes out? Greatness. Most people live their lives without knowing that they are the roots of this tree, and the fruit that the branches of life help to grow.

success.quote: In space we find our self, and lose our self, because we come to find that we are what defines the space in form and in thought.
success.author: Mike Stagnitta

success.quote: To use space and not allow it to use you, you must first accept your authoring of it, just as you are the author of your influence on the world around you. So then we must understand first that we are the architect’s of our life, and the author’s of our story. The same is true for space. To enjoy it we must accept it for what it is. We must define the purpose of space, yet seek less purpose in it in order to extract greater purpose from it.
success.author: Mike Stagnitta

success.quote: That energy of each person is carried into the next space, and the next, the collective result of perceptions, thoughts and emotions create the experience of the world we live in. So if you want to change the world for the better, change yourself first, or better yet, lose yourself. You must lose the desire to control everything and instead find the love in everything. Oftentimes we need a push to get here. This "push" can be in the form of a healthy environment. One that stimulates innovation, encourages growth and embraces connectedness.
success.author: Mike Stagnitta

success.quote: Language was the best invention for the mind and the worst invention for the soul
success.author: Mike Stagnitta

success.quote: If you don’t want snakes, don’t let the grass grow long
success.author: Mike Stagnitta

success.quote: If something is free it cannot be measured. It becomes invaluable.

success.quote: Wealth is created from accepting the abundance you were born with.

success.quote: When you do only what you need, you grow. Just like a baby walks. He doesn’t desire to eat, he must eat, he does not desire to walk, he must walk. He does not know desire, he only knows need as an instinct, he must, because he is, this is why he grows.

success.quote: Formal education is like a billboard for the blind. It robs us of our autodidactic nature. Who taught the first teacher?

success.quote: The only difference between design and art is that design sometimes needs a reason, and art never does .

success.quote: If all of the people in the world understood the perpetual essence of existence, that is to say, to be truly conscious at once, or even experience satori for a moment, collectively, It would be such a surprise to many that we would likely experience a very silent and still earth for at least a moment. It would be a connected senselessness, and an indescribable illumination and awakening.

success.quote: Treat your first chance like it's your last chance, because it may very well be your only chance
success.author: Victoira Addino

success.quote: Success:- An artificial battle created by the human being.

success.quote: A good book writes the author

success.quote: It was who you knew and not how good you were that determined success in certain high altitude observatories.

success.quote: For no man has adherents on the day of woe.I gave to the beggar, I raised the orphan,I gave success to the poor as to the wealthy..

success.quote: If one fights in the arena forgetful of the past,Success will elude him who ignores what he should know.

success.quote: But no one is strong at night;no one can fight alone;no success is achieved without a helper.

success.quote: Your success is not based on the success of others.

success.quote: Happy is the heart of the king when gifts come to him.And when every foreign land [comes],that is our success, that is our fortune.What shall we do about it ? All is ruin!

success.quote: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, he will meet with success unexpected in common hours.

success.quote: Now this peasant came petition him an eighth time; he said: "0 high steward, my lord! Men fall low through greed. The rapacious man lacks success ; his success is loss. Though you are greedy it does nothing for you. Though you steal you do not profit. Let a man defend his rightful cause!
success.author: Miriam Lichtheim

success.quote: It’s never too late to have a happy childhood. To enjoy and express whatever it is that you want to express.
success.author: Andrew Poupart

success.quote: Even if you feel like you're giving it your all, but still not seeing the desired results; Keep Going. Sometimes the Key to Your Breakthrough is to Persevere and to Not Give Up.
success.author: Jeanette Coron

success.quote: The secret of my success: I don't compare myself to anyone, and I don't compete with anyone.
success.author: Marty Rubin

success.quote: I struggle to reveal my struggle to people who are struggling to believe I struggle in the first place. In fact, my real struggle is with my struggling willpower, which refuses to struggle hard enough to make my struggle a success.
success.author: Shahenshah Hafeez Khan

success.quote: Be your best, it is enough.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Every person has their own timeline of success. Others succeed sooner others later. As in everything, both timelines have both advantages and disadvantages.
success.author: Maria Karvouni

success.quote: Care the most. Succeed the most.
success.author: Maxime Lagacé

success.quote: A mere compliment has been the seed of some people’s downfall.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: Design your belief energy. Articulate it. Communicate it and manifest it. Belief energy is the heart of leadership and success.
success.author: Amit Ray

success.quote: Some people are a degree of impatience away from wishing a year were only a few weeks long.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: Loss, at first it naturally brings the pain, the restlessness, the feeling of being trapped; we struggle, try harder, but our mind stops thinking about the reason of loss, it just signals our body to go for the win, we keep running, mentally exhausted, physically drained but still no win; we try harder & harder but keep doing similar work which earlier decorated us with success, eventually it becomes a ritual triggering the euphoria of a absolute surrender, we get used to the loss. Every day the ritual is followed, but we get used to the loss like we get used to the unanswered prayers, we stop thinking about the win, although bad feelings grip us from time to time but it passes very quickly, And just as losers justify their loss, we become addicted to a thought process which only blames other people and situation for our loss.
success.author: Shahenshah Hafeez Khan

success.quote: Success is the key of complete determination.
success.author: pranita deshpande

success.quote: Pursuing happiness comes with being pursued by unhappiness.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: Success is a necessary niefortune of human life, but it is only to the very unfortunate that it comes early.
success.author: Trollope

success.quote: Be prepared to go the extra mile; there is less competition there.
success.author: Mac Anderson

success.quote: Sometimes you need to set aside your pride to achieve something you can be proud of.
success.author: Ernest Cadorin

success.quote: Jangan kita mengejar kejayaan. Biar kejayaan mengejar kita.
success.author: Syasya de Luna

success.quote: Premature success rarely lasts as long as delayed success.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: Dreams are the catalyst to goals whether it be to heal, to grow, to learn, to create, to imagine what could be or to strive to make it come to fruition. Dreams are the drive to succeed and to do the impossible and make it real and possible.

success.quote: Success isn't what makes you happy. It really isn't. Success is doing what makes you happy and doing good work and hopefully having a fruitful life. If I've felt like I've done good work, that makes me happy.

success.quote: The Church of Contentment and ProsperityNow offering the best stage shows in America declaring peace with the enemies of God.With flashing lights, stage smoke, visualizing tantalizing sights of women dancing on stage, flags waving, artist painting, preachers more like ringmasters of the ventriloquists' dummies taking it all in like a rock 'n' roll show for a fee of actors and celebrities called deacons and elders all in the name of some manmade Jesus!
success.author: John M. Sheehan

success.quote: The one who masters his mind achieves ultimate success.
success.author: Vinaya Panicker

success.quote: Enjoyment is not the result of success: it is a requirement for success.
success.author: Jo Owen

success.quote: If you wish to develop courage, power; if you wish to become a success, less timid, more aggressive; if you wish to improve your life in general, including your health, prosperity and so forth, you must practice breathing throughthe right nostril.
success.author: Hamid Bey

success.quote: Whatever the obstacle, you can overcome it and achieve success as long as you just keep moving forward.
success.author: Ken Poirot

success.quote: Most of our desires tend to reveal their pettiness a few months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, or even seconds, after they have been fulfilled.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: It's what you do in the dark that puts you in the light
success.author: Under Armour

success.quote: The less you care about suffering and pain, the higher your chances of success and gain.
success.author: Maxime Lagacé

success.quote: The fear of failure repels opportunities for success
success.author: Chido Tapera Mapungwana

success.quote: We try to hard. Try to be happy, successful and popular. Trying and striving creates the sense of not having enough, thus you can never have what you strive for.
success.author: Pelle Skogsberg

success.quote: You will become impressive the day to stop trying. You will become successful the day you stop being busy.
success.author: Maxime Lagacé

success.quote: There is no satisfaction like the joy of work, well done.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: When you're ready, nothing can stop you. If something's stopping you, you're not ready.
success.author: Drew Gerald

success.quote: Our dreams require us to betray who we "should" be for who we are to become.
success.author: Drew Gerald

success.quote: Self-help books help you to become a better version of your present self.
success.author: Deepak Kumar Apple Juice For Success

success.quote: You wouldn't know how far you can go in mastering a skill, or gaining experience unless you strive and give all your effort to achieve that.Those who mastered some wonderful skills like drawing, or writing, or learning a new language, or cooking, or whatever beautiful skill there is, they spend the time, and effort, and were very patient in seeking that dream.If you have the potential, then don't waste your time dreaming of mastering what you want, but work on it.
success.author: Noora Ahmed Alsuwaidi

success.quote: A successful individual typically sets his next goal somewhat but not too much above his last achievement. In this way he steadily raises his level of aspiration.
success.author: Kurt Lewin

success.quote: Many people really want to develop themselves, but not too many are alacritous to work at it.
success.author: Previledge Tafadzwa Makaza

success.quote: Haters need to see you go down to lift themselves up.
success.author: Oscar Auliq-Ice

success.quote: Your failures make a hater happier than their own success.
success.author: Oscar Auliq-Ice

success.quote: The lonely entrepreneur will struggle all his long-life career to barely make it, but the one who belongs to a network of friends will uplift each other all the way to the top ladder of success
success.author: Manuel Corazzari

success.quote: You become better by adopting better thinking.
success.author: Deepak Kumar Apple Juice For Success

success.quote: Keep looking at the finishing line in your way to achieve your dreams. Each step you take will carry you closer to your goal. Sometimes you will need to run, sometimes you will slow down to a walk, and sometimes you might need to take a break. Evaluate your effort, improve, and keep going; the only thing you will do wrong is to quit. Quitting will never take you anywhere but farther from your ambition and from all the effort you made so far.
success.author: Noora Ahmed Alsuwaidi

success.quote: If you have haters, the solution is simple: ignore them and keep doing what you do.
success.author: Oscar Auliq-Ice

success.quote: You can learn a lot from your mistakes when you aren't busy denying them.
success.author: Oscar Auliq-Ice

success.quote: Mistakes have the power to turn you into something better than you were before.
success.author: Oscar Auliq-Ice

success.quote: Past has no power on your present but if you feel it has means you are allowing your past to interfere in your present.
success.author: Deepak Kumar Apple Juice For Success

success.quote: Maslow was right. Insecurity is main source of ego and aggression. Achievements and success lead.
success.author: Talees Rizvi

success.quote: How full the cup of my life might be is based largely on the degree to which I’m willing to risk failure, with the degree to which I’m willing to risk success following at a close second.
success.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

success.quote: What does success mean to you?'Those are moments when I feel like I’m contributing something but I’m also receiving something. Reciprocity feels like success. (Melissa Harris-Perry)
success.author: Grace Bonney

success.quote: Failure is an event. A mere data point. You tried something. And it didn’t work out. But society makes it looks like a crime. The label of Failure that is pinned on you is far more burdensome than the act of failing itself. So, the simplest thing to do is to not let that label stick; peel it off and chuck it away! For the same reason, don’t take Success too seriously either. Life happens through you, not because of you! Your success is not your own doing; it is Life’s longing for expressing itself through you. And when you fail, it is Life’s way of teaching you more about itself, about the fact that Life, not you, is in control!
success.author: AVIS Viswanathan

success.quote: Il successo è una funzione della perseveranza, della caparbietà e della propensione a impiegare ventidue minuti per trovare il senso a qualcosa che la maggior parte delle persone lascerebbe perdere dopo 30 secondi.
success.author: Malcolm Gladwell

success.quote: The straight tree is the first to be chopped down; the well of sweet water is the first to run dry. Sir, your intention is to display your knowledge in order to astonish the ignorant, and by developing your self, to cast a light upon the crudeness of others. You shine, you positively glow, as if you carried with you the sun and moon. All this is why you cannot avoid disasters.I have heard the great fulfillment man say, "The boastful have done nothing worthwhile, those who do something worthwhile will see it fade, fame soon disappears." There are few who can forget success and fame and just return to being ordinary citizens again! The Tao moves all, but the perfect man does not stand in its light, his Virtue moves all, but he does not seek fame. He is empty and plain, and seems crazy. Anonymous, abdicating power, he has no interest in work or fame. So he doesn’t criticize others and they don’t criticize him. The perfect man is never heard, so why, Sir, do you so want to be?
success.author: Zhuangzi

success.quote: These ( negative) people were a natural trigger for my imaginative reasoning and idea development, even if it led to failure sometimes, but at the end, I am the winner, failure is just the first step in the path of success, but only, for those who learn from their mistakes.
success.author: Amr Okasha

success.quote: One of the greatest problems that we have as people is that we think too much, but we fail to take action; and it is at that point that fear takes over and makes its home within us.
success.author: Previledge Tafadzwa Makaza

success.quote: In life, if you ever wish to see obstacle, just take your eyes off the goal.
success.author: Previledge Tafadzwa Makaza

success.quote: ...the progress is in the process. The growth is in the doing, and the success is in the longevity.
success.author: Melissa Steginus

success.quote: Your action plan is your roadmap. It helps you get the wheels in motion, and it steers you toward long-term success: consistent, intentional practice. This is your path to creating and sustaining healthy habits that fuel you to keep going.
success.author: Melissa Steginus

success.quote: Negativity leads to fear, anxiety and weakness, Positivity leads to power.
success.author: Sophiaa

success.quote: Learning to crow: If we’ve been taught to credit our success externally and debit our failures to ourselves, we’re indeed in a bind. It is important to come to an authentic assessment of our talents and strengths, speaking from our center. [p. 91]
success.author: Jill Hackett

success.quote: Choose wisely that which you dare to believe; for once you believe it, you begin to live it.
success.author: Kayambila Mpulamasaka

success.quote: Be adamant about your success ; compassionate about your work ;honest with your relationshipand committed to self !
success.author: Sophiaa

success.quote: Focus on whether you are fulfilling your own potential than comparing yourself to someone else. The fact that you have a natural limit to any specific ability has nothing too do with whether you are reaching the ceiling of your capabilities. People get so caught up in the fact that they have limits that they rarely exert the effort required to get close to them.Genes can not make you successful if you’re not doing the work. Until you work as hard as those you admire, don’t explain away their success as luck.
success.author: James Clear

success.quote: We are all mysteries, to those who love us and also to ourselves. When you find someone who embraces you, loves and desires you every moment, accepts your mysteries and flaws without judgement, you’ve struck gold. How delicious is the thought that this mysterious complex creature, chooses to share a life with you?Too many of us undervalue ourselves by digging too deep into the mistakes we have made or dwelling on when we failed at something like relationships, responsibilities, careers, whatever it might be. All those experiences make up the mystery and story of who we are. We are complex beings, all together in this fucked up but beautiful world. Whatever the mistakes or failures of someone’s murky past that leads them to your door should be experiences you are grateful for and that is cause for celebration. All of us have had experiences, good and bad, and those make up the intricate tapestry of who we are.I often feel insecure in so many ways, fragile and easily broken even when I know that is only a self-defeating perception that sometimes rears its ugly head. I am doing what I love, and deeply in love with someone with whom I want to share my future and write our own magical mystery story. I guess what I am trying to say is don’t dig so deep that you end up cutting your roots and the lifeblood that feeds and makes you. Match your energy and vibration with what you envision. Believe. You deserve love and success, so go for it.
success.author: Riitta Klint

success.quote: If you want a great job, you need something of great value to offer in return.
success.author: Cal Newport

success.quote: It's not too late to start! Start right now anyway. Set goals and take action. Have courage to fall, fail and suffer. Don't quit. Persist with courage. Success will achieve anyway and be yours 100% guaranteed.
success.author: Lord Robin

success.quote: Success has whatever elements you wish to contribute to it.
success.author: Steven Redhead

success.quote: জাগতিক সফলতা নয়, শয়নভঙ্গির মতোঅনাড়ষ্ট সহজবিকাশ সকল মানুষ চায়
success.author: Binoy Majumdar

success.quote: It's not too late to start! Start right now anyway. Set goals and take action. Have courage to fail, fall, suffer. Don't quit. Persist with courage. Success will thrive anyway and be yours 100% Guaranteed.
success.author: Lord Robin

success.quote: The things that make a great job great...are rare and valuable. If you want them in your working life, you need something rare and valuable to offer in return In other words, you need to be good at something before you can expect to get a good job.
success.author: Cal Newport

success.quote: Man is so busy creating cosmetics for the skin, that he has not Discovered, what lies Within!
success.author: AiR Atman in Ravi

success.quote: Money is a neutral indicator of value. By aiming to make money, you're aiming to be valuable.
success.author: Cal Newport

success.quote: The cost of success is the energy necessary to achieve what you want, be this mental or physical effort.
success.author: Steven Redhead

success.quote: It’s just a Drama. We come and we Go. Why Fear? Why Worry? Just Enjoy the Show!
success.author: AiR Atman in Ravi

success.quote: Don't get so busy on your career that you forget to have a life. You CAN do both. You can make lots of money, become a millionaire AND enjoy time with family, friends AND be a great role-model as a parent. - Neil B Wood - The Best Practices of Successful Financial Advisors
success.author: Neil Wood

success.quote: Life means a struggle to makes it better
success.author: Uruj Shahid

success.quote: Carpe Diem means 'Seize the Day'! Make the BEST of it in Every way! Don't lose a moment, come what may! Forget about tomorrow, Just Live Today!
success.author: AiR Atman in Ravi

success.quote: You can handle what life gives you . . . why not handle success?
success.author: Jackie Cantoni

success.quote: Like the tortoise, stick your neck out to succeed.
success.author: Jackie Cantoni

success.quote: It is never what life brought your way but rather what you brought to life.
success.author: Steven Redhead

success.quote: I only want to repeat what you already know. There is no limit to how far a person can fall in America.
success.author: Peter Orner

success.quote: We think, "We are This", but in reality, "We are That"... Not the Body that we look like but the Spirit, in fact!
success.author: AiR Atman in Ravi

success.quote: * Success depends on previous preparation, and without such preparation, there is sure to be (a) failure.- Confucius* Success requires not the previous preparation since it depends on luck and insight, and that both are timeless; thus, such planning can't be a guarantee and warranty for success.- Ehsan Sehgal
success.author: Ehsan Sehgal

success.quote: Reading, literacy and learning are fundamentally important to establishing strong and stable democracies. Visit your local public library and expand your mind.
success.author: Jennifer Ritchie Payette

success.quote: Challenge your strongly held beliefs to know how far you can go in life....
success.author: Manoj Yadav

success.quote: Being good in decision making is the greatest wisdom.
success.author: Manoj Yadav

success.quote: Always remember two things in life. Life is a marathon and its takes one knockout punch to win a boxing match.
success.author: Manoj Yadav

success.quote: It's always a good time to step up and look up. What do you see? Hope for a better future.
success.author: Jennifer Ritchie Payette

success.quote: Choose the path leading to the betterment of humanity, harmonization and peace. It's well worth the effort.
success.author: Jennifer Ritchie Payette

success.quote: When everything gets awfully perfect I let my demons loose. Neither of us can't bear the thought of conforming with so little.
success.author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

success.quote: You don't have the experiences you need to succeed. There are people out there who you have what you don't have, speak up, seek for help and you'll surely get it.
success.author: Wisdom Kwashie Mensah

success.quote: Immigration is not a uniquely American problem. Aside from the former Communist countries, nearly every white country has accepted large numbers of immigrants, so there is a huge flow from non-white to white countries. There are two reasons for this. First, whites have built the most successful countries in the history of the world and others want to take part in that success. Second, only white countries permit large-scale immigration; others keep their territories exclusively for their own people.Different national views on immigration therefore parallel expressions of racial consciousness in the United States. Whites—the only people who dare not express racial pride—let in large numbers of immigrants who are changing their societies. Non-whites, who have a strong sense of racial consciousness, maintain their boundaries.No non-white nation praises diversity, nor do immigrants come to the West with the intention of sharing this gift with us. Most never heard of diversity before they came here. They come because their countries are unsuccessful. Once they are here, most probably want to live their lives essentially as they did before, but with a First-World rather than Third-World income. They want to keep their languages, religions, folkways, and loyalties rather than shed their foreign skins and become American.
success.author: Jared Taylor

success.quote: Success comes from keeping the ears open and the mouth closed" ~ John D. Rockefeller
success.author: John D. Rockefeller

success.quote: No one wins the Super Bowl accidentally. Be intentional, Be Passionate, Don't mail it in! You got this!
success.author: Dave Ramsey

success.quote: Life works this way – when you become successful, everyone begins to admire you, while before you attain success everyone will try to put their foot on your path so you would trip and fall down. Only one or two clever people might be able to spot you.
success.author: Tamuna Tsertsvadze

success.quote: If you want to get anywhere, you have to start somewhere.
success.author: Frank Sonnenberg

success.quote: Seek out success but don’t be fearful of failure along the way.
success.author: Sarah  Pullen

success.quote: Happiness is not pleasure - it is victory.
success.author: Zig Ziglar

success.quote: Get better at the things you care about most. This is the dark horse prescription for personalized success. It elegantly summarizes all four elements of the dark horse mindset.
success.author: Todd Rose

success.quote: يحب المتشككون التشكيك فيك بغض النظر عن جودة عملك حتى لو كنت الأفضل على الإطلاق. سوف يتم المحاوله بشدة للعثور على أسباب تجعلك تقع. إنهم يريدون رؤيتك تعانى في حياتك حتى نهاية الحياة
success.author: Sami Abouzid

success.quote: Doubters are loving the action of doubting you regardless of the quality of your work even if you are the best ever. They will be digging hard to find reasons to make you fall. They want to see you struggling in your life till the end of life
success.author: Sami Abouzid

success.quote: The question is not whether you have the money. It is whether you have the hustle. There's a difference!
success.author: Nicky Verd

success.quote: Be Brave and don't let it get you down
success.author: Sami Abouzid

success.quote: Finding meaning in life is a key component to a long and healthy life.
success.author: Oscar Auliq-Ice

success.quote: Creativity VS jealousy. Passion VS Money. You can win if you want to win
success.author: Sami Abouzid

success.quote: Of all the ways that the covenant can make you underestimate your own potential, perhaps the most deflating is when an institution insists that you adopt a strategy that does not suit you - and then reprimands you when you struggle, condescendingly attributing your failure to a lack of talent
success.author: Todd Rose

success.quote: But if you rely upon situational decision-making - if your pursue near-term goals while maintaining the flexibility of changing course if a better strategy or opportunity presents itself - you will always be climbing higher.
success.author: Todd Rose

success.quote: Doubters love the action of doubting you regardless of the quality of your work even if you are the best ever. They will be digging hard to find reasons to make you fall. They want to see you struggling in your life till the end of life
success.author: Sami Abouzid

success.quote: To put a finer point on the Mario Kart Theory of Talent: every vehicle has a chance of winning the race, as long as you operate the vehicle according to its jagged profile.
success.author: Todd Rose

success.quote: Anything worth having is hard to get, therefore – anything worth losing is hard to let go. Success is revenge.
success.author: DeMario Cash

success.quote: Those unwilling to take risks seldom win.
success.author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

success.quote: It might be said of me that I could have done it differently or that there was a better way or that I should have waited when I didn’t. But what cannot be said of me is that I didn’t try. And without question, I would rather have tried and blundered in every attempt than not have tried to make any attempt.
success.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough LPC

success.quote: Thriving in today’s marketplace frequently depends on making a transformation to become more agile.
success.author: Scott M. Graffius

success.quote: Make your work laser focused to create asymmetrical success and increase your time and personal freedoms.
success.author: Richie Norton

success.quote: There are successful efforts and there are failed efforts, but between these two lies a door which leads us to self-discovery. Success or failure is never permanent & only opening that door gives a fresh perspective to our efforts.
success.author: Shahenshah Hafeez Khan

success.quote: Knowledge is the sea of success, and Learning is the key to success.
success.author: Amrit Das

success.quote: By choosing to suppress your feelings you are creating depression for yourself.
success.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

success.quote: Hate, Jealousy and witchcraft is booming on social media platforms and has disguised itself as being savage or as black twitter. Where people bring down the ones who are making it and destroying their happiness and lives in the name of retweets and likes.
success.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

success.quote: By choosing to suppress your feelings you are creating depression for yourself. Some people definition of being normal is doing what they do. Don’t let that fool you , but everyday and anytime choose to be yourself.
success.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

success.quote: Some people can't congratulate you for your success , because they are waiting to celebrate your downfall.
success.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

success.quote: Successful people don’t use the obstacles of time, education, and money as excuses...they use them as leverage to get help.⁣⁣⁣⁣
success.author: Richie Norton

success.quote: Remain open to change and you will succeed.
success.author: Sarah  Pullen

success.quote: To succeed you need to be cause. To be cause you must communicate, as the only thing you cause is the communication with beings, people and things.
success.author: Meir Ezra

success.quote: Life moves on even if you fail at some point or unintentionally tread along the wrong path.
success.author: Shivanshu K. Srivastava

success.quote: It takes courage to be a successful entrepreneur. Thus, courage is the parent of success.
success.author: Jawo

success.quote: For success, doing is not enough. We must love what we do.
success.author: Debasish Mridha

success.quote: Success is attractive.
success.author: Scarlet Jei Saoirse

success.quote: I believe every woman must be high maintenance because it serves as a powerful incentive for her man to succeed.
success.author: Lebo Grand

success.quote: Exercising good communication skills are key to unlocking civility in the new experience economy.
success.author: Cindy Ann Peterson

success.quote: The second best thing to not chasing success is chasing success that was defined by you, not for you.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: Outfits don't define your character, your behavior does. Great achievements are born, not from fancy suits, but from great minds. And great minds do not need suits to feel and look important. Only the shallow look at outfits, but the wise knows to look beyond. Look at the person beyond the outfit.
success.author: Abhijit Naskar

success.quote: Once we’ve met our basic needs—safety, security, sustenance, and shelter—those same emotional elements, not material wealth, determine our level of fulfillment, or, as some may refer to it, our personal success. These parallel truths—that amazing achievement and lasting fulfillment for both individuals and organizations come from understanding and harnessing those emotional elements—are critical to flourishing in our new age, the Age of Ideas.
success.author: Alan Philips

success.quote: A few years ago my therapist asked me, "What do you want out oflife?"I said the first thing that came to my mind: "I want to besuccessful."He looked at me, puzzled, and replied, "What do you mean?" "You know what I mean," I said. "I want to be successful. Iwant to be wealthy, powerful, and recognized." In other words, I framed a conventional vision of success, the one drummed into us by popular culture and other social dimensions.My therapist chuckled at my naïveté for a moment and then asked, "Alan, why do you believe that wealth, power, and recogni- tion are the definition of success?" He then went on to explain to me that success is defined as "accomplishing an aim or purpose," but the definition of that aim or purpose is up to the individual.My mind was officially blown.
success.author: Alan Philips

success.quote: Up until that day, I had never really thought about why I defined success that way—instead, I’d been obsessed with how I would attain those things. That focus on the how instead of the why had really tripped me up. It had led me to make some very bad decisions and to experience some very unhappy times. When you follow the influence of mainstream culture—television, movies, magazines, and more—to elevate the goals of wealth, power, and recognition above all else, it becomes logical to take selfish or negative actions in order to attain them. After all, that kind of approach—playing the game, playing for keeps, as they say—is put forth as the way to achieve success and happiness. Machiavelli’s writings are often referenced to support this point of view—statements like "the ends justify the means"—but it should be noted that Machiavelli died alone and in exile.
success.author: Alan Philips

success.quote: It’s only when you free yourself from external definitions of success that you’re able to comprehend the folly of this type of pursuit. Ask yourself: What’s the point of attaining a goal if it isn’t going to satisfy your internal needs? All you’re going to end up with is some form of a trophy (money, a big house, a nice watch, some press clippings) alongside a big bowl of unhappiness and dissatis- faction. You can only define yourself as a success if the result of your actions is the satisfaction of your internal desires, not that of some superficial, outside force.It isn’t relevant if society deems you a success—it’s whether you believe you’re achieving success that matters. For some this may mean fame and fortune, but for others it may just mean putting food on the table every night for their family and having a loving relationship with their spouse. The determining factor is how you feel and what you desire on the inside. The first and most powerful step is realizing you have the power to determine what success looks like for you. Only then can you free yourself from the myth and begin the journey of living your truth.
success.author: Alan Philips

success.quote: Success does not come from thinking something, but success comes from getting done something.
success.author: The Rousing Words

success.quote: And individuals often are deeply spiritual or creative in their free time but don’t apply those same values or skills in the work- place. It’s only rational to think that what brings you success and fulfillment in your personal life will also bring you success and fulfillment at work. Therefore, all the ideals I espouse are applicable to both your business and personal lives, because both are made up of people.
success.author: Alan Philips

success.quote: Learning how to become better communicators and better listeners will help us enter this new age of the experience economy and walk, talk and grow with civility as our foundation.
success.author: Cindy Ann Peterson

success.quote: The day that I realized they were the same thing; the problems I hated dealing with and the opportunities I needed so desperately to uncover. Leading people to success became realistic for me. Problems are opportunities SHOUTING at you!
success.author: T Jay Taylor

success.quote: Achieving success is difficult, but each time you focus on your goal, you get closer. Believe it, you shall achieve your destiny.
success.author: Dele Andersen

success.quote: If you see a dedicated and hard-working person, you've seen someone closer to success. Never give up.
success.author: Dele Andersen

success.quote: Trust is the foundation of success. Only leaders and organizations trusted by society can create a long-lasting impact.
success.author: Ashwin Muthiah Chairman AM International

success.quote: Quitting is not a problem; not knowing when or why to quit and being a quitter is the problem.
success.author: Kayambila Mpulamasaka

success.quote: Most biographies and autobiographies are each merely a slightly different packaging of the well-known fact that success rarely comes quickly or easily.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: Success is made of 1% of luck and 99% of sweat.
success.author: Dahi Tamara Koch

success.quote: Nobody falls suddenly.
success.author: Lochan Chugh

success.quote: Failure is never fatal nor final. It is the very foundation for success.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: It’s a peculiar feature of human nature that we love to see those close to us climb up the staircase of success, but, behind us. If they happen to catch up with us, needing to share the space with them, we feel choked, and were they to overtake us, we feel morose, though they might remain friendly. It is because, used as we were to condescend to descend in our affections, we lose countenance, not counting our jealousy, that they too might seem patronizing from the altered stations." Benign Flame: Saga of Love
success.author: BS Murthy

success.quote: In vain the mind struggles, when it cannot reach the high level of the heart's feelings.
success.author: Sami Frashëri

success.quote: You must first become the person who deserves it all
success.author: Saurabh Bhardwaj

success.quote: I've failed over and over again, only to correct and make a new mistake but in this never-ending battle to keep doing so, eventually succeded! Gain perfection by inviting corrections.
success.author: Krishna Mohan Avancha

success.quote: You can't achieve major goals with minimal effort.
success.author: Rob Liano

success.quote: Don't be afraid to step into the spotlight! Your time to shine will be determined by you!
success.author: Tommy Swanhaus

success.quote: You cannot crunch the numbers on a dream. Your biggest dreams defy conventional wisdom.
success.author: Ray A. Davis

success.quote: To a man who has not succeeded we say 'You made a mistake'.To a man who ha lost at the lottery, 'You had bad luck'.
success.author: Paul Gauguin

success.quote: The beginning is hard," [Levin] went on. "By the end of the day they're restless. Part of it is endurance, part of it is motivation. Part of it is incentives and rewards and fun stuff. Part of it is good old-fashion discipline. You throw all of that into the stew. We talk a lot here about grit and self-control. The kids know what those words mean.
success.author: Malcolm Gladwell

success.quote: Dare To Dream... Dream Is The Bedrock Of Reality...It Gives You The Push You Need To Be On Top!
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Passion is the spark that put you on fire for combustion and propel the wheels of productivity that brings your ultimate success.
success.author: Lord Robin

success.quote: When your heart is pure and filled with good intentions, you don’t have to prove it to anyone. Your actions will do that.
success.author: Charles F Glassman

success.quote: Failure was always present; it changed its aspect, acquired new forms. Did one ever go from success to success? But one went, simultaneously, from failure to failure. What was it that I'd once thought intolerable? In a few years, it had become tolerable. The reasons for living changed. At the end, the great pang would be that death deprived one of the very, very simplest things; the simpleness of sight, the mechanical marvel of breathing. Ah, she mustn't feel the way she did. Nothing catastrophic had really happened. What one was good at didn't always and continually give one pleasure. Appetites died; ambitions expired; desire put on a different skin.
success.author: Alfred Hayes

success.quote: Because we so profoundly personalize success, we miss opportunities to lift others onto the top rung. We make rules that frustrate achievement. We prematurely write off people as failures. And, most of all, we become much too passive. We overlook just how large a role we all play—and by "we" I mean society—in determining who makes it and who doesn't.
success.author: Malcolm Gladwell

success.quote: Those 3 things—autonomy, complexity, and a connection between effort and reward—are, most people agree, the 3 qualities that work has to have if it is to be satisfying. It is nor how much money we make that ultimately makes us happy between nine and five, It's whether our work fulfills us.
success.author: Malcolm Gladwell

success.quote: [Greenberg] offered his pilots what everyone from hockey players to software tycoons to takeover lawyers has been offered on the way to success: an opportunity to transform their relationship to their work.
success.author: Malcolm Gladwell

success.quote: Let's get this straight: we all can win. Because winning is not a function of circumstances of birth. Nor is it a lucky dip, that places success within the reach of the poor and the unlucky. Whoever has doubts about his ability to succeed doubts God's ability to help him harness his limitless potentials. Any more doubters?
success.author: Abiodun Fijabi

success.quote: Marita doesn't need a brand-new school with acres of playing fields and gleaming facilities. She doesn't need a laptop, a smaller class, a teacher with a PhD, or a bigger apartment. She doesn't need a hight IQ or a mind as quick as Chris Langan's. All those things would be nice, of course. But they miss the point. Marita just need a chance. And look at the chance she was given! Someone brought a little bit of the rice paddy to the South Bronx and explained to her the miracle of meaningful work.
success.author: Malcolm Gladwell

success.quote: Once you get into the desert, there's no going back. And, when you can't go back, you have to worry only about the best way of moving forward.
success.author: Paulo Coelho

success.quote: Your success is limited to how big or small you think...Think Global to go Global.
success.author: Tommy Swanhaus

success.quote: The road to success is not easy to navigate, but with hard work, drive, and passion, it's possible to achieve the American dream
success.author: Tommy Hilfiger

success.quote: A true confidence is in distinguishing the real success and a real confidence is in extinguishing the true failure
success.author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

success.quote: A well-studied loss is worth a dozen mindless victories.
success.author: Ray A. Davis

success.quote: We can not able to train someone to become successful, they have to train themselves.
success.author: Allan Bridjith

success.quote: Don't let the anticipation burn you from heart, let it show fire on your successive move.
success.author: yusra paul

success.quote: The secret of her success was playing the same game men played for centuries—projecting their weakness and inadequacy onto the other gender, trumpeting the cause of self-empowerment; while joining the male force in their oppression of the underprivileged to usurp and maintain their power status quo.
success.author: Tina Sequeira

success.quote: Search yourself and find your passionStay in your circle of inspirational competence with emotional stability.Shine your personality for others to followHave fun, enjoy yourself, and model your success!
success.author: Joseph S. Spence Sr.

success.quote: Everyday you should choose to fight your struggles if there is anything you are struggling with, so that you will be liberated or be free from it tomorrow.
success.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

success.quote: Lose yourself in the aesthetic of being, and see how where you land.
success.author: Saim .A. Cheeda

success.quote: Successful people destroy what is, by imagining what could be.
success.author: Dr. Billy Aslbrooks

success.quote: Don’t just read quotes on success, but align with the laws that govern it until you become the science in motion.
success.author: Dr. Billy Aslbrooks

success.quote: Your thinking is the factory of life. What product are you producing?
success.author: Dr. Billy Aslbrooks

success.quote: For a dream to come alive, one must have absolute conviction that it will. To waiver the slightest in belief is to put the dream in jeopardy of abortion.
success.author: Dr. Billy Aslbrooks

success.quote: It’s very difficult to attack someone who is constantly blessing you.
success.author: Dr. Billy Aslbrooks

success.quote: You never know who's going to hold the keys to the castle. It's tempting to think you're too important to speak to the young intern who's been sent to interview you or the blogger who only has fifty followers. But if they approach you respectfully and earnestly, you should never be so stupid and arrogant as to dismiss them. If you brush off one too many smart kids, you're bound to make a lifelong enemy out of a future media mogul.
success.author: David Chang

success.quote: You do not know what you cannot see when you cannot see it.
success.author: Chad E.  Foster

success.quote: The greatest badluck that can befall a person is self-doubt. Fear can still push a man to greatness but not self-doubt: It would eat into all the possible chances of success one has instead. Stay bold. Stay on Course!
success.author: Asuni LadyZeal

success.quote: Without any self-sacrifice, how can there be a success?
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Whatever you do, Do your best,It will take you up the ladder to success
success.author: Charmaine J. Forde

success.quote: All of us are blind. Blind in some aspect.
success.author: Chad E.  Foster

success.quote: Don't let other people define your vision of your future.
success.author: Chad E.  Foster

success.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear. Courage is doing something despite the presence of fear.
success.author: Chad E.  Foster

success.quote: If you're not failing from time to time, you're not aiming high enough.
success.author: Chad E.  Foster

success.quote: Reaching the pinnacle of success through hard work and struggle with your will and wisdom is worth the effort, even if it is high.
success.author: Srinivas Mishra

success.quote: When our lives lay in scorched shambles, we cannot allow our lives to take on the identity of the carnage that lies smoldering all around us. Therefore, we must create something that irrefutably declares we are not what lies strewn at our feet. And so, we create successes that declare we are not this! Yet, the carnage remains.
success.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

success.quote: Successful people are willing to work very, very hard.
success.author: Meir Ezra

success.quote: Necessity, very often, teach us things that we seldom imagine doing in life.
success.author: Shivanshu K. Srivastava

success.quote: Procrastination is one of the loyal aides of poverty.
success.author: Sodiq Abdulrahman

success.quote: Those who share in our sorrows are fit to rejoice with us in our success.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: No obstacle is strong enough to stop those who trust in a purpose. Winners are not infallible, but instead they use the impulse of small setbacks as opportunities to polish their skills, leave the comfort zone and move forward with determination towards the success.
success.author: Prof. Vinícius Montgomery de Miranda

success.quote: Putting impact over income puts your income over the top.
success.author: Rob Liano

success.quote: Impact Over Income
success.author: Rob Liano

success.quote: Don't be disappointed by failure, always remember it is a part of success.
success.author: Tauseef iqbal

success.quote: A great personal growth plan feeds on strengths and opportunities that could be improved. What you can't get better at doesn't count as growth. Hey, Success is never a static endeavour- it is a mindset based on a continuous and deliberate upgrade of your person and your tactics
success.author: Asuni LadyZeal

success.quote: The greatest measure of success is not money but a calm and loving mind.
success.author: Maxime Lagacé

success.quote: You have to eat the shit," he repeated over and over during one of our first sessions. He had the tone and zeal of a boxing trainer. "Shit tastes good!" "What does that even mean?" I chuckled."Don't laugh," he said sternly. Marshall told me that my job wasn't to cook food. It wasn't about looking at numbers or commanding people, either. My company would live or die based on my capacity to eat shit and like it. "I am going to watch you eat as many bowls of shit as our time will allow," he said. We had plenty of time.Eating shit meant listening. Eating shit meant acknowledging my errors and shortcomings. Eating shit meant facing confrontations that made me uncomfortable. Eating shit meant putting my cell phone away when someone was talking to me. Eating shit meant not fleeing. Eating shit meant being grateful. Eating shit meant controlling myself when people fell short of expectations. Eating shit meant putting others before myself.This last detail was important. With Dr. Eliot, I got away with describing my MO as self-destructive--my managerial tendencies were harmful, but only to me. Now, according to Marshall, I was using that assessment as cover for my poor behavior. In my mind, all the people who had left Momofuku were leaving me. When they failed at their jobs, they were betraying me. Marshall pointed out the ugly truth that this belied. I believed that the people at Momofuku were there to serve me.I had always wielded my dedication to Momofuku with great arrogance. Friendships could crumble, hearts could break, cooks could fall to their knees and cry: all collateral damage in the noble pursuit of bringing good food to more people. I believed that I was Momofuku and that everything I did was for Momofuku. Therefore, whatever was good for me was good for Momofuku.
success.author: David Chang

success.quote: You need to believe more deeply than anyone else. You build a cult by showing everyone that you are willing to go further than all of them to see out your vision. You can't ask everyone else to swallow the Kool-Aid if you're not going to take the first gulp.
success.author: David Chang

success.quote: Be careful some people being good is not who they are . it comes with their job description. When they are off duty .They will show you flames.
success.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

success.quote: The risks are important to keep in mind, but they shouldn't necessarily stop you from pushing ahead with your idea.
success.author: Oscar Auliq-Ice

success.quote: Success is like a rose. Water it with the dew of preparation and watch it as it grows" – A.H. Scott 7/13/20
success.author: A.H. Scott

success.quote: I reckon failure to be the most universal unhappiness on earth. Almost everybody and everything are failures—failures in their own estimation, even if they are not so in the estimation of others. Those optimists who always think themselves successful are few in number, and they for the most part fail in this at least, namely, that they cannot persuade the rest of the world of their success.
success.author: Frederick William Faber

success.quote: The religious man is the only successful man. Nothing fails with him. Every shaft reaches the mark, if the mark be God. He has wasted no energies. Every hope has been fulfilled beyond expectations. Every effort has been even disproportionately rewarded. Every means has turned out marvelously to be an end, because it had God in it, who is our single end. In piety, every battle is a victory, simply because it is a battle. The completest defeats have somewhat of triumph in them; for it is a positive triumph to have stood up and fought for God at all. In short, no life is a failure which is lived for God; and all lives are failures which are lived for any other end.
success.author: Frederick William Faber

success.quote: Being lost is a sign of progress. Keep walking, the way will find you.
success.author: Kapil  Raj

success.quote: Success is not a choice but a decision to fail many times
success.author: Kapil  Raj

success.quote: You are not getting because you are not giving. For example, you can get sales orders only after you give attention, admiration or information first.
success.author: Meir Ezra

success.quote: What gets you to improve is your decision to put the pluses there - you put the good there.
success.author: Meir Ezra

success.quote: Successful people bring about new things. Unsuccessful people move around things which were already created by those who can observe – those who can create something from nothing.
success.author: Meir Ezra

success.quote: When you woke up this morning you woke to possibilities that have never been. Make the most of this miracle, my friend.
success.author: Toni Sorenson

success.quote: Grateful people generate a higher vibration, and a stronger energy because they run on love and awareness that life is a true gift.
success.author: Toni Sorenson

success.quote: People who master the art of gratitude are people who know the value of life.
success.author: Toni Sorenson

success.quote: Today's inaction is tomorrow's reality.
success.author: Noel Jhinku

success.quote: I understand how insubstantial this seems, how minor: man buys a coffee in French! But it was Gégé and Jean-Claude, and my own Walker, who reminded me how to do that simpest thing. They reminded me not to be ashamed. That is never a small accomplishment.
success.author: Ian Brown

success.quote: It is strange when we expect all students to do well academically and ignore the fact that individuals' abilities vary. If a child/kid/teenager cannot do well in academics and shows signs of distraction, it is an indication that his mind isn't in the strict form and obligations of the school curriculum.His cleverness and creativeness could show in other aspects of life. It could be in arts, sports, photography, computer world, gardening, carpentry, or any other field in life.Judging students' based on their grades and accusing them of failure is an excuse for the limited space the educational system provides to students to succeed in life.
success.author: Noora Ahmed Alsuwaidi

success.quote: The average American watches more than four hours of TV each day. In a 65-year life, that person will have spent nine years glued to the tube. Why? Simple. Life sucks. Life needs an escape. Life is no good.Show me someone who spends hours online playing Mafia Wars or Farmville, and I'll show you someone who probably isn't very successful. When life sucks, escapes are sought. I don't need television because I invested my time into a real life worth living, not a fictitious escape that airs every Tuesday night at 8 p.m.Again, majority thinking yields mediocrity, and for that majority, time is an asset that is undervalued and mindlessly squandered.
success.author: M.J. DeMarco

success.quote: Persistent endeavour is the grace to keep you going towards the pursuit of your goals against the great odds.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: When we are grateful for what we have, what we have becomes an abundance.
success.author: Toni Sorenson

success.quote: Leading the Global Market in this Golden Age of the 21st Century Requires Dominance, Influence, Permanence & Compliance! Excellence is the Atmosphere in the Ambiance, Intelligence & Sapience is All You Need to Maintain, Retain & Sustain relevance at the Marketplace.
success.author: Anyaele Sam Chiyson

success.quote: Emerson's own best insight into fame is in his essay on Character. "The most dismaying aspect of fame from the point of view of its possessor is not just that fame is generally disproportionate to actual achievement, but that the fame that we first assume to be a reward for work well done becomes instead an impossible promise of about future work. Fame casts an anticipatory chill over current efforts because it awakens expectations that can never fully be met".
success.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

success.quote: The Greatest success stories are beautifully painful
success.author: James D Wilson

success.quote: Singleness of purpose is the key to success.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: A failure is someone who gets used to the failure, by allowing themselves trapped in a vicious cycle of failure and forgetting. Successful people never forget the pain associated with failure. They work towards not getting hurt again.
success.author: Shahenshah Hafeez Khan

success.quote: A grateful heart turns a mundane day into a miracle.
success.author: Toni Sorenson

success.quote: Success VS LuckWhen you understand that you can influence your reality, you call it 'SUCCESS'When you don't understand that you can influence your reality, you call it 'LUCK
success.author: Dilan De Silva

success.quote: To be a versatile enterprising successful person one must be willing to have extreme focus and take risks when others won't.
success.author: Germany Kent

success.quote: You got to do the work no one else is willing to do, in order to get the kind of success most people only dream about having.
success.author: Jeanette Coron

success.quote: If a man uses his gift, he will be glad.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: You don’t need anyone to support you to achieve great things in life. You are the only one who can help you out to grow in life.
success.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

success.quote: GRATITUDE changes ATTITUDE in an instant.
success.author: Toni Sorenson

success.quote: For our success to happen, millions of billions of things, the vast majority of which were neither in our control nor in our awareness, needed not only to happen but also to happen how, when, where, and—in some cases—for how long, they have happened; and to happen to the things and the people to whom they have happened.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: The very act of seeking sets things in motion.
success.author: Laurie Buchanan PhD

success.quote: If a door closes on you and you cannot find another to open, carve out your own.
success.author: Joy Madden

success.quote: If you make a mistake, don’t spend precious time and energy trying to deny it or point the finger at someone else. Be a leader and own it, then spend your time and energy fixing the problem. As I’ve already noted, start-ups often fail because founders want to be seen as the smartest person in the room, which means not being wrong. Making a mistake is going to happen. None of us is perfect. But the difference between success and failure is how you handle that mistake
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: SOONER OR LATER YOU'LL BE MY HATER
success.author: Mukesh Yadav

success.quote: No stress. Just keep sticking it to failure until you give birth to success.
success.author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

success.quote: We can't become unique by copying someone else's formula any more than we can become successful by striving for someone else's definition of success. And really, what's the point of succeeding by someone else's rules anyway?
success.author: Reshma Saujani

success.quote: They aren't roadblocks. They're signposts.
success.author: Richie Norton

success.quote: It's the darkness that enhances the value of light, your success is defined by how you shine in adversity.
success.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

success.quote: Do" is a word of infinite actions.
success.author: Noha Alaa El-Din

success.quote: Doubt will not bring people anywhere. Those who succeed are those who make decisions and dare to take risks.
success.author: Titon Rahmawan

success.quote: If you want to succeed, you have to adapt to changes, not to memories.
success.author: Noha Alaa El-Din

success.quote: In successful relationships, perfection is the acceptance of imperfection.
success.author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

success.quote: I will work hard and harder as my luck is not on good terms with me. I will replace it so simply.
success.author: Noha Alaa El-Din

success.quote: Someone else's big success seems little to you! Your own little success seems big to you!
success.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

success.quote: Thomas Edison found 10000 ways in which a lightbulb doesn’t work. Find 10000 ways in which your dream doesn’t work.
success.author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

success.quote: Another gate of success was widely open for her, a reckless step led to an unexpected career.. Sometimes, that’s what we hope for after every mistake we make.
success.author: Noha Alaa El-Din

success.quote: You have to do all what you can, you never know what you are going to hear and where it is going to lead you.. Let’s do our best; it ignites my faith, at least, we are not just sitting in a corner waiting for a miracle, we ask the miracle to happen instead.
success.author: Noha Alaa El-Din

success.quote: After all, passion is an undying urge or quest to achieve, which does not allow you to rest until you reach your destination.
success.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

success.quote: Dreams? Ah, reality spoils the perfection of all beautiful dreams, so the dream can find a place in real life, you know how? By being dyed by the colour of reality, its pain and its bitterness. In other words, life will squash you so that you give up on your dreams and surrender to your needs.. And the decision is completely yours." "No, I shan't give up on my dream." "Then, challenge life! Know the rules, play by rules.
success.author: Noha Alaa El-Din

success.quote: Does it mean you don’t believe in your powers either? This is the first step one takes, down there, to one’s fatal defeat.
success.author: Noha Alaa El-Din

success.quote: What is life but an attempt to let our immortal self defeat our mortality?
success.author: Noha Alaa El-Din

success.quote: That’s kind of you! It means I am not good enough."Even "Good" is not a degree you acquire naturally." he replied.
success.author: Noha Alaa El-Din

success.quote: I am convinced that something out of the ordinary, if not truly unique, is occurring in Toronto. It feels like the city is emerging from a chrysalis.
success.author: Ken Greenberg

success.quote: Your career is like a garden. It can hold an assortment of life's energy that yields a bounty for you. You do not just need to grow one thing in your garden. You can do more than one thing in your career; in fact, the more diverse your talents, the more successful you will be. Seek personal and professional development. Continuously learn and challenge yourself.
success.author: Jennifer Ritchie Payette

success.quote: There are many kinds of success in life worth having. It is exceedingly interestingand attractive to be a successful businessman, or railway man, or farmer, ora successful lawyer or doctor; or a writer, or a President, or a ranchman, or thecolonel of a fighting regiment, or to kill grizzly bears and lions. But for unflagginginterest and enjoyment, a household of children, if things go reasonably well,certainly makes all other forms of success and achievement lose their importanceby comparison.
success.author: Theodore Roosevelt

success.quote: The Only Person You Should Try To Be Better Than Is The Person You Were Yesterday
success.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

success.quote: Success is all about finding your true potential and then using it for greater purpose.
success.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

success.quote: Our minds get overridden by goal setting and reward getting. Our culture has become so success-oriented that even kids don't get to play for fun anymore.
success.author: Karen Rinaldi

success.quote: When the desire to make it happen is higher than the fear of failure, success happens.
success.author: Abaida Mahmood

success.quote: Because we are so geared toward success and reward above all, we fail to set aside space in our lives to cultivate new talents and interests.
success.author: Karen Rinaldi

success.quote: The process of honing our skills is a lifelong journey, and the beginning of the process is possibly the most important part -because we truly need to discover how deep our love for it goes.
success.author: Kio Briggs

success.quote: You are wrong if you consider success as a goal, because there is no definite benchmark for success. The process that we have to go through is what counts. How we are able to overcome all obstacles and steep winding roads.
success.author: Titon Rahmawan

success.quote: Remember, success brings money, money doesn't bring success; and the way to success is to do something we're passionate about.
success.author: Kio Briggs

success.quote: A success and happiness principle that all animals except humans know - you can achieve wonders by loving what you do
success.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

success.quote: You continue to struggle to achieve your goals in life, and when you approach, you are struck by lightning.
success.author: Sami Abouzid

success.quote: The answers to making it, to me, are a lot more universal than anyone's race or gender, and center on having a tolerance for delayed gratification, a passion for the craft, and a willingness to fail.
success.author: Ali Wong

success.quote: All conflicts are rooted in emotions. If you can satiate the emotions, you can resolve the conflicts.
success.author: Krishna Saagar Rao

success.quote: If you don't know how you feel, you will certainly not know, why you think the way you think.
success.author: Krishna Saagar Rao

success.quote: Success is a mindset and not a point in time but an inbuilt combination of character, discipline, behaviors and set of principles that make who the person becomes
success.author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

success.quote: Certain emotions drive certain thoughts and actions. Knowing your emotional drivers is essential to regulate behavior.
success.author: Krishna Saagar Rao

success.quote: Empathy is not just about being in others shoes, it's also about being in one's own.
success.author: Krishna Saagar Rao

success.quote: If you want to be happy, drop the past, drop the worries of the future, focus your energy to fulfill the dreams in your heart.
success.author: Amit Ray

success.quote: Reading refreshes as well as renews the mind.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Everything you do, and everything you don't in life, is to satisfy an emotion.
success.author: Krishna Saagar Rao

success.quote: Those can't understand themselves, can never understand others.
success.author: Krishna Saagar Rao

success.quote: Failure doesn't define you, Giving up does.
success.author: -Dhinesh Kumar CEO- Point To Business Services

success.quote: You will certainly find whatever you are searching. Not just once, but many times over. Just be careful of what you are searching.
success.author: Krishna Saagar Rao

success.quote: Failure of success can be shattering,But revival of effort is unbreakable
success.author: Dominic J Anton

success.quote: If you can't keep it, don't wish for it.
success.author: Krishna Saagar Rao

success.quote: Мені пощастило зустріти в житті різних видатних і досвідчених особистостей — світових лідерів, інвесторів, музикантів, астронавтів, спортсменів, професорів, підприємців, артистів та письменників, лікарів-новаторів і дослідників [...]. Ось чого я навчилася у них: всі вони зустрічали скептиків. Декого й досі супроводжує чималий натовп критиків, яких вистачило б, аби заповнити стадіон. І вони за найменшої похибки кричатимуть: "Ми ж казали, ми ж попереджали!". Цей галас ніколи не стихне, проте найуспішніші особистості, яких я знаю, навчилися жити з цим, навчилися спиратися на людей, які в них вірять, і завдяки цьому вони й далі посуваються вперед, до своєї мети.
success.author: Michelle Obama

success.quote: Failure doesn't define youGiving up does.
success.author: Dhinesh Kumar

success.quote: Success is not success until it impacts the community of people around you.
success.author: Jerome Samson Ukoke

success.quote: Emotion is the most powerful driver of thoughts and actions. If you can figure your emotion, you can figure your thoughts and actions.
success.author: Krishna Saagar Rao

success.quote: Parenting is the privilege of constant failure... and being loved anyway.
success.author: Damon Thueson

success.quote: If you don't know how you feel, you wouldn't know why you act the way you act.
success.author: Krishna Saagar Rao

success.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
success.author: Albert Schweitzer

success.quote: All your identity is rooted in your emotions. You are what you actually feel, at any given time.
success.author: Krishna Saagar Rao

success.quote: If you are unsuccessful, the common advice is to "just keep writing." That way, you will have many books under your belt.However, to be noticed, you really have to loosen that belt and take those pants off.
success.author: Trevor Carss

success.quote: Your success or failure is a compound of thousands (if not millions) of micro-failures and micro-successes.
success.author: Andrzej Krzywda

success.quote: Failure and success have always both a dramatic turn. But unlike failure, which, most often, timorously withdraws by taking a U-turn, success fearlessly takes a head-on collision with failure upon failures until it clears its path along the way.
success.author: Danny Castillones Sillada

success.quote: If you make a mistake, don’t spend precious time and energy trying to deny it or point the finger at someone else. Be a leader and own it, then spend your time and energy fixing the problem. As I’ve already noted, start-ups often fail because founders want to be seen as the smartest person in the room, which means not being wrong. Making a mistake is going to happen. None of us is perfect. But the difference between success and failure is how you handle that mistake.
success.author: Ziad Abdelnour- Start-Up Saboteurs How Incompetence Ego and Small Thinking Prevent Wealth

success.quote: If you want success and longevity for your business, earning a reputation for integrity is crucial. People want to work with people and companies they can trust. Trying to hide a mistake and hope nobody notices or passing the buck does not inspire confidence or respect—from anyone, employees, vendors, or customers alike. Owning up shows integrity and whatever embarrassment you may feel is worth it because in the end people will likely trust you more going forward. It’s not the mistake that is a deal-breaker, it’s being dishonest about it.
success.author: Ziad Abdelnour- Start-Up Saboteurs How Incompetence Ego and Small Thinking Prevent Wealth

success.quote: Don't let your fear of success keep you from it
success.author: Bobby Darnell

success.quote: The habit of losing small battles gives way to losing the big ones. Failure can be permanent only when we fail to notice the regularity at which we are failing. Don't give-up. No opposition is stronger than your courage, make efforts, even if going down is inevitable better go down as heroes & not as sitting ducks.
success.author: Shahenshah Hafeez Khan

success.quote: Without seeking truth it is unlikely you will find success. The truth very well might set you free, but it’s not always fun. People say they want the truth, but more accurately, they want the truth that is easy to hear. They don’t want the painful truths that don’t support our decisions or force us to accept we were wrong about something. But without truth, you will never be able to course-correct. Putting the company first and your bruised feelings second is an important step in saving your start-up from failure.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: Everyone wants to get to the top but not everyone is willing to walk uphill.
success.author: Luigina Sgarro

success.quote: Communication is all about being curious and using the right words and tone to get what is not said. It is this one ability which ultimately makes one get the desired outcome. This ability can be learnt and gained through deliberate practice..

success.quote: It’s not your fault for what I thought. Last night, it was almost like I was scaling a wall and then looked down. I could fall, I could freeze against the rock wall, or I could keep on moving up. I've dug myself out of that hole already and said 'Never Again!

success.quote: where ever there's love, there's also wealth and success

success.quote: We learn to accept change graciously. 'Who did what to who' is a trifling matter compared with preserving a stable and peaceful mind. In this way, all change will be to our benefit and will be an advancement in our capacity to fulfil our potential. Life will reward us with love, respect, and success. There is never a day when the world is not asking for our caring, courageous love. If we share that love freely and bravely, we will always have love returned to us. The world becomes our home and its inhabitants become our family.

success.quote: When you dream before of what you are now, that's reality. But be sure that you have paid God your 'reality'.

success.quote: Sometimes if you can’t get what you need to complete your project ,task or whatever your doing. Choose to use what you have. You can’t stop your goals, dreams, success or what your doing , because you don’t what you need.

success.quote: Bringing an idea to life isn’t easy. It requires passion, patience, and, most importantly, the ability to execute.
