success.quote: ...but she wouldn’t leave the legacy she desired simply through prideful public displays, like some men did. There were advantages to a low profile. It was like a man to scratch his name on the banister of history, but Helen had come to believe that it was better to be the stairs.

success.quote: All at once the anger ran out of John Harkless; he was a hard man for anger to tarry with. And in place of it a strong sense of home-coming began to take possession of him. He was going home. "Back to Plattville, where I belong," he had said; and he said it again without bitterness, for it was the truth. "Every man cometh to his own place in the end." Yes, as one leaves a gay acquaintance of the playhouse lobby for some hard-handed, tried old friend, so he would wave the outer world God-speed and come back to the old ways of Carlow. What though the years were dusty, he had his friends and his memories and his old black brier pipe. He had a girl’s picture that he should carry in his heart till his last day; and if his life was sadder, it was infinitely richer for it. His winter fireside should be not so lonely for her sake; and losing her, he lost not everything, for he had the rare blessing of having known her. And what man could wish to be healed of such a hurt? Far better to have had it than to trot a smug pace unscathed. He had been a dullard; he had lain prostrate in the wretchedness of his loss. "A girl you could put in your hat — and there you have a strong man prone." He had been a sluggard, weary of himself, unfit to fight, a failure in life and a failure in love. That was ended; he was tired of failing, and it was time to succeed for a while. To accept the worst that Fate can deal, and to wring courage from it instead of despair, that is success; and it was the success that he would have. He would take Fate by the neck. But had it done him unkindness? He looked out over the beautiful, "monotonous" landscape, and he answered heartily, "No!" There was ignorance in man, but no unkindness; were man utterly wise he were utterly kind.
success.author: Booth Tarkington

success.quote: When you are closer to success, don't get upset by the tiny failures, no matter what happen, put more love, more awareness, more effort to your goal. The Sun will rise again.

success.quote: When you can't win by being better, you can win by being different. By combining your skills, you reduce the level of competition, which makes it easier to stand out. You can shortcut the need for a genetic advantage (or for years of practice) by rewriting the rules. A good player works hard to win the game everyone else is playing. A great player creates a new game that favors their strengths and avoids their weaknesses.

success.quote: If you do NOT see what You want to see in life, it is because of HOW you have been trained to look when you attended school. To succeed you only need to develop the ability to see what you WANT to see and NOT what others trained you to see.

success.quote: Music is one of life's most important behavioral motivators that creates energy and action.

success.quote: Sometimes the reason why our problem don't go away .It is because we glorify our problems too much rather coming up with solution.

success.quote: It’s so Funny how things can change in a second.

success.quote: You can always tell how successful a man is when his divorced wife still bears his name. ~ Nkwachukwu Ogbuagu

success.quote: In the Value Economy, you succeed by creating value for your company. You need time to create value, but a very different kind of time. You need blocks of your best, uninterrupted time to strategically focus on those things that you do for your company that create the most value. Low-value email and third-party requests? You’ll get to them, but only after you’ve invested the best hours of your week into your highest-value creation activities. The low-value stuff gets your remnant time, not your best time.

success.quote: In life when pursuing my dreams I accept failing until I succeed.

success.quote: Normal people learn from their mistakes.Great people learn from others mistakes.Normal people think that they know it all.Great people learn from coaches & mentors.Normal people test their own blueprint.Great people use success blueprints that are already tested.The results are obvious.

success.quote: Nothing’s so partial as the laws of fate,Erecting blockheads to suppress the great.Sir Francis Drake the Spanish plate-fleet won;He had been a pirate if he had got none.Sir Walter Raleigh strove, but missed the plate,And therefore died a traitor to the State.Endeavour bears a value more or less,Just as ’tis recommended by success:The lucky coxcomb ev’ry man will prize,And prosp’rous actions always pass for wise.

success.quote: I believe in the existence of multiple parallel universes that form a multiverse. And the only way to ramify with it is through our sole duty of following our own natural inclinations and our particular talents composed of many different realities. Hence, generating a dynamic energy capable of opening the horizons of the mind, producing new scenarios, and being part of this elaborate system of channels that plays an absolutely essential role and that, if it did not exist, would make life on Earth unfeasible.With that being said, I can only reiterate that we are all able of taking advantage of our own creative spirit. Unfortunately, the great majority desires and focuses exclusively on the rapid successes of wealth, status and power, and seek being compared to the great geniuses -without sincere dedication or passion, trampling on their own talents and imagination. And this can be felt in many cases where the technique is seen but does not convey any emotion. Consequently, the production as an end in itself does not satisfy any of those desires nor the existence of multiple parallel universes that form a multiverse.

success.quote: The biggest enemy of future success is arrogance, indifference and the unwillingness to learn, unlearn, relearn, change and grow.

success.quote: Even after 72 years of partition, Pakistan is still dependent upon India for both its sadness (when India succeeds at something) and its happiness (when India fails at something). What sort of Independence is this, dear Pakistan?

success.quote: Today, how can I tackle the fact that I want to be "one of the above", meaning, I want t be amazingly successful in my field of interest. success.quote: No matter on which path you are, keep walking. Even wrong paths can lead you to right path if you keep walking. You get stuck when you become a security guard of a path.

success.quote: Worry is not a waste of time, rather it’s the most efficient use of time, provided you are able to extract thoughtful solutions out of this worrying time!!!

success.quote: Do not let yourself become lazy or content. Do not stop trying to improve yourself and others. Don’t be afraid to fail and don’t be afraid of new experiences; because the moment you stop growing and learning is the moment you start dying.

success.quote: Between the extreme limits of this series would find a place all the forms of prestige resulting from the different elements composing a civilisation -- sciences, arts, literature, &c. -- and it would be seen that prestige constitutes the fundamental element of persuasion. Consciously or not, the being, the idea, or the thing possessing prestige is immediately imitated in consequence of contagion, and forces an entire generation to adopt certain modes of feeling and of giving expression to its thought. This imitation, moreover, is, as a rule, unconscious, which accounts for the fact that it is perfect. The modern painters who copy the pale colouring and the stiff attitudes of some of the Primitives are scarcely alive to the source of their inspiration. They believe in their own sincerity, whereas, if an eminent master had not revived this form of art, people would have continued blind to all but its naïve and inferior sides. Those artists who, after the manner of another illustrious master, inundate their canvasses with violet shades do not see in nature more violet than was detected there fifty years ago; but they are influenced, "suggestioned," by the personal and special impressions of a painter who, in spite of this eccentricity, was successful in acquiring great prestige. Similar examples might be brought forward in connection with all the elements of civilisation.It is seen from what precedes that a number of factors may be concerned in the genesis of prestige; among them success was always one of the most important.Every successful man, every idea that forces itself into recognition, ceases, ipso facto, to be called in question. The proof that success is one of the principal stepping-stones to prestige is that the disappearance of the one is almost always followed by the disappearance of the other. The hero whom the crowd acclaimed yesterday is insulted to-day should he have been overtaken by failure. The re-action, indeed, will be the stronger in proportion as the prestige has been great. The crowd in this case considers the fallen hero as an equal, and takes its revenge for having bowed to a superiority whose existence it no longer admits.
success.author: Gustave Le Bon

success.quote: Rocking the boat is the most un/anti-American trait one could bring to the table! Disturbing or challenging the status quo is disloyal. In this sense, ironically, success in most American workplaces often results in (or is at the expense of) human and intellectual failure.

success.quote: There is no success or failure, there's only life.

success.quote: The United States is a land that, if you work hard and keep your dream alive, you may or may not achieve it.However, if you cheat, lie, manipulate, and bribe, you will definitely succeed.

success.quote: It takes a lot of work to become an overnight success.

success.quote: Et moi, la nuit, lorsque je suis vainqueur, je remets à demain ma victoire.

success.quote: Mistakes are the enemies that I’ve made of them because I’ve chosen to believe that they are the stuff of my ruin instead of the ingredients of my success.

success.quote: Success is the ability to imagine and create a better future for ourselves, others and the cosmos.

success.quote: Try, fail, try,Until You die!

success.quote: Commitment, dedication and perseverance are a few of the keys to success

success.quote: You can't forget to do what you already did—if you can, do it now.

success.quote: I'd be lying if I said I wasn't at least a little bit terrified. The fact was, I could either let my fear of the unknown make me a victim, or take control of my career. success.quote: Success should be judged on how few people are homeless, not by how much more it costs every year to buy a house.

success.quote: A little bit of sacrifice is needed in order to succeed, if you don’t then yoursuccess might become short of what it could have been.

success.quote: If you have lived the life you love, who can take that away from you?

success.quote: In those moments of defeat and acceptance, there would be a dawning, for me, of where we needed to go. My feeling was always: 'I don't like this, but we'll have to meet the challenge. We'll have to step up a mark.' It wouldn't have been me, or the club, to submit to apocalyptic thoughts about that being the end, the finish of all our work. We could never allow that.Every time those moments poked us in the eye, we accepted the invitation to regroup and advance again. Those were motivating passages. They forced me on. I'll go further: I can't be sure that without those provocations I would have Enjoy the job so much.

success.quote: You were born a genius, but that seed was obstructed and malnourished while you struggled to grow in the jungle of life. Transcending these limitations to reclaim your destiny, happiness, success and fulfillment is what this groundbreaking book is all about.

success.quote: Only your determination and your strong desire will move you forward.

success.quote: Keep taking the shots as many times as possible, since you do not know which ones may succeed.

success.quote: Every defeat is the foundation for the final success.

success.quote: Success is often cyclical, with doldrums.
success.author: Alex Ferguson

success.quote: I don't like admitting, we were beaten by a great team, because we never wanted to say those words. The biggest concession we ever wanted to make was: two great teams contested this final, but we just missed out. Our aim was to attain that level where people said we were always on a par with Europe's best.
success.author: Alex Ferguson

success.quote: Is your only goal to attract numbers for popularity or attract people for engagement?Stop treating people like numbers. Engage to grow your connections, not just to grow your numbers.
success.author: Loren Weisman

success.quote: Your wealth is a measure of how much you trust yourself.
success.author: Meir Ezra

success.quote: I’ve done much too far to be looking back.
success.author: Jordan Hoechlin

success.quote: Refuse To Allow Limitations Stop You!
success.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

success.quote: Success is often experienced through the absence of a past sensation rather than the presence of a new one.
success.author: Daniel V Chappell

success.quote: Sometimes success happens when somebody you know, sees a talent in you and says, why don't you try something else.
success.author: Linda Rawson

success.quote: If at first you think it’s rejection, it’s probably actually new found freedom.
success.author: Emilyann Allen (pseudonyms Emilyann Phoenix and Emilyann Girdner)

success.quote: A problem is opportunity shouting at you!
success.author: T Jay Taylor

success.quote: Your day job funds your dream job.
success.author: Ken   Coleman

success.quote: Stop just talking... Shut-up and take ACTION! Let your words speak. Remember, when you talk, you’re just communicating with people. When you ACT, you’re communicating with the Universe.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: Business planning is better if a team of key stakeholders meets regularly to discuss and evaluate their marketplace assumptions.
success.author: Jennifer Ritchie Payette

success.quote: Today is a great day to divert your attention to something more positive than negative media. Life is far too short for skanky fodder.
success.author: Jennifer Ritchie Payette

success.quote: Today is a great day to divert your attention to something more positive than negative media.
success.author: Jennifer Ritchie Payette

success.quote: Life is far too short for skanky fodder.
success.author: Jennifer Ritchie Payette

success.quote: Good business relationships build trust and create a way to exchange ideas openly without second-guessing the other person.
success.author: Jennifer Ritchie Payette

success.quote: Collaboration is a business strategy that integrates innovative partners seeking blue oceans.
success.author: Jennifer Ritchie Payette

success.quote: One of my systems involves continually looking for patterns in life.Here’s my own list of the important patterns for success that I’ve noticed over the years:Lack of fear of embarrassmentEducation (the right kind)ExerciseEducation and psychological bravery are somewhat interchangeable. If you don’t have much of one, you can compensate with a lot of the other. When you see a successful person who lacks a college education, you’re usually looking at someone with an unusual lack of fear.There’s one more pattern I see in successful people: they treat success as a learnable skill. That means they figure out what they need and they go and get it.
success.author: Scott Adams

success.quote: The operetta was the product of a world of ‘laissez faire, laissez passer’, that is, a world of economic, social and moral liberalism, a world in which everyone was able to do what he liked, so long as he abstained from questioning the system itself. This limitation meant, on the one hand, very wide, on the other, very narrow frontiers. The same government that summoned Flaubert and Baudelaire to a court of law tolerated the most insolent social satire, the most disrespectful ridiculing of the authoritarian régime, the court, the army and the bureaucracy, in the works of Offenbach. But it tolerated his frolics only because they were not or did not seem to be dangerous, because he confined himself to a public whose loyalty was beyond doubt and needed no other safety-valve, in order to be quite happy, than this apparently harmless banter. The joke seems mischievous only to us; the contemporary public missed the sinister undertone which we can hear in the frantic rhythm of Offenbach’s galops and cancans. The entertainment was, however, not quite so harmless. The operetta demoralized people, not because it scoffed at everything ‘venerable’, not because its deriding of antiquity, of classical tragedy, of romantic opera was only criticism of society in disguise, but because it shattered the belief in authority without denying it in principle. The immorality of the operetta consisted in the thoughtless tolerance with which it conducted its criticism of the corrupt system of government and the depraved society of the time, in the appearance of harmlessness which it gave to the frivolity of the little prostitutes, the extravagant gallants and the lovable old ‘viveurs’. Its lukewarm, hesitant criticism merely encouraged corruption. One could, however, expect nothing else but an ambiguous attitude from artists who were successful, who loved success more than anything and whose success was bound up with the continuance of this indolent and pleasure-seeking society.
success.author: Arnold Hauser

success.quote: Live in alignment with your value, not your vanity.
success.author: David   Finkel

success.quote: Your 'why' needs to push your SO hard that you don't even come up for air sometimes.
success.author: Monroe Mann

success.quote: If you can see your legs, you will understand the focus and determination you will ever need to leave a life-changing footprint on the soil of our time.
success.author: Anyaele Sam Chiyson

success.quote: Your thought may become words,Your words may become deeds,Your deeds may become habits,Your habits will determine your character,Your character will determine your destiny.
success.author: Kudretullah Sak

success.quote: The success of a great will is the greatest driving force for the success of a weak will!
success.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

success.quote: Everything I dreamed of became a reality, and my reality became a dream.
success.author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

success.quote: When it comes to life, I would much rather have run the race well than have run the race fast. For if we understand life, we would realize that the first one to cross the finish line is not necessarily the one who actually won the race.
success.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

success.quote: Always look at all the award not so much as a symbol of your personal success, but as a reminder of the responsibility that you have towards the world, you live in.
success.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

success.quote: Rather than defining success by the number of people who love us, may we define it by the number of people we have loved.
success.author: Joshua Becker

success.quote: Freedom comes when you're Brave Enough to chase your dreams, and achieve the Success and Financial Freedom you want. In order to be FREE, you have to be BRAVE.
success.author: Jeanette Coron

success.quote: Success repeats itself until it becomes boring.
success.author: Marty Rubin

success.quote: Bad things happen to our life so as to favor the good things that will happen next.
success.author: Maria Karvouni

success.quote: Don't underestimate Small Humble Beginnings, because sometimes they can turn out to be the Greatest Success Stories.
success.author: Jeanette Coron

success.quote: Define where your significance comes from and base it upon your own values and principles.
success.author: Mark Villareal

success.quote: Women exhibit traits essential for strong, balanced leaders.
success.author: Mark Villareal

success.quote: Luck is waiting for you around the corner, enough thinking, start walking towards it now.
success.author: Kalpesh Jain

success.quote: Be more curious than cautious. You can't win unless you try to win, but you'd always lose by trying not to lose!
success.author: Nicky Verd

success.quote: Refuse any longer to grieve what might have been. There is another bus running shortly and that bus might be the greatest ride you have had to date in your business career. Don’t miss out on the blessing ahead because you are enamored with the curse of yesterday or last year. It isn’t worth it and besides, business opportunities are all around us. We just must be ready at the stop to get on and ride it to our destination. You know -the place where you may just become famous.
success.author: Chris J. Gregas

success.quote: Positive attitude towards your goal can lead you to success.
success.author: Brajesh Kumar Singh

success.quote: All content isn't king. Only amazing content is.
success.author: Upreports

success.quote: It would be a tough destiny even if Rincewind’s creative node was a reasonable size, but the particle’s karma had handed it the problem of hitting a moving target the size of a small raisin over a distance of several hundred lightyears. Life can be very difficult for a little subatomic particle in a great big universe.If it pulls it off, however, Rincewind will have a serious philosophic idea. If it doesn’t, a nearby brick will have an important insight which it will be totally unequipped to deal with.
success.author: Terry Pratchett

success.quote: I also began to appreciate how you learn far more from defeat or during difficult times than you do from winning. I also understood that it was actually OK to make mistakes, provided you really learn from them and always try to avoid them in the future - Frank Arnesen
success.author: Peter Mukherjee A Few Wise Words

success.quote: One’s ego can easily stand in the way if you want to do something good or great - it should never be about you. When I think about success, it has always been our success as a team of people and not just me - Frank Arnesen
success.author: Peter Mukherjee A Few Wise Words

success.quote: Be reminded that every time you furnish yourself with an excuse and believe it, you’re letting your life shrink and shrivel up. Instead of your definition of what’s really impossible growing – it shrinks. Instead of pushing your limits, you’re actively pulling them inward towards yourself. Cease and desist. When you buy into your own excuses, you live a smaller life and severely cheat yourself out of a whole host of experiences you never let yourself have – your excuses literally end up stealing your dream and you end up doing way less than you’re capable of.
success.author: Chris J. Gregas

success.quote: Self-awareness combined with empathy equals successful leadership
success.author: Niina Majaniemi

success.quote: Drill down on what it means to be simple and clear about what you want and what you want for others. If people can’t see it and if people don’t want it, then you can do magic before them and they will just yawn and carry on. 1-2-3 is the mantra that we carry because when we keep duplicatable, we attract success and that is the goal for all of us who call ourselves "business professionals." Keep the main thing the main thing and all will be well.
success.author: Chris J. Gregas

success.quote: Laziness and average are not the pedigree of an overcoming business specialist. You will be counting pennies for a long time as long as you are interested in BIG before you put great effort into SMALL, but MEANINGFUL steps. Make it your aim today to be a "champion" in the making. You are not going to be hoisted up on the podium this afternoon, but inch by inch, small but meaningful decision multiplied will get you to where you want to be and beyond. Don’t you dare despise small beginnings.
success.author: Chris J. Gregas

success.quote: Stop talking about what you are going to do and actually do it. That is not meant to insult you but to invigorate you. At the end of the day we do not get judged so much on what we say but on what we do – or fail to do. I rather see a sermon than hear one anytime. It’s the DOERS that inherit the earth. It is the DOERS that climb the ladder. It is the one who purposefully is in motion that creates emotion and excitement and that is what your client needs to see from you. You know what to do. Now do it and be amazed.
success.author: Chris J. Gregas

success.quote: SUCCESS "Success is the outcome of every struggles and the evidence of all agonies."#c9_fm
success.author: Cloudnine Fairmane c9fm

success.quote: For a successful life, you should have to learn from your past. Think the mistakes you've made in the past, but learn from that instead of regret.
success.author: Zeeshan Ali

success.quote: Creativity is the work of a Genius; Artificial Intelligence is the work of Technology" --- Shivon Thadhani
success.author: shivon

success.quote: Think and look like where you're going, not where you are
success.author: Constance Friday

success.quote: When you have "failed better" enough times, you will surely succeed because you have dialectically honed you skills to the level where you are vastly superior to your competitors. Knowing how to "fail better" is one of the greatest challenges and opportunities in life. As you learn the mistakes of each failure, your knowledge, resilience and talent grow enormously. Eventually you stand transformed, ready to be an astonishing success, tested in the fire, prepared to rise up from the ashes of defeat, to follow the wondrous Phoenix to the highest peaks.
success.author: Michael Faust

success.quote: Obstacles, challenges and failure will trip us to fall in life, but when we fall. We don't concentrate on the fall, but we concentrate on what we are here to do. We concentrate on what we do best. That is how we keep on shinning and keep on winning.
success.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

success.quote: FAILURE "Failure is imaginary, success is reality. Failure isn't created it always exists."#c9_fm
success.author: Cloudnine Fairmane c9fm

success.quote: Never allow yourself to stay at the bottom of your internal ladder to personal success. Take your spot on the top rung of your life.
success.author: Christine E Szymanski

success.quote: It's not about having the time, it's about managing the time you already have.
success.author: Rob Liano

success.quote: Remind yourself that successful salespeople love their product and their company, and they love to sell and prospect. If you don’t have that kind of love on most days and most of every day, then it is time to make a change. Or better yet, re-sign on the dotted line and start over. Doing the same things over and over again and expecting a magic carpet ride across the world is pitiful thinking and the kind of reasoning that will keep you poor with a capital "P".
success.author: Chris J. Gregas

success.quote: Success is very elusive especially when you are trying to chase it down. The more you obsess over it, the more it’s seems to fly like a bird quickly away from you. People don’t deem you a success just because of your bank account. People will wait in a long line someday at your wake because of the donation you deposited into their otherwise difficult life.
success.author: Chris J. Gregas

success.quote: While climbing the ladder of success outside, don't forget about the climb within.
success.author: Christine E. Szymanski

success.quote: Real treasure is not about what we found. Rather, it’s about the fact that we finally found it.
success.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

success.quote: Inaction is the biggest failure
success.author: Kalpesh Jain

success.quote: Failure in any arena is not final and it need not be fatal. It is another opportunity to learn something valuable that is going to make you more valuable in the marketplace. Isn’t that really what it’s all about? God never wastes experiences in our lives, and we shouldn’t either. Get back on the horse. He’s waiting to transport you to new worlds.
success.author: Chris J. Gregas

success.quote: In one case, you're hoping someone else will do the right thing. In the other case, you're directing your own life, even if someone else does something stupid. Guess which path is going to be more successful.
success.author: Dennis Prager

success.quote: In an era when Fear of Missing Out has its own universally understood acronym, recuperative rest and relaxation are not always regarded as the intensely worthwhile pursuits that they are. Instead, we are harrassed into believing that we must be constantly available to be of value, that peak productivity and performance are directly related to presenteeism, and that to snooze is to lose. This couldn't be more wrong.
success.author: Michelle Ogundehin

success.quote: Grace bends the rule for us when we accomplish in a few days what could have taken a lifetime to achieve.
success.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

success.quote: A bad day with little progress is better than a great day with no progress.Strive for progress not perfection. Perfect cannot be challenged. Perfect cannot grow.Progress means it is within your reach to grow. It is a true gift.
success.author: Millycent Mashele

success.quote: No matter how much success you have, there will always be people who hate themselves so much that they'll gladly project that hate onto you.
success.author: Paul Ritchey

success.quote: When people focus on the problem, they lose sight of the solution.
success.author: Dr. Mansur Hasib

success.quote: Ever since I started my work of world building I haven't taken a single day of rest - absolute, uncorrupted devotion to the cause, that's the only road to success.
success.author: Abhijit Naskar

success.quote: Everybody falls - make your fall spectacular and rise like a god, so that watching you even the voiceless regain their voice and the weak regain their strength.
success.author: Abhijit Naskar

success.quote: Definite purpose gives peace.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Cometh The Day by Stewart StaffordAll his life, he'd just been a pawnAnd each day, another false dawnThen the vagaries of the stateBecame his to dictateAnd his enemies never looked so forlorn.© Stewart Stafford, 2020. All rights reserved.
success.author: Stewart Stafford

success.quote: Recognition that comes fast, goes away fast.
success.author: Abhijit Naskar

success.quote: What hurts more; the pain of ‘what ifs’, or the pain of rejection? You decide!
success.author: Izey Victoria Odiase

success.quote: The problem is you want what other people have. You don’t want your own things. Success is different in each and every person. Don’t let your success be define by others. Success it is tailormade.
success.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

success.quote: Fighters that learn never lose".
success.author: Yuri van der Sluis

success.quote: You do not need to be perfect; you need to perfect your uniqueness.
success.author: Dr. Mansur Hasib

success.quote: While you're judging me on my melancholy, I am judging you on your success!
success.author: Somya Kedia

success.quote: Do not focus on problems; focus on solutions!
success.author: Dr. Mansur Hasib

success.quote: My first job out of college was at 211 W. Fort St. in downtown Detroit. The guy that hired me made about 150k a year and didn't really know, by his own admission, what was going on in his office (Room) during regular business hours. When I resigned, he was kind enough to send me a letter stating that I was in good standing while I was there. The letterhead (211) reminds me that as an alcoholic, I can go ahead and steal Steel Reserve High Gravity beer from Kroger, and they probably aren't going to be any more sophisticated than a Director at the United States Dep. of Labor. Thank God, they are not. That's what Success means to me. You can get your beer, and not worry about catching Covid19 from the Cashiers at these establishments. If you believe it, You can achieve it!!!
success.author: Dmitry Dyatlov

success.quote: जब पैरों के नीचे सेज़मीन खिसक जाएतो उड़ने का सोचिएJAB PAIRON KE NEECHE SEZAMEEN KHISAK JAYETOH UDNE KA SOCHIYEif your feetlost controlstart flyingあなたの足ならコントロールを失った飛行を開始しますbeneath your feetwhen earth shattersyou must flyあなたの足の下地球が粉々になったとき飛行を開始します
success.author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

success.quote: Masterful practice leads to success. If you constantly repeat and strengthen your mistakes in swimming, how can you expect better results?
success.author: Piotr J. Kober

success.quote: Our darkest moments are doomed to carry with them, the certainty of better days.
success.author: Jose Cossio

success.quote: The USA will present failing projects as American success stories to the global media.
success.author: Steven Magee

success.quote: What good is an idea if it remains an idea? Try. Experiment. Iterate. Fail. Try again. Change the world.
success.author: Simon Sinek

success.quote: The true mission of believers is not to chase after success but to enjoy a successful life in eternity by acquiring God's gift of salvation and spreading the good news of Jesus to the World
success.author: Manuel Corazzari

success.quote: Nuestros momentos más oscuros están condenados a llevar consigo, la certeza de mejores días.
success.author: Jose Cossio

success.quote: PEOPLE DON'T COME TO YOU FOR YOUR WEALTH AND SUCCESS. THEY COME TO YOU BECAUSE THEY TRUST YOU TO DO WHAT YOU JUST SAID.
success.author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

success.quote: A home that supports and sustains you can be your secret superpower.
success.author: Michelle Ogundehin

success.quote: If you have not succeeded it means you have not reach the end.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Perseverance is the price to pay for any achievement.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: I am composing my own music. It is mine, from my hand alone. I wrote it for myself and I wanted to share it with you. Do you see me?
success.author: Marie Lu

success.quote: Your failures keep returning to you, while your successes are something you always have to be convince yourself of.
success.author: Rachel Cusk

success.quote: Our true nature is reflected in how we respond when someone around us succeeds. We have two choices: to laud them with praise or to load them with criticism. The focus of our heart determines our response.
success.author: Jeremy Gove

success.quote: Ms. Haas," I protested, "I do not wish to commemorate our failure with confectionery."Failure? I never fail. I just sometimes lack the impetus to pursue success as rigorously as I might.
success.author: Alexis  Hall

success.quote: Everything you think stops you from doing something is an Excuse. Because the only thing in the world that can really stop you is you, yourself.
success.author: Akash S. Bansal

success.quote: On the sands of hesitation, lie the bones of countless millions.Who at the dawn of victory sat down waiting and waiting died. So always remember to keep moving no matter how small steps you take one day you will achieve your destination.
success.author: Dr Bhawna Sokta

success.quote: No one is born with success. God shapes trials, tribulations, and frustrations to make you succeed. It is always darkest before the dawn.
success.author: EBINEZAR GNANASEKARAN

success.quote: Failure implies a failed day not a failed life.
success.author: Amit Kalantri

success.quote: Some people are rightly pitied by someone or people by whom they are wrongly convinced that they are envied.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: Setting goals can help you gain both short and long term achievements.
success.author: Oscar Auliq-Ice

success.quote: There is success, and there is failure. The land in between is for those too weak to live.
success.author: Sabaa Tahir

success.quote: Only the steps of a one-step long journey can be taken all at the same time.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: Every successful person in the world got rejected in the beginning, which forced them to fear, but later through courage and strength, they conquered the fear.
success.author: EBINEZAR GNANASEKARAN

success.quote: Great Planning for Massive Execution and Great Execution For Massive Planning Can Generate Extraordinary Results.
success.author: Sandeep Aggarwal

success.quote: Success is not only measured by the profit you earned but the impact you gained by sharing with others
success.author: EBINEZAR GNANASEKARAN

success.quote: Stop daydreaming about success and start preparing yourself both mentally and physically to be successful.
success.author: EBINEZAR GNANASEKARAN

success.quote: Your thoughts get you to your wants, your want's get you to your should's, your should's get you to your must's, your must's get you to your actions, your focused actions get your dreams into reality. Believe its possible.
success.author: Anand Patwa

success.quote: Listening to other women's stories this year has given me confirmation, finally, that our expectations have been absurd. So many women I spoke with--objectively successful women--felt ashamed of their perceived failures.What if we're not failures? What if what we've done is good? At any rate, maybe it's good enough.
success.author: Ada Calhoun

success.quote: Resisting your success through Ignorance leads you to failure. Persisting your failures through awareness leads you to success. Resist your fears, persist your goals. Never give-up, persist.
success.author: Anand Patwa

success.quote: One success can only be achieved with abundant failures.
success.author: Yasmina Haque

success.quote: The master key to your brighter future is you
success.author: Sesan Kareem

success.quote: If you want to reach the heights of success, then step up and never look back.
success.author: Gaurav IITM

success.quote: In ever defeat there is a seed of success, just waiting to sprout.
success.author: Amit Ray

success.quote: If you do not give up too soon, you surely succeed if you stay determined.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Your thoughts create your success or your failure. They are your chauffeur and they take you somewhere. Where do you want to be taken?
success.author: Allan Rufus

success.quote: Successful people are products of successful habits
success.author: Sesan Kareem

success.quote: If you learned a lesson from a failure, you lessen the loss from a failure.
success.author: Amit Kalantri

success.quote: The highest moments of my life have risen from those I once thought to be the lowest.
success.author: Charles F. Glassman

success.quote: The problem is that giving too many fucks is bad for your mental health
success.author: Mark Manson

success.quote: The point isn't to get away from the shit. The point is to find the shit you enjoy dealing with.
success.author: Mark Manson

success.quote: A growing body of evidence suggests that the single greatest driver of both achievement and well-being is understanding how your daily efforts enhance the life of others…the defining of a meaningful life are ‘connecting and contributing to something beyond the self'.
success.author: Tom Rath

success.quote: I want to make it clear that as I move up in the world, my triumph comes not from being able to afford rent on an apartment with a dishwasher, but in being able to give back to the women who need it most.
success.author: Jessica Knoll

success.quote: Nobody wants a sales pitch. So instead of trying a hard sell, focus on telling a story that captivates your audience by painting a vivid picture of your vision. When you get good at storytelling, people want to be part of that story, and they’ll want to help others become part of that story too.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: Growing a company is a marathon that requires patience, dedication, knowledge, good decision-making, vision, and the ability to see the big picture.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: It’s one thing if a mistake occurs because of circumstance or a miscalculation or the unexpected or inexperience; it’s another if it’s part of a pattern of carelessness or ineptitude or laziness. Then it becomes a choice.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: Even when money and your finances are an acute priority, it literally pays to focus on the value you're bringing to others. When researchers followed a longitudinal sample of 4660 people over nine years, they found that having a sense of purpose in the first year of the study (based on a standard assessment of purpose in life) was associated with higher levels of both income and net worth over time. What's more, even when they controlled for other variables like life satisfaction and socioeconomic status, people with a sense of purpose at at work also had significantly higher incomes at the end of those nine years.
success.author: Tom Rath

success.quote: My take is that smart financiers wait until aha before they climb aboard the bandwagon. Entrepreneurs need to bridge the capital gap from idea to aha with expertise, not capital or sophisticated market research.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: People do business with people, and it’s essential that entrepreneurs understand this going into any venture.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: Keep in mind that pitching investors is a process that requires preparation, data, vision, and honesty. And even if an investor passes on this particular start-up, don’t burn the bridge.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: 80% great people, plus 20% great people equals 100% great success.
success.author: T Jay Taylor

success.quote: One of the most common mistakes that start-ups make is not focusing on building a brand starting on day one.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: You don’t need an MBA from an elite Ivy League school to find funding and be successful, but you do need to understand the start-up ecosystem.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: Ego is a double-edged sword. On one hand it is vital...But too much of a good thing can be dangerous.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: I'm not aiming for the stars, I'm generating a constellation of my own.
success.author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

success.quote: Being an entrepreneur is not for the faint of heart. Before you raise your first dollar in capital or make your first sales call, the odds are already against you.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: If you don’t envision your business growing one hundred times in size, your start-up probably won’t generate much interest [from venture capitalist]
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: The time to be asking tough questions about whether you can make your current job into a sustainable worklife is as early as possible. Start with a very basic question: Who can, does, or will eventually benefit from my efforts? See if you can answer with the names of actual people, not abstract groups....A commonality I have observed, across professions, is that your contributions come into clearest view as you get closer to the beneficiaries of your work. The more you can learn about a person who directly benefits from your time and effort, the more motivation you will have to improve that person's life in the future.
success.author: Tom Rath

success.quote: Endure the pain with praise, sure way of success.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Determination plus Persistence equals Achievement
success.author: Stanley T. Crawford

success.quote: Success stood in some people’s way of moving from being good to being great.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: You can overcome your obstacles, just use them as your magic carpet and ride to success.
success.author: Hopal Green

success.quote: Conman, fake pastors or prophets and fraudsters they all have the same target of people. They target people who want things without paying a fair price for them or people who want things for free without paying a price at all. In life , you have to put in some work and doing some sacrifices in order for you to make it. That is the price you pay for success.
success.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

success.quote: Luck never brings luxury to the lazy.
success.author: Amit Kalantri

success.quote: Instead of looking for one specific market gap, think much more big picture about what kind of market you want to be in for the long run.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: Starting a business without a well-thought-out, realistic, highly-detailed business plan that factors in all aspects of rollout is a recipe for disaster.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: Time matters; if you cannot do everything on your own, stick to your strengths, outsource the rest, and focus on customers’ ease of doing business.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: No amount of VC money or good marketing can save a bad product. Period.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: Character counts. A lot. The right leadership can be more important than the right idea, the right team, or even the right business model.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: At times it’s as if the Silicon Valley inmates are running the VC asylum. But what might seem like unicorn-crazed chaos from the outside looking in is actually carefully structured.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: It is time for a wealth creation revolution. And it starts with you.
success.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

success.quote: While recovering from failure, the bitter find comfort, not in the phrase ‘This too shall pass’, but in their hope that ‘They too shall fail’.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: It's wonderful to be ambitious after all of that success.
success.author: Noha Alaa El-Din

success.quote: Greatness is achieved when you feel you have it. The validation is only yours to give, no one else’s.
success.author: Saim .A. Cheeda

success.quote: Human Society Has Made Incredible Strides In Science And Technology Yet In Spite Of What Appears An Unstoppable Success March, A Small Poisonous Arrow Of Time-Wasting Obsession Could Be Our Weakness, Our Downfall".
success.author: Venugopal Acharya

success.quote: Our use of time is a critical factor in whether we will be successful or unsuccessful in the important areas of life. Successful people keep the main thing the main thing. They don't let their time fill up with busyness that keeps them from the important parts of their lives that really need attention.
success.author: Randy Carlson

success.quote: Successful people are not afraid to ask themselves tough questions and then go deep to get the answers. Unsuccessful people avoid the tough questions, and if they come across one, either they won't answer it or they avoid it. Of course, it's not enough to pose good questions, which is why successful people are also good listeners. Most people tend to be so busy formulating their next statement that they hear very little of what is said to them.
success.author: Randy Carlson

success.quote: The model of business success in the millennial era is that of dismantling social structures to suck up cash from whatever corners of life can still be exploited.
success.author: Jia Tolentino

success.quote: Is there really no hope?" our young woman asked as she stood before her."None whatever. There never has been. It has not been a successful life."No — it has only been a beautiful one.
success.author: Henry James

success.quote: True Success lurks in the nobility of head and heart'.
success.author: Dr Mallika Tripathi

success.quote: to measure their success as a society — not only from how much the economy grows, but also from how much their lives are improved, not just by the standard of living but quality of life.
success.author: Meik Wiking

success.quote: Good things will happen when you decide to make your own happiness a priority.
success.author: Aurora Berill

success.quote: Decide to believe in yourself. Be patient and strong, because there is no doubt you possess the ability to overcome obstacles throughout your life.
success.author: Aurora Berill

success.quote: Money changes some people: Many a woman goes from being ashamed of being some poor or broke man’s girlfriend to being proud of being his girlfriend or even ex-girlfriend as soon as she realizes that he has become rich.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: Oh . . . and I won an Oscar. When I traveled north from LA to show it to my folks, it showed up on the airport x-ray and I had to drag it out of my bag. Upon reaching San Mateo, I walked into the kitchen, where my father was still sitting and smoking like a blue-collar Buddha, and plopped it down on the table in front of him. He looked at it, looked at me and said, "I’ll never tell anybody what to do ever again.
success.author: Bruce Springsteen

success.quote: Think about your future in a positive way and you will move towards your goals.
success.author: Aurora Berill

success.quote: You are running too fast, in the false direction.
success.author: Abdullah Shawaf

success.quote: Success is waiting for you if you believe in your abilities to achieve it.
success.author: Aurora Berill

success.quote: The set of friends that surrounded me ranged from a girl who received a Porsche wrapped in pink ribbons for her eighteenth birthday to someone who was ecstatic that he had made enough money to buy marijuana for his mother as a birthday present.
success.author: Soo Jin Park

success.quote: Research shows that striving can become a bad habit.
success.author: Kate White

success.quote: In order to get what you want, you need to know what you want.
success.author: Debra Eckerling

success.quote: If you've truly tried your best, you've got nothing to regret.
success.author: Pep Talk Radio

success.quote: The need is just to put the right piece, at the right place, at the right time.
success.author: Manan Verma

success.quote: The right moment will never exist until and unless you create it.
success.author: Manan Verma

success.quote: The only person you have to defeat in life is yourself!
success.author: Akash S. Bansal

success.quote: We cannot have, but can lose, everything.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: In a world dictated by "likes", "followers", Jordans, Red Bottoms, luxury bags, who’s got the "drip", and driving high-priced cars, you have to look past all this "noise" in order to grasp what real, solid, generationally transferable success looks like.
success.author: Carlos Wallace

success.quote: Success and wealth are not loud. Those who attain success don’t put it on display. They understand that whether or not you are impressed by what you perceive as the trappings of success will not add one red-cent to their investments. Your approval does not earn interest.
success.author: Carlos Wallace

success.quote: Kobe figured it out. In the end, the only thing that will come across loud and clear is his legacy. And that, to me, is the greatest success imaginable.
success.author: Carlos Wallace

success.quote: She chastised me roundly for my "failings". I prefer to call them uneven successes.
success.author: Sebastian Moran

success.quote: Getting success in a wrong way is better than getting failure in a good way.
success.author: pranita deshpande

success.quote: People try to understand me and what I do. I don’t want to be understood. Don’t put me in a box until I’m dead.
success.author: Richie Norton

success.quote: Interpreting criticism as a subjective opinion with a solution instead of a personalrebuke will help you grow, build better relationships, become more successful.
success.author: Dr.Prem jagyasi

success.quote: Sometimes defeats are the best outcomes. To react to adversity is a quality.
success.author: Alex Ferguson

success.quote: Take good note of it. Nothing is too small. Record even your doubts and guesses. Then afterwards it will be of interest how true you guess. We can learn from failure, not from success! (pg.121)
success.author: S.G.D. Singh

success.quote: If you are ready to accept your success, then why not failure? For, both success and failure are your own.
success.author: Monika Chhetri

success.quote: Who is someone you admire who has the results you’d like to model? Learn from them.
success.author: Richie Norton

success.quote: There are things money can't buy and hard work can't win. One of them is happiness.
success.author: Ray Kroc

success.quote: It is critical to learn how to take the opposite view of failure. Failure can be viewed as a necessary ingredient in the recipe for future success. But aren’t these just empty phrases? Why do we need failure?First of all, whenever you fail to succeed at something, you enter the "learning zone". In this state your brain is capable of learning new things that you would otherwise never learn. Thanks to this, your chances of managing a similar situation in the future are increased.Second of all, in spite of failure, just trying was already beneficial. It means you have left your comfort zone and have performed an act of small heroism. As my grandfather used to say, << "Even falling flat on your face is a step forward." >>
success.author: Petr Ludwig

success.quote: There is a certain likelihood that at some point or another fate will unexpectedly drop a brick on your head. If this ever happens to you, you need to use your Inner-Switch in a different mode, in one based on the idea that ... "Success doesn’t mean you never fall; it means you know how to get up quick.
success.author: Petr Ludwig

success.quote: Don’t put me in a box until I’m dead.
success.author: Richie Norton

success.quote: When we believe, trust, and take direction from the perspective that our setbacks are in fact setups for success, then it increases the likelihood of future victories.
success.author: Charles F Glassman

success.quote: If they weren't there during the STRUGGLES, be mindful of how you let them into the END RESULTS!
success.author: Hopal Green

success.quote: In spite of the concerted press campaign to transform me into some upstart wordsmith who had inexplicably won the pools ('Osborne mellows now he's on £1,000 a week'), I was not earning great sums from any of the three plays now that tow of them had finished their Broadway runs.
success.author: John Osborne

success.quote: It is impossible to grant someone happiness. The best you can do, as the Declaration of Independence put it, is to give him the freedom to pursue happiness. Happiness is not a tangible thing, it's byproduct of achievement.
success.author: Ray Kroc

success.quote: Achievement must be made against the possibility of failure, against the risk of defeat. It is no achievement to walk a tightrope laid flat on the floor. Where there is no risk, there can be no pride in achievement and, consequently, no happiness.
success.author: Ray Kroc

success.quote: Nat and I are entrepreneurs. It’s been feast of famine over the years. One of the greatest blessings in our lives is that when times get tough, we are willing to do the hard and necessary…even if that means digging out cans from the trash can at the park to recycle them for money and use the change to get gas to drive into town to buy groceries (true story).
success.author: Richie Norton

success.quote: Love, don't fight. But fight for what you love.
success.author: Richie Norton

success.quote: If you're examining successful people, look at their mother and father, study what they did, for clues about energy and motivation.
success.author: Alex Ferguson

success.quote: Origins should never be a barrier to success. A modest start in life can be a help more than a hindrance. If you're examining successful people, look at their mother and father, study what they did, for clues about energy and motivation.
success.author: Alex Ferguson

success.quote: A person who knows to withstand knows to stand
success.author: J. Nedumaan

success.quote: A person doesn't try to obtain freedom if they think they're already free.
success.author: Jasun Ether

success.quote: Give it all you have got.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: You don't fail when you get into a problem, it's when you get stuck into it.
success.author: Mahendar Singh Jakhar

success.quote: Every successful man knows where he is not good at, and then start by not believing it..!
success.author: Mahendar Singh Jakhar

success.quote: If you believe that business is driven wholly by the people within it, then you’ll agree that getting brutally honest with and about the people in your workplace is critical to achieving your goals.
success.author: Peter Kozodoy

success.quote: Getting honest with the self requires self-awareness, that elusive character trait that all want, most insist they have, and yet very few truly possess.
success.author: Peter Kozodoy

success.quote: Be driven to succeed or,get run over.
success.author: Rob Liano

success.quote: Trying new things, aiming high, and taking bold risks, can lead to failure or success. Putting yourself out there means you might fail miserably or succeed tremendously—or anywhere in between. You don’t get to decide. But you do get to try.
success.author: Michele Meek

success.quote: Being wealthy has nothing to do with skin color.
success.author: Thebe Kegomoditswe

success.quote: If you are authentic don't be afraid of people who try to copy you.
success.author: Thebe Kegomoditswe

success.quote: Success is like a high profile person and "Struggle" is her grumpy secretary who doesn’t let you meet her easily. When you befriend "Success", when you become worthy of her friendship, you can meet her directly.
success.author: Shunya

success.quote: Skills are important.Ethics are necessary.Competence is desirable.Character is crucial.
success.author: Hrishikesh Agnihotri

success.quote: How you handle success says a lot about you.
success.author: Frank Sonnenberg

success.quote: What We Are Today Is A Result Of Our Choices Made In The Past !
success.author: Dilshad Merchant

success.quote: It's no longer about where you go in the world to explore the opportunities. It's about how you explore the world of opportunities from where you are.
success.author: Maulik Parekh

success.quote: A desired thing often comes with seeds of at least one desire.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: Preparedness is not always about getting it super perfect. Its about getting into a positive habit and building discipline
success.author: Janna Cachola

success.quote: Je ne veux pas triompher, je veux vivre.
success.author: Éric-Emmanuel Schmitt

success.quote: Be an opportunist, rest will follow!
success.author: Somya Kedia

success.quote: Ne t'attarde pas à l'ornière des résultats. (Don't linger in the rut of success)
success.author: René Char

success.quote: Successful architects tend to be highly skilled in presenting and arguing for a proposed design, both to clients and to colleagues. The rhetoric of these presentation is often filled with metaphors that capture the leading concepts as well as the important experimental or sensual qualities of the design.
success.author: Christoph Grafe

success.quote: প্রতিপক্ষকে কখনো দুর্বল ভাবতে নেই, প্রতিটা পদক্ষেপ মুল্যবান। প্রস্তুতি কখনোই পর্যাপ্ত হয় না। তাই যতটা সম্ভব প্রস্তুত হওয়া প্রয়োজন তাতে পরাজয়ের আশঙ্কা কম থাকে।
success.author: G.K. Dutta

success.quote: Religion allies itself with auto-suggestion and psychotherapy to help man in his business activities. In the twenties one had not yet called upon God for purposes of "improving one's personality." The best-seller in the year 1938, Dale Carnegie's How to Win Friends and Influence People, remained on a strictly secular level. What was the function of Carnegie's book at that time is the function of our greatest bestseller today, The Power of Positive Thinking by the Reverend N. V. Peale. In this religious book it is not even questioned whether our dominant concern with success is in itself in accordance with the spirit of monotheistic religion. On the contrary, this supreme aim is never doubted, but belief in God and prayer is recommended as a means to increase one's ability to be successful. Just as modern psychiatrists recommend happiness of the employee, in order to be more appealing to the customers, some ministers recommend love of God in order to be more successful. "Make God your partner", means to make God a partner in business, rather than to become one with Him in love, justice and truth. Just as brotherly love has been replaced by impersonal fairness, God has been transformed into a remote General Director of Universe, Inc.; you know that he is there, he runs the show (although it would probably run without him too), you never see him, but you acknowledge his leadership while you are "doing your part.
success.author: Erich Fromm

success.quote: the only path you should follow is the one that God has in mind for your greatest purpose
success.author: Manuel Corazzari

success.quote: the way to change the entire world starts with a small baby step
success.author: Manuel Corazzari

success.quote: Better to fail on your own terms than succeed on someone else's.
success.author: Marty Rubin

success.quote: Everything is fascinating. It’s fascinating that online Illuminism has so often attracted the wrong kind of people, and it’s fascinating to work out how to rectify the problem and find the right audience. Being fascinated by every problem and determined to overcome each one is the key to progress. Failing better is the dialectic in action. To adopt Nietzsche’s outlook, the greater the challenge, the greater the glory. The greater the resistance, the greater the will required to triumph over it. Frankly, our whole game is to find those people willing to accept the toughest challenges. For are those not the gods? And if people run away from the fight because it’s too daunting for them, then it’s no loss. They have simply proved they weren’t fit for purpose.
success.author: Thomas Stark

success.quote: Do not look at my success and think it is easy. I failed more than I can remember, but I did it.
success.author: Muntadher Saleh

success.quote: Better failure on one's own terms than success on someone else's.
success.author: Marty Rubin

success.quote: If we didn’t catch enough fish, or fish of high enough quality, too bad. That’s life. No one has the right to win. Victory has to be fought for. It needs a Fight Club, not a Flight Club.
success.author: Brother Abaris

success.quote: We succeed if you succeed ... so succeed. Nothing would please us more than for those who have appreciated our work to exceed it, to excel, to be marvels. Our success is your success. Your success is our success. We are all in this together. We are here to provide the path. We want you to walk it and be all you can be.
success.author: Brother Spartacus

success.quote: Time can buy money.
success.author: Aniekee Tochukwu Ezekiel

success.quote: Man's reach much exceed his grasp, or what is heaven for?
success.author: Robert Browning

success.quote: You have to become the person who deserves what you desire.
success.author: Rob Liano

success.quote: FAILURE "Failure begins by unleashing time, success is timing."#c9_fm
success.author: Cloudnine Fairmane

success.quote: SUCCESS Success and failure are siblings of same goal, but what really diversify them is: Failure keeps hold, while success moves onward. And therefore every steps is step forward even if doing back. Don't stop keep going."#c9_fm
success.author: Cloudnine Fairmane

success.quote: SUCCESS "Success is the structure and the foundation of the future."#c9_fm
success.author: Cloudnine Fairmane

success.quote: What has often been perceived as someone "getting rich over-night" is to be rightly understood as forging out many silent years to get there. Your business has the potential of becoming huge in a short time but that is not the norm or the ground for disappointment and resignation to fester. Is the climb any less desirable or worthy if what we were doing took a decade or more? Nothing - great is easy. No worthy endeavor is absent from sleepless nights and broken dreams
success.author: Christopher J. Gregas

success.quote: You are not what you would like to be but as you stay faithful and consistent you will – become what you wish to be , and when that happens, no one can take that from you. If you want things to change, you must change. If you want things to get better, you must get better. But be in your search to become, always be real and true to yourself. You’re the one you there is.
success.author: Christopher J. Gregas

success.quote: Begin with the end in mind. What you do today must have more than a shelf life. It must be memorable because, at the end of the day, people buy US first. Right? When you have a plan to live for another day instead of just making a sale, then you will have a long road in a success direction. What do you want to be remembered for? Start to build or bolster your resume today while there is time.
success.author: Chris J. Gregas

success.quote: The successful writers continue to learn and grow in their craft—and also to grow their audience or tribe or platform.
success.author: W. Terry Whalin

success.quote: I was going to either fail or thrive, and I was going to do it in full view of everyone I respected and resented.
success.author: David Chang

success.quote: Success is the sum of all validated improvements. You don’t need to validate yourself. You only need to validate the improvements - and others' improvements are much more important to validate than yours.
success.author: Meir Ezra

success.quote: It is in the defeat that we find the ingredients for the next success.
success.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

success.quote: It is loo late in the day to say, "bye bye" to the discipline regime I instituted sometime ago. I have never been deceived to think it would be easy. But here I am about to back out - about to bow to the pleasure of the moment and fritter away the gains of the past months. Lord, with my last breath, I say, "No". I know the discipline of today is the joy of tomorrow.
success.author: Abiodun Fijabi

success.quote: You are as successful as you are NOT careful. 99% of society says why it cannot be done, why it is dangerous, and they fail since they are careful. Nothing can happen to YOU that you can not handle.
success.author: Meir Ezra

success.quote: I don't promise to succeed but I promise to try and I guess that is all that counts!
success.author: Somya Kedia

success.quote: No one will ever remember you until you set an example
success.author: Sunil ydv SS

success.quote: Your new life will cost you your old life.
success.author: Llewellyn Devereaux

success.quote: Don't let anyone disrespect you or undermine you, because they don't know your value or your worth
success.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

success.quote: Life is unfair; it gives more thorns than roses, more tears than laughter, more failures than successes. Life is really unfair - it dashes hopes, shatters dreams and frustrates endeavours. But life is fair in this and in this only: it handsomely rewards those who enthusiastically love it - thorns, tears, failures and all. I have yet to meet a successful person who does not love life in all its ramifications.
success.author: Abiodun Fijabi

success.quote: I have always felt a duty to motivate and inspire others to be confident and follow their dreams. I will not waste any time into a project I am not passionate about. I love waking up in the morning with a goal that needs to be conquered... and if there isn’t one, I will create it!
success.author: Sofia Nova

success.quote: Walk towards success with all confidence,But work toward self-improvement with deep courage.
success.author: Aisha S. Kingu

success.quote: Knowledge is power if you're using specific reasons for success unless it's useless for you.
success.author: Sujit Kumar Mishra

success.quote: Your mind is a powerful magnate what you frequently visualize in your mind that is attacked and become the reality of your life. Make your magnate more powerful, more success-prone and work like hell, Success become self-evident & truth in every step of your life. If you think poor you become poor, if you think rich you become rich. What you think you become.
success.author: Lord Robin

success.quote: I have everything I need to get everything I want.
success.author: Rob Liano

success.quote: Earn your stripes.
success.author: Llewellyn Devereaux

success.quote: We are a mentally enslaved population that has been sold a fake identity of ourselves that is far removed from our true core.
success.author: Llewellyn Devereaux

success.quote: The success of deception depends upon the ability of the deceiver and the gullibility of the deceived.
success.author: Steven Redhead

success.quote: Success comes when you learn to use what is, and what is not, with equal facility.
success.author: Steven Redhead

success.quote: In the Race to success, nobody is ahead of you or you behind anybody, the race is all about your own effort.
success.author: Jonah Takon

success.quote: The bond built in sorrow is stronger the friendship natured in success.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: The fear of being poor or broke is a blessing, if you are a successful entrepreneur; but is a curse, if you want to be an entrepreneur.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: Pick your profession like you would your soulmate. Marry the one that sets you on fire.
success.author: Dr. Billy Aslbrooks

success.quote: Sculpt your future using the clay of your imagination.
success.author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

success.quote: Often the only difference between victory and defeat; success and failure; or love and loss might be the diligence with which we pursue something.
success.author: Eldon Henson

success.quote: Dream big but always plan small
success.author: Davan Yahya Khalil

success.quote: Throughout history, the life of a businessperson always involves some risk; the higher the risk, the greater the reward. On the other hand, the life of an employee in any workforce involves minimal to no risk at all, resulting in a lifetime full of steadiness with little to no accomplishments during this lifetime. However, there is a crucial factor which can also be considered as a trait or characteristic that made many remarkable men and women throughout history reach high levels of their career paths, which is considered to be "success" in our modernworld: Audacity.
success.author: Anas O Hamshari B Sc

success.quote: خەونی گەورە (ببین)ە بەڵام هەمیشە پلانەکانت بچووك بن
success.author: Davan Yahya Khalil

success.quote: When your successful.A wise person wants to know how you did it. So that they can do it too, but a foolish person wants to know how you did it. So that they can stop you and destroy you.
success.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

success.quote: Failure is the raw material from which success is made from
success.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

success.quote: Now is definitely the best time to start, though Yesterday would have beaten it easily.
success.author: Kalpesh Jain

success.quote: The steps to success may be different than what you anticipate. Truth told, most attempts in life do not deliver the expected results. So alter your perception, your vision, your outlook, but do not abandon the end goal.
success.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

success.quote: Never, ever, ever, write off anything you’ve achieved as merely being lucky. You are not lucky: you are hard-working and capable. Don’t ever question it.
success.author: Charlene Walters

success.quote: Failure is the only way to find how to succeed.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Failure is never final but a stepping stone towards the ultimate success.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: A balanced mind is not easily swayed by pressure or conformity. A balanced mind is enriched with bold action to commit something honorable for society.
success.author: Luis E. Cavazos Emotional Beauty

success.quote: The probability of attaining power depends on your definite desire and your organized planning to pursue success without an explanation to others.
success.author: Luis E. Cavazos Emotional Beauty

success.quote: You can never follow exactly what someone else did and expect it to work. You have to find your own route, leaning heavily on your confidence, trial and error, patience and persistence. It’s about 90 percent hard work and 10 percent timing and luck.
success.author: Charlene Walters

success.quote: There is no shortcut to success.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: As long as you live, as long as that final fate that everyone will meet, never accept defeat as final
success.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

success.quote: If you do not see yourself successful by the little things you do or have, you still will not see yourself successful even though you have the whole world in your palm. Success is not defined by wealth but by every little goals you are able to achieve and being happy with the win. contentment and inner peace can be success because not everyone has it.
success.author: Deborah Nwakwesili

success.quote: One of the keys to success is staying focused. Staying focused on your dreams is like following the light in the tunnel even though you are walking through the dark.
success.author: Deborah Nwakwesili.

success.quote: Do not allow doubt, fear or failure to affect your dreams. They are the slippery slopes you must ignore on the path to success.
success.author: Alex G Zarate

success.quote: Addressing the problem, and then taking this second step to fix the cause of the problem, distinguishes the people who are in control from the people who are not in control - the successful from the unsuccessful.
success.author: Sam Carpenter

success.quote: You have the Power to create this illusion to help the people, or you can continue to be Powerless and have them control the illusion".
success.author: Gino DiCaprio

success.quote: Enthusiasm with persistent effort is a seed of success.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Only those who have seen your hard work know the value of your success. For others, you are just a lucky person.
success.author: Dax Bamania

success.quote: Hot promotions in money printers today ! on moneyprinters.net: Great news！ Buy money printer with free shipping on moneyprinters.net
success.author: moneyprinters.net

success.quote: Teamwork is not a game for the selfish. It is for those with the mindset that a win for one is a win for all.
success.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

success.quote: The best and easiest way to maintain your success is to contribute and be part of other people's success.
success.author: Nabil K. Basma

success.quote: Listen with intent to learn
success.author: Cindy Ann Peterson

success.quote: Success is constant. Any time you achieve more than you did the day before, the year before; any time you add a piece to the framework that will someday determine your ultimate goal, you have achieved some degree of success.
success.author: Carlos Wallace

success.quote: Life has no limitations except the ones we make.-Les brown
success.author: Jim Kwik

success.quote: Don't forget, with every successful jump, you had asked for the bar to be raised.WHEN DO YOU WANNA RAISE THE BAR AGAIN?
success.author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

success.quote: Accept the blame and win the gameWe will find scores of opportunities to blame people and circumstances, but the one who wins is the one who accepts the blame and finds a solution to the problem. Most will either say the problem doesn't exist or blame others for it.
success.author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

success.quote: Yes, you may feel that you are tiny little dot!But you need to realize that there is one more tiny little dot in the Universe & that tiny dot is nothing less than a planet which goes through several tough changes to give life to billions of species!Have a great grit!– NitikaS
success.author: Nitika Sharma

success.quote: .COM is your 21st century's most valuable asset
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: People understand indirectly, more then directly
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: I enjoy the process of anything more than the results because the process is life and the result is death
success.author: Anuj Jasani

success.quote: Only those who confront unusual challenge can flaunt unusual success.
success.author: Vincent Okay Nwachukwu

success.quote: Whatever you desire, you must first become.
success.author: Ronnie House Jr.

success.quote: Everyone supposedly knows from this world what greatness is. However, not everybody realizes that we actually live in sucha world.
success.author: Oscar Auliq-Ice

success.quote: Your vision is sometimes seen through your actions. As leaders, it's our responsibilty to give our teams the experience of that vision by our work each day.
success.author: Janna Cachola

success.quote: I refuse to achieve "success" at the expense of my life.
success.author: Richie Norton

success.quote: What’s the success you think success will bring you? Go after the after-success, first.
success.author: Richie Norton

success.quote: Final cause is the success after the success. Always step over success to begin with final cause.
success.author: Richie Norton

success.quote: Some mentors are an open window to success. Other mentors are a closed door. Let people get to where they want through you as an open window...without blocking their view with a closed door ego.
success.author: Richie Norton

success.quote: Someone: The best part of success is, you'll have time, friends and lots of $$$$$.Me: ...and the worst part is to find someone who is really happy for your success.
success.author: Mohammed Israil

success.quote: The greatest secret to life's success is to help someone else achieve it.
success.author: Ronnie House Jr.

success.quote: A strong animal with a weak mind is feeble in front of his foes.
success.author: Ronnie House Jr.

success.quote: Celebrities want to be treated like normal people and normal people want to be treated like celebrities. There's a balance to all things.
success.author: Ronnie House Jr.

success.quote: Every dream is laughable until they've seen you achieve it.
success.author: Ronnie House Jr.

success.quote: Success is just a stepping stone to what you've already achieved.
success.author: Ronnie House Jr.

success.quote: Make it happen, or it won't.
success.author: Ronnie House Jr.

success.quote: The road to success is rough and tough, you boil and toil but you finally smile in style.
success.author: Vincent Okay Nwachukwu

success.quote: Dreams are conceived when you factor in and implement the small steps that will lead you to your victory!
success.author: Ronnie House Jr.

success.quote: nothing worthwhile in life is gained by avoiding what is uncomfortable initially
success.author: Steve Lentini

success.quote: It’s looks smaller, I know, The way I can make it even BIGGER, The Business!
success.author: Mayestron

success.quote: The true secret to success lies in believing in it.
success.author: Mango Wodzak

success.quote: Success is making those who believed in you look brilliant.
success.author: Victor Vickery
