success.quote: If you’ve never experienced the misery of failure, the chances are pretty good that you haven’t tried very hard to succeed. I’ve never met anyone who has made it to the top—and managed to stay there—who didn’t first taste the bitterness of defeat, usually many defeats.
success.author: Robert Ringer

success.quote: Faith and fear are found on the same streets
success.author: Johnnie Dent Jr.

success.quote: Passion without action achieves nothing. I fear being last than trembling with success.
success.author: Kangoma Kindembo

success.quote: Wir reiten in die Kreuz und QuerNach Freuden und Geschäften;Doch immer kläfft es hinterherUnd bellt aus allen Kräften.So will der Spitz aus unserm StallUns immerfort begleiten,Und seines Bellens lauter SchallBeweist nur, daß wir reiten.
success.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

success.quote: Behind the mask of pessimism there is nothing more than this pathetic fear that spends every waking moment of its day fearing that we might actually succeed.
success.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

success.quote: A civilization is glorious in its successes and tragic in its failures. An anti-civilization is terrifying in its successes and spectacular in its failures. A pseudo-civilization is annoying in its successes and ridiculous in its failures.
success.author: Jakub Bożydar Wiśniewski

success.quote: Success is not found in the result. Success is found in the efforts toward results.
success.author: Todd Stocker

success.quote: A sudden realization flashed in her mind. No one else's opinion mattered.It was so simple, one of those things a consoling parent might say, and yet it contained a fundamental truth. The entire world could believe in Hazel's greatness but their faith was meaningless if she didn't believe it herself. Conversely, the world could dismiss her ambitions, but it didn't matter as long as Hazel believed in their possibility. Greatness not only started with her, it could not begin anywhere else.
success.author: Henry H. Neff

success.quote: Then why can't I do it?''You haven't given yourself permission.'She laughed weakly.To Hazel's surprise, Hob didn't bat an eye. 'I'm dead serious. Failure scares some people so badly they forget what they're even trying to do. They're not trying to succeed at something; they're just trying not to fail. There's a big difference. I saw it on seyu and at the Province exams. Bibliosk was easy because you weren't afraid of the outcome and could just be in the moment. You even had fun with it.' He leaned forward. 'It's time to believe in yourself, Your Highness. Give yourself permission not just to succeed but to be great.
success.author: Henry H. Neff

success.quote: Success is a slow process, and quitting does not speed it up.
success.author: Jeffrey Fry

success.quote: One big secret about succeeding in the new year lies in concentrating more on things that matter most in life, and walking away from those things that are of no value or use.
success.author: Bamigboye Olurotimi

success.quote: Success is like an iceberg. Nobody sees the work that comprises it.
success.author: Jeffrey Fry

success.quote: The formula for success is 2% talent, 8% luck, and 90% of showing up every day.
success.author: Jeffrey Fry

success.quote: In order to be successful in the new year, stay focused, develop a positive attitude, and be passionate with your dreams.
success.author: Bamigboye Olurotimi

success.quote: Sometimes, we try, not because we'll succeed, but because we've got no other option.
success.author: Ogwo David Emenike

success.quote: Persist. Even when you’re heavy with emotion, pick yourself up bringing the axe of your actions down, repeatedly chopping at the day until you bring the sun low with success.
success.author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

success.quote: Difficulties come not to obstruct, but to instruct.
success.author: Brian Tracy

success.quote: If you think you’re always right, you’re usually always wrong.
success.author: Trevor Carss

success.quote: The vitality of youth is to employ all your might to pursue your visionary goals.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Connectivity is force that leads to commitment to a common cause.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: There is no beauty like being your best.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Is there any success like salvation?
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: There is no success like salvation
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: The moment I thought I could fall down, was the very moment which lift me up..!
success.author: Mahendar Singh Jakhar

success.quote: Success depends not on who you are or where you are coming from. Success depends on what you think - when you think
success.author: Rene Esteban

success.quote: It takes wisdom to gain wealth without losing health.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: Imagine how much more crazy money would drive us if we could each drive more than one car at the same time.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: If we don't attain mastery over our mind; our mind will gain supremacy over us.
success.author: Venugopala CV

success.quote: No material gift can be compared to coming into the New Year with great joy in one's heart.
success.author: Bamigboye Olurotimi

success.quote: We must innovate our ways to growth and productivity in the new year by embracing artificial intelligence, machine learning and internet of things.
success.author: Bamigboye Olurotimi

success.quote: Your destiny is in your hands. If you don't do anything for it. You will never be anything.
success.author: Deb Chakraborty

success.quote: When success comes knocking at the door, He is God. When blessings overflow, He is still God. No matter how much He blesses us, He remains God. He deserves our praise, even after we made it in life.
success.author: Gift Gugu Mona

success.quote: You'd be surprised how good writing matters when you're going after money.
success.author: Alice Walker

success.quote: When the talent is torrential, the harvest is inevitable.
success.author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

success.quote: There is this guilt that often accompanies being the first one to leave home. You will feel as though you shouldn’t have, so you will find a way to suffer, to not succeed. Your mind will trick you into believing it is a mistake to survive without the rest.
success.author: Ezinne Orjiako Nkem.

success.quote: لحظات فشلنا المتكررة مش هتخلص ... في كل مرحلة بتمر بيها هتقابلك لحظة فشل ما هتعلن ميلاد إنسان جديد جواك في نهايتها ...ما تحددش نجاحك أو فشلك بناء على رأي الناس في اللي بتعمله ،ما تحكمش على نفسك بالفشل من مجرد محاولة واحدة الحظ ما خدمكش فيها ،الفشل الحقيقي هو إنك تفقد إيمانك بنفسك و باللي بتعمله ،الفشل الحقيقي هو إنك تبطل تحاول لحد ما توصل ،الفشل الحقيقي هو إنك تبيع القضية و تخسرها قدام نفسك.
success.author: نورهان إبراهيم

success.quote: مشكلتك إنك شايف نفسك صغير و عاجز عن مواجهة أي حاجة في حين إن ربنا شايفك كبير و تقدر تهزم أي محن بيبتليك بيها لإن سبحانه و تعالى مش بيديلك غير الضربات اللي تقدر تستحملها و تخرج منك إنسان جديد ... أقوى من الأول.
success.author: نورهان إبراهيم

success.quote: Personal development is the vehicle through which success and economic growth travel
success.author: Nicky Verd

success.quote: Industriousness (hard work) and enthusiasm (a genuine love for what you are doing) are the cornerstones for success.
success.author: Swen Nater

success.quote: If you constantly focus on doing things, you will certainly miss better way of doing things and better opportunities that might show up. This happens because when you are caught up in action you miss looking at the bigger picture.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Set aside an hour every day to think and reflect without distractions.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Negative thinking and negative emotions have their importance: they sharpen your focus on dangers, threats, and vulnerabilities. This is critical for our survival.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Quitting because of extreme struggle is sort of success, but quitting because of little inconvenience is insanity.
success.author: Amit Kalantri

success.quote: In business and in life, at times it becomes a must to just drop the burden.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: It’s okay to feel down or think pessimistically sometimes, but choosing to respond with optimism, resilience, and gratitude will benefit you far more in the long run.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: When a market condition changes or a competitive environment changes, those things are outside our control. But what we must control is our attention to them.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Most of the thoughts are not yours but from your parents, your teachers, your friends, the books, the movies, the television, the newspapers.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: You are much more than what you think you are.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: There are invaluable insights and lessons to be learnt when you open up to different perspectives.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Building a positive mindset is not about being effervescent and annoyingly cheerful, but making an investment in yourself and your future.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Want lasting success? Focus on these two characteristics: Self-Honesty & Self-Discipline.
success.author: Charles F Glassman

success.quote: Success it self is blind but , it can showed a beautiful route to every one "  ( Nisar Taseer )
success.author: Nisar Taseer

success.quote: You have the power, the strength and the wisdom to write your own success story. You just have to believe that fairy tale endings are possible.
success.author: Margo Vader

success.quote: Everything starts with a Thought!
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Engage in something on a daily basis, which helps you drop your burdens and rejuvenates your mind.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Most of us carry loads on ourselves that we really don’t need to carry.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: On the other hand, positive thinking and positive emotions "broaden and build" our resources and skills, and open us up to possibilities of growth and development.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Businesses around the world are reaching the edges of incremental change. For future success, constant small improvements may no longer be enough. This is the time to re-create!
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Small changes or stretching a bit more on your tested models may not help you sustain the success you enjoyed in the past.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: At times the original model may be at fault given the new set of environmental factors that are in place.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: In business, non-challenging goals lead us to non-creative solutions. Our goals need to be challenging enough to get us thinking creatively.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Focus on good things, however small; find humor in difficult situations; fill your day with positive affirmations.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Cricket is a game that lends itself very well to periods of introspection, particularly if you are a batsman and you get out early on in the innings. Then you have to just sit and watch others for a considerable amount of time.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: We must keep in mind that we have limited time, and it is not wise to waste your time doing the wrong thing.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Make it a habit to set some quiet and peaceful time to reflect and think on a daily basis.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: The Golden rule is if we asked for more and negotiate with more confidence, we would get more.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Successful people negotiate more often and more successfully than those who are not successful.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Often we are held back by the fear of competition, disapproval and dislike.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: To live a better life, you really just have to get stuck into the failure, and the mess, and the confusion, and the hell of what's happening right now. You have to get more familiar with failure. You have to take failure to a show. You have to buy it a steak and kiss it on the mouth. That's how you heal. That's how you make better decisions in the future. So you have to apply for a boat load of jobs. And you have to get turned down for a boat load of jobs. You have to relapse in your recovery and you have to fall all the way back down again. We all do it and we all suffer and hate ourselves and declare ourselves fuck ups, and losers, and space wasters, and nonsense cobblers, and mistake squids, and we lie down on the floor and give up for awhile. And then sometime later, when the shame and the sadness have worn off a bit and we start to feel a bit peckish, we get up, dust off, and we go get 40 chicken nuggets and start the process all over again. And this time we know more. We know where the traps are and we know more of what we're up against. And we're tougher this time around.
success.author: Beth McColl

success.quote: Sharing emotional experiences works wonders in connecting with people who are otherwise quite different.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Emotions pull people towards you and the emotional engagements are generally very strong. Sharing your own emotions or emotional experiences/stories is a great way of making strong connections.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Celebrating the small wins is a great way to build confidence and start feeling better about yourself.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: No matter how high you’ve fly in your life, always stay grounded. Don’t let success and money get into your head. Stay humble, humane, and civilised.
success.author: Raihan Zubir

success.quote: Water your plants and your job is done for today.
success.author: Maxime Lagacé

success.quote: There is no weakness in asking. If we wait for someone to give us what we want, chances are we might never get it.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Having a strong mindset is the key of success.
success.author: Atalay Aydın

success.quote: We will always be tired, stressed, Processing a tragedy, and/or a little hungry--Like a wild animal, in the middle.The soul comes to play in what we choose to do after.
success.author: Karl Kristian Flores

success.quote: Live in the stretch.Extending your limbs out,In a burn, in a hollow trespass,Tremoring, a second away from a shout,And keep going after it hurts-- the animal won't.Live in the stretch.It is the only way to know anything in the dark.It is the only way to feel on fire.The animals eat well, but we can pass the mark.And if beavers land on the moon, this poem has expired.
success.author: Karl Kristian Flores

success.quote: Most people have the tendency to delay helping or supporting someone, until their help or support is no longer needed.
success.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

success.quote: Demonstrate "potentia sursum" through living a powered up life and let it be known that you are committed to doing your very best, every day, for full attainment of energy, work, and love, for yourself and in service to the world.
success.author: Liza Wisner

success.quote: Your commitment to living a full life should begin each day at your Prime Time.
success.author: Liza Wisner

success.quote: In your quest to PowerUp your life, commit to maximizing your potential by being focused on living through masterpiece days.
success.author: Liza Wisner

success.quote: Seek the glory that comes from God.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: To be happy, accept. To be great, refuse.
success.author: Maxime Lagacé

success.quote: Take the risk to ask for whatever you need and want. If someone says no, you will not lose anything. If someone says yes, you have a lot to gain.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Your next promotion, your next raise, your new job, your new relationship, your free sample or big discount, a better assignment…and much more might just be an ‘ask’ away!
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Research shows that positive people are more likely to perform better on assigned tasks and are more likely to get favorable evaluations by supervisors.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Making a strong connection with people is never easy. It is even more difficult to connect with people who are very different from you.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Understand the power of asking. Make asking a habit!
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: There is no success without struggle.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: However, we live in turbulent times, and it’s more important than ever that we learn how to open up dialogue and connect with people who are different from us.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Real growth and progress only happen when we drive ourselves outside of our comfort zones and learn how to embrace the truth and experiences of others.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Trying to focus your energy on identifying the things that are within your control and seeing what you can do about them help building self-esteem and confidence.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: You thought I'd be down, but look at you worried.
success.author: Jordan Hoechlin

success.quote: Take a 2-minute self-appreciation break every day - Slow down, take a break and answer this question: What are 3 things I can appreciate about myself?
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: No person is so worthless that he/she cannot help someone else. And everyone needs help…sometime.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Help others. When you help others, you help yourself!
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: A key criteria to be successful in any field is the desire to continually strive to be a better version of yourself. This is very different from the skill of accumulating and remembering facts which may helps in studies and in getting qualifications.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Success is not a result. Success is a mindset.
success.author: Meir Ezra

success.quote: The path to innovation begins with curiosity
success.author: Robert Iger

success.quote: ...the thing about success is that it doesn't seem like a natural result of unsuccessfulness.
success.author: R. Eric Thomas

success.quote: Success is not always achieved by fighting. In this case, it’s achieved by surrender.
success.author: Jennifer Valoppi

success.quote: We are living in the world of pandemic. Life is not the same as it was before. We have to choose new ways of living.Being ignorance or in denial won’t make you immune to the virus.Choose to be responsible and always be careful. Watch what you do, where you go and what you touch. You can practice your freedom by choosing to be safe.
success.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

success.quote: Everything begins small.
success.author: Suzy Kassem

success.quote: Without deadlines, nothing get done.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: 42 Results and success are very different things. Perhaps there are no outward results but instead there is an increase in experience, in humility, in your faith in God. That is your success from a spiritual point of view.
success.author: François-Xavier Nguyễn Văn Thuận

success.quote: Small winnings are the baits to get caught in the small games. Be the part of big games, where challenge is much smarter than you, which can bring out the best in you.
success.author: Deepak Gupta

success.quote: Work hard and let your success speak on your behalf.
success.author: Brajesh Kumar Singh

success.quote: Als je snel wilt gaan, reis alleen. Als je ver wilt gaan, reis dan samen.
success.author: Mungi Ngomane

success.quote: A szó, amit kerestem: fehér. Aznap este, (...) Oda-vissza betűztem gondolatban, szidtam magam a butaságomért. A szégyen nyomasztó súlyként nehezedett rám, amelyet talán sosem fogok tudni lerázni, pedig tudtam, hogy a szüleimet nem érdekelné, hogy minden kártyát helyesen olvastam-e el. Csak sikert akartam elérni. Vagy talán azt nem akartam, hogy sikerre képtelennek könyveljenek el.
success.author: Michelle Obama

success.quote: When we pray and worship, we need to do more than just raise our hands and voices, we need to raise our thinking.
success.author: Dr. Billy Alsbrooks

success.quote: It's easy for me to see the blind luck at play and hard for me to see the parts of me that put in the work.
success.author: R. Eric Thomas

success.quote: Fear of failure destroys creativity
success.author: Robert Iger

success.quote: Without struggles, could there be any success?
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Is there any success without struggles?
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: I've waited forever for you...what's a few more lifetimes?
success.author: Saim .A. Cheeda

success.quote: When We Say, (We Can't) We are Remain In Curse.When Say, We have to do it.We are blessed then.
success.author: Solaman Kabir Rone

success.quote: Success must be scheduled. Is your daily life structured in a way that will produce GREATNESS?
success.author: Dr. Billy Alsbrooks

success.quote: Our actions bring us success as well as struggle, we think we deserve success but why do we complain about the struggle?
success.author: Amit Kalantri

success.quote: Such exponential growth does not occur in the natural world, except maybe for cancer—and that growth ceases once the host has been consumed.
success.author: Douglas Rushkoff

success.quote: Failure is overrated. We attach unknown fears to this experience to such extent of inhibiting ourselves from committing.
success.author: Rey Noel G. Sarzate

success.quote: Dear Superwoman,Let no one demean your intelligence.Let no one dribble you from your happiness.Let no one derail you from success. Be a smart, courageous and determined woman.
success.author: Gift Gugu Mona

success.quote: Before your turn the key, you have to get in.
success.author: Sanita Belgrave

success.quote: If everyone has the same number of hours in a day, why do some people seem to get so much more done than others? How do they do more, achieve more, earn more, have more? If time is the currency of achievement, then why are some able to cash in their allotment for more chips than others? The answer is they make getting to the heart of things the heart of their approach. They go small.
success.author: Gary Keller

success.quote: You have only so much time and energy, so when you spread yourself out, you end up spread thin. You want your achievements to add up, but that actually takes subtraction, not addition: You need to be doing fewer things for more effect instead of doing more things with side effects.
success.author: Gary Keller

success.quote: When you see someone who has a lot of knowledge, they learned it over time. When you see someone who has a lot of skills, they developed them over time. When you see some one who has done a lot, they accomplished it over time. When you see someone who has a lot of money, they earned it over time.The key is over time. Success is built sequentially. It's one thing at a time.
success.author: Gary Keller

success.quote: When one thing, the right thing, is set in motion, it can topple many things.
success.author: Gary Keller

success.quote: Every day try to convert your reactions to responses. Reactions are always instinctive, whereas responses are always well thought of, just and right to save a situation from going out of hands, to avoid cracks in relationship, to avoid taking decisions in anger, anxiety, stress or hurry.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Our instruments of communication have changed, our ways of communication have changed, and, most important, the ownership of media has changed—because now we all own media.
success.author: Maxim Behar

success.quote: There is an old saying, "Necessity is the mother of invention". How true! With that in mind, always work on your reasons first and the answers second
success.author: Jim Rohn

success.quote: One implication is that we, the people who have been known as PR experts—and still go by that title—have now turned into a combination of publishers, reporters, and editors.
success.author: Maxim Behar

success.quote: Too much thought into the process kills innovation and at times, the outcome altogether.
success.author: Torron-Lee Dewar

success.quote: With will one can do wonders.
success.author: Amit Kalantri

success.quote: Successful people are not people without problems; they are simply people who have learned to solve their problems by utilizing the powers of their minds.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: We should realize that we have, deep within ourselves, deep pools of great ability, that can be tapped, if we’ll just dig deeply enough.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: You can achieve the unachievable!
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: With social media, everything has been "public" for quite a while now; there is nothing "nonpublic" anymore.
success.author: Maxim Behar

success.quote: Student in quest of knowledge finds teacher in all
success.author: Venu CV

success.quote: The most powerful productivity tool ever invented is simply the word "No.
success.author: Shane Parrish

success.quote: It is better to be a has-been than a never-was
success.author: John Osborne

success.quote: After twenty successful years in journalism, I left it, vividly remembering that "You can achieve a lot with journalism, but you should know exactly when to quit.
success.author: Maxim Behar

success.quote: If you find fault in everything. You might be faulty or it might be your fault every time.
success.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

success.quote: Our PR business today has increasingly less in common with the business that we used to do just ten years ago, let alone a hundred years ago. Pretty soon, it will look nothing like its former self.
success.author: Maxim Behar

success.quote: Without having a goal it is difficult to score!
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: It is important to develop a complete disregard for the limits of your capabilities.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: You can work for your dream company, you can run that company and you are capable of coming on the cover of Time magazine…nothing is impossible.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Remember, your vision of where or who you want to be is the greatest asset you have!
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Every day, try to push your limits. Do this for small tasks and for your bigger long terms goals. Develop the ‘growth mindset’.
success.author: Abhishek Ratna

success.quote: Porque, a veces, lo normal es lo extraordinario y el cambio es la única constante.
success.author: Eduardo de la Cruz

success.quote: Success is good. Failure is not bad.
success.author: Hrishikesh Agnihotri

success.quote: Living is different from just existing.
success.author: Joshua Suya Pelicano

success.quote: Inherited success makes even a stupid seem smart, sane and sensible.
success.author: Amit Kalantri

success.quote: Public Relations? Three billion people who are on social media are dealing with "relations," and everything has become "public".
success.author: Maxim Behar

success.quote: Success occurs when we embrace our individual gifts and act accordingly. Failure occurs when we ignore our gifts, wish we had those belonging to another, and act accordingly to those wishes.
success.author: Charles F. Glassman

success.quote: Fall down but never back down.
success.author: Abhijit Naskar

success.quote: If you fail today, find the force within to rise tomorrow.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: People have marveled at the fact that I didn’t start McDonald’s until I was fifty-two years old, and then I became a success overnight. But I was just like a lot of show business personalities who work away quietly at their craft for years, and then, suddenly, they get the right break and make it big. I was an overnight success all right, but thirty years is a long, long night.
success.author: Ray Kroc

success.quote: If you seek the strength within to work, you will win, though you face the worst.
success.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

success.quote: Don’t adapt to the world like the rest of the flock, but rather let the world adapt to you and your unique ways; given time, it will find a place of its own in this world.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: While racial minorities across every civilized country in the world are still waiting for their break, our kind (stutterers) became emperors (i.e., Claudius) and kings (i.e., George VI) for thousands of years. Imagine how well we’re doing for ourselves now.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: Skills don’t die; only people do.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: Financial literacy makes it okay for you to make small or big mistakes. On the other hand, being financially illiterate only makes those mistakes dire and regrettable.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: Worrying about what ‘people are going to say’ and ‘what the neighbours might think’ is always in the minds of working people. They aren’t afraid of failure. They are afraid of success and how they would have to make excuses to their friends if it ever came their way.
success.author: Clifford Thurlow

success.quote: The best alternative to hope is to set up multiple backup plans.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: To dare is one of the most important sales talents anyone can master.
success.author: Yuri van der Sluis

success.quote: Success and failure; victory and defeat; happiness and sadness; whichever destiny you set your mind to is what it will be.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: Money is like lust. When you don’t have enough of it, you want more. When you satisfy it, you still thirst for more.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: The way I look at debt is that you are taking something which does not belong to you. The person who you took it from expects you to give it back, plus a whole lot more compared to what you received in the first place, whether you like it or not.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: Patience is the virtue that we need to achieve greater things than the average person can.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: The complete transition from cub to lion can only be achieved via the school of real life.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: You are more likely to be successful if you worry about providing value instead of being successful.
success.author: Yuri van der Sluis

success.quote: You are more likely to be successful if you worry about providing value instead of being successful.
success.author: Yuri van der Sluis

success.quote: Hold your head up high, you'll see more!'
success.author: Yuri van der Sluis

success.quote: Dreams and hope won’t get you anywhere; only actions do; actions create results.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: Defeat is a result of people not being bold enough to grab their win.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: Every prospect you meet is a change to create magic.
success.author: Yuri van der Sluis

success.quote: I always assumed that I was born with bad luck. The truth is, luck only played 10% of the cards while the remaining 90% had to be played in mine.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: Uncovering the right problem is half the solution.
success.author: Yuri van der Sluis

success.quote: A veteran of failure is harder, robust, and more durable than a billion-pound diamond rock.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: Money will not make your marriage any better, nor will it make you any happier. Instead, money would expand your available options in life. More money = more options.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: A Gentleperson understands that there will always be opposition. By that, a Gentleperson understands that every court needs a jester and that a lion cares not for the opinion of sheep.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: A Gentleperson always negotiates. A Gentleperson understands that negotiation is the art of bartering for better things than what they’ve been given by mother nature.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: A Gentleperson understands that it’s better not to take sides. If a Gentleperson decides on taking sides, then they shall take both sides, for they have a 50% chance of winning and a 50% chance of not losing.
success.author: Anas  Hamshari

success.quote: A brand or business that skips the creative process has not been founded and is just a failed dream with a worthless title of being founded
success.author: James D. Wilson

success.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
success.author: Surya Raj

success.quote: This was not the adulthood that I had predicted for myself: an author of books, spending a week in Hawaii with his handsome longtime boyfriend before deciding which house to return to. I had wished for it, sure, but I also wished for a complete head transplant.
success.author: David Sedaris

success.quote: Attitude counts in business. Courtesy, respect for time, addressing people by their name or appropriate title, use of sorry, please and thank you can significantly impact your bottom-line. Never throw them to the wind as a business owner.
success.author: Victor Kwegyir

success.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
success.author: Winston S. Churchill

success.quote: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
success.author: Steve Jobs

success.quote: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
success.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

success.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
success.author: Thomas Jefferson

success.quote: The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, because you won't. It's whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction, or whether you learn from it; whether you choose to persevere.
success.author: Barack Obama

success.quote: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember -- the only taste of success some people get is to take a bite out of you.
success.author: Zig Ziglar

success.quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes but they don't quit.
success.author: Conrad Hilton

success.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
success.author: Colin Powell

success.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
success.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

success.quote: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don't wish it were easier; wish you were better.
success.author: Jim Rohn

success.quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
success.author: James Cameron

success.quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
success.author: David Brinkley

success.quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to success is more important than any other one thing.
success.author: Abraham Lincoln
